Title: Please be careful when you book Flixbus…
Review: Please be careful when you book Flixbus if you need to be in time,my bus was delayed for about 60 minutes,I had to find another way to get to Dundee from Perth.I choose Flixbus because the time was perfect for my appointment, however thing's didn't go well.First the bus supposed to be 09:10 ,phoned customer service twice, both occasions I was told bus will be there in 3 minutes,not happening.At 09:35 another bus is coming,I stepped on the bus and ask if this is the bus which should be there at 09:10 , driver verry rude told me to step out of her bus and if I want to travel with her I need to pay another ticket, again I tried to step in to pay another ticket, again she told me to step out of her bus . Long story short never use this company if you need to be in time , totally shocking behaviour from the driver

Title: Bus did not turn up
Review: Arrived early for 9.55am bus. Received a text advising delay until 10.16. Then another until 10.22 but the bus did not show up. There were no further updates and the status remained to show as being delayed but the tracker showed the bus to be half way to it's destination. It had obviously bypassed our pickup point to make up time. Ourselves and another passenger had to rebook a later bus and hour later. We had an hour and half wait at a freezing unsheltered pick up point. Also customer contact number is a Berlin number!

Title: Please Be Cautious When Choosing FlixBus
Review: Please Be Cautious When Choosing FlixBus as Your Travel Partner |  | I had a terrible experience with FlixBus — by far the worst service I’ve encountered. Due to their mistake, I had to pay a a lot, and they showed absolutely no concern for the situation they put me in through their poor handling and rescheduling. |  | Their customer service is third-class — unhelpful, dismissive, and completely lacking in empathy. I was left in a very difficult situation when their driver refused to let me and my wife on board simply because their scanning machine couldn't read my valid barcode. I politely asked the driver to wait just 5 minutes so I could speak with customer service and sort out the issue, but he refused. This was particularly unfair considering passengers had already been made to wait over 30 minutes while the driver took his break in Manchester. |  | This level of unprofessionalism is unacceptable. I ended up paying over a lot to reach my destination using alternative transport, not to mention the mental stress and inconvenience caused — something that cannot be compensated easily. |  | FlixBus is running an unfair and irresponsible business in the UK. Such behavior should be taken seriously, and I believe the Traffic Commissioner should consider reviewing their operating license. |  | Travelers deserve better — be cautious before booking with FlixBus.

Title: I had a challenging experience when I…
Review: I had a challenging experience when I mistakenly booked a travel ticket from London to Glasgow departing at 21:30 from London Victoria. Upon realizing the mistake, I reached out to the customer service team for assistance. Unfortunately, instead of receiving help, I was informed that I would need to pay an additional £9.75. It’s worth noting that the desired travel was for the same day and time but had a different departure point. The ticket I had purchased was £4 more expensive than the alternative option I was considering. I was not requesting a refund, just looking for assistance with the situation as the oversight could happen to anyone .. | Very mean and wicked customer service team. |  | Very terrible

Title: flix bus Italian trip
Review: We are travelling to Italy later this year and booked seats to Puglia. The booking system was easy but the luggage situation was misleading. I paid for 4 suitcases and when the confirmation came through it stated 8 pieces of luggage. I tried to contact the company but as usual had to do this via their refund page. They sent me a voucher which I will never use. We are pensioners having a train and road trip and probably will never do this again because of pre existing conditions. When I asked if we could have a refund instead of a voucher they stated that it was in the terms and conditions no refunds of money. So travellers beware really make sure you don’t make any mistakes with Flix bus as they will not refund money.

Title: The BEST and CHEAPEST way to travel around the UK
Review: I have made many trips to Birmingham from London and back and I will use always use FlixBus and no one else. | To begin with, they are the cheapest and even fastest!! The train which costs nearly £50 takes 2 hours 20 minutes (usually much longer with delays) while FlixBus takes 2 hours 40 minutes (though my last 3 trips took only 2 hours...a record!!). The cost is never more than £13!! | The coaches are always on time and if they are getting delayed an email is sent well in advance. | The drivers are amazing, efficient and polite and the service is fantastic! | The buses are clean and comfortable and it is like having a 5 star travelling experience!! | FlixBus are the BEST!!

Title: Disgraceful behaviour from driver
Review: Our driver was extremely rude. It took 1.5hrs to get from Finchley Rd to Victoria. We received no communication from the driver. Instead he was talking to someone on loudspeaker in his own language. He told the woman sitting behind him to sshhhh when she was talking to someone on the phone and was incredibly rude when a youman went to ask him what the problem was. When we arrived at Victoria I asked why he didn't communicate with us? Apparently he's a driver not a communicator and I should have looked at my phone for answers. He gave me very rude hand gestures and made everyone get their own cases out of the hold. This was my 1st and last time of using Flixbus. Disgraceful behaviour

Title: Straight forward
Review: Straight forward, What I love is the App don't cheat, it won't change my choice unless I do it myself, other companies their App keep adding people or change my choice etc. Thank you for respecting my choice without forcing me or tricking me by changing my booking to higher prices or destinations etc. I don't get frustrated with you, its quick, other drive me mad, it could take 2 hours to keep resetting on what I want 1 person, 1 bed, in 1 location etc for Hotel, taxi, bus, train, etc. They take over even when you want to search with another company, they hide bihind or they spool under another web page, and take your booking, your money and give you wrong informations and I have lost my money once on location, It is not what I book for, I end up with a MIXED share accomodation of a dozen men and women, its crazy why they mix people like animals... No respect, still I didn't got refunded for my week I had booked and paid under better circunstance, It is very dishonest, it is not possible to get rid of Booking .com they pop up all the time, they are the one taking over my booking and put me with mix people I am a women, I don't want to share with men. Way to aggressive for my taste. Thank you for good service. I will continue my bookings with you from now on.

Title: This company shouldn't be in business
Review: This company shouldn't be in business. | They're clearly not capable of taking responsibility for their own mistakes. | A couple minutes before leaving home I was notified of a 45 minutes delay on my trip, which was originally scheduled to depart at 4.45 am. | The email said to be at the stop 15 minutes before the forecasted time, which was then 5.30am. | I arrived at the bus stop at 5 am, and about five minutes after that, the forecasted time changed from 5.30 am to 4.58 am, meaning the bus had departed two minutes before I arrived. | Needless to say I would have never missed the bus had I not received their email stating a delay that was in fact 10 minutes and not 45. | Tried to explain this to their customer support, and the guy clearly had already decided that I didn't deserve a refund before even understanding the whole story. | He denied that any email was sent to me even after I showed it to him, he kept on blaming me for not being there fifteen minutes before the scheduled time, when the email stated to be there before the forecasted time, not the original scheduled one. | So not only I'm not able to attend an extremely important medical check that will take months to be rescheduled, I'm also not gonna be refunded for the tickets I can't use due to their massive mistake. | Avoid this company like the plague. Highly unprofessional.

Title: I found the site very easy to use.
What choice would you make?
Review: I booked to use the FlixBus service a few weeks before departure to take two of us to a London airport. |  | The departure day and time arrived (midnight), but there was no FlixBus present and neither was there any communication via text or email from FlixBus. |  | An alternative opportunity arose with a different coach company, so I attempted making contact with FlixBus to find out the situation - but they only open from 8am to 8pm - and it was now way past midnight. |  | The alternative transport was about to leave and, without knowing what was happening regarding our FlixBus transport, I opted to secure two seats on the other coach. |  | When requesting a refund for FlixBus services not rendered, it was refused as, apparently, the FlixBus DID eventually leave - but an hour and a half later than scheduled! |  | The FlixBus representative could not explain why there was no communication. Neither could the representative explain why the bus was one and a half hours late! |  | Now, the two of us could have waited in the cold, at night, while tired, in the hope the FlixBus MIGHT arrive - but even then, there was no guarantee that it would. I needed to secure transport to the airport. What would you have done? |  | I will NOT be booking FlixBus again and neither can I recommend the service. |  | The FlixBus service all-around is poor!

Title: False best price guarantee and no power socket
Review: The company is false advertising their best price guarantee. On their website it says the earlier you book the cheaper. I booked my journey in advance and the on the day of travel the price dropped for both of my outward and return journey. I spoke to their customer service team and asked them to honor the best price guarantee they promised. The agent rejected and claimed they price dynamically and no refund will be given. They also advertised their bus is equipped with power socket. It is false marketing too. I am very disappointed with their customer service and would not recommend travel with FlixBus. A very dishonest business.

Title: Use if you like chaos and feeling threatened.
Review: Paris - Dover . Last minute booking due to Eurostar cancellations. | Bercy station is awful, no signage, grotty, rat infested, and intimidating people hovering around | Bus was late. En route to ferry passenger was aggressive and threatening to people back of coach. Because of late departure, ferry was missed and 3 hour wait at port at 1 am. Decided enough is enough and bought a train ticket to use from Dover to lo London.. dfds don't let off foot passengers so asked the driver to drop us off outside when the coach leaves, he agreed .. driver drove straight into motorway and to London. Meaning we were late again and wasted money on train tickets. |  | Never ever ever again ! I used Megabus a few times when they did the channel crossing service. And had no problems. | This was an experience I'll never forget and will warn people to stay away. Spend a bit more and fly, or drive or use the Eurostar.

Title: The bus service was good with no…
Review: The bus service was good with no delays. However, the customer service was shocking. I queried as to whether the bus would be running as there didn't appear to be many people booked on. I was told by Flixbus online chat that they could not answer this. I then informed them that I had paid for a hotel so an indication would be good. They informed me of the number of people booked on and told me that the bus should be running. I then queried as to how many were booked on for the return journey. I received a really rude and aggressive response and they cut me off the chat! Two stars because the bus service was good but 0 stars for customer service! Worst I've ever received!

Title: Because of them being late for almost…
Review: Because of them being late for almost an hour, because of them overselling tickets where more people turned up for the couch than there are seats in it my wife had to carry our 5 year old daughter on her lap the whole journey Newport to London in a disabled seat where there are no physical restraints ( in case of hard braking) just an open space. Because of this we nearly missed our eurostar train to Paris and a whole disneyland holiday. And their customer service, there’s no customer service. Probably won’t be using them anymore even despite them being cheaper than their competitors.

Title: Poor Service. Nearly passed out
Review: Poor Service. I have always been a person with a sensetive stomach and as a student its hard to get cheap deal to go to london for an Important academic event... anyways, so I had an early morning bus and the driver Benny or something had to stop to get costumers... but on the road i got clammy and little nausea since i am usually a sensetive person with trips and stuff... i told him can i quickly purchase a bottle of water and a little snack to keep me comfortable in a near by shop... he said no, since no shops available in the area but the costa literally few steps away was open. Then he told us that he will stop for a pee break? I tried to get his attention and he didn't hear me what so ever... then he decided not to pee... it's just very frustrating bc I simply need a bottle of water and a few crackers to feel better and have a good and tolerable Journey but yeah... I use flix bus often and never had this much of a fuss before... all the previous drivers were kind and caring. The bus was clean but again toilets were horrible like always and my seat was missing a bin bag

Title: Not my best first experience
Review: The booking process is easy & the pricing affordable but things do go wrong.. My outbound trip met with a mechanical issue that meant parking on the hard shoulder for a mechanic to arrive & fix which did happen but meant my arrival was too late for an important Court sentencing & to support family members. My return trip began late & firstly a pull in to a service station for driver handover & again further along for driver to sort out his "drivers card" all of which took extra time. This ultimately resulted in my return home being nearly 2 hours late & I still had a further trip to make to get home. I appreciate you cannot second guess every situation but my trip cannot be heralded as the best experience on my first Flixbus journey. However the coach was clean & comfortable & I may use them again in the future hoping this was not the normal service they provide...

Title: 2+ hour delay
Review: 2+ hour delay, no compensation provided. When I asked on the LiveChat what could be provided due to the long delays, and NOTHING. I was told I shouldn't of got on the coach! How would I know the delay without getting on? Another Megabus wannabe, get a train, or even a flight.

Title: I’m extremely disappointed with the…
Review: I’m extremely disappointed with the service I received from FlixBus. I had a ticket for bus UK940 from Heathrow to Bristol on February 20th, but due to a failure in their communication, I missed the bus. The bus was delayed, but I wasn’t notified that it had actually left earlier than expected. I followed all instructions, arriving 15 minutes early, but when I checked the app, the departure time had already passed. The lack of real-time updates and poor customer service response has left me frustrated and out of pocket. I’m requesting a full refund due to the communication failure on FlixBus’s part, but the company has refused to assist. Would not recommend.

Title: Try somebody else, they’re awful
Review: We waited at the location stated on our tickets only to watch the bus go sailing past. I spoke to customer services trying to get transferred onto the next outbound coach but they refused so l had to pay for another set of return tickets at around $150 so all in all paid almost $300 for 2 people between Calgary and Banff. | After speaking to the driver of the next coach he said the pickup location was actually the other side of the carpark, not where is pinpointed on the tickets. I won't be using these again after this valuable lesson. | If you ever do choose to use FlixBus hopefully you don't get "Brad" as a driver, he was all over the road and seemed more interested in frequently passing his phone to an Australian couple to show them photos he'd taken of various parts of Canada. |  | FlixBus are shysters and refused to refund my money or transfer tickets due to their very poor information. I sent them a screenshot of my position at the pickup location I was told to meet at just as the coach drove past but still they refused. | There are other coach companies that do similar routes to FlixBus so l'd urge you to try them instead.

True to his word he did. |  | 10/10 service. |  | Big thanks. 😁 |  | Thank you

Title: Horrible service
Review: Horrible service, decided to try fluxbus for important journey to Aberdeen from Dundee instead of my usual megabus. | Got to take off point 15min early only to see an email that my coach had been delayed. Checked online and told it would be 30min late to take off at 9.45 instead of original 9.15. | Went into the mall as it was raining and had a 5 year old with me only to come out at 9.33 and be told the bus had left, tracked online and showed 9.28 instead of previous 9.45. | Saw another bus going to Aberdeen who was extremely unhelpful and insisted I needed to buy another ticket to get on, refused giving his name with me eventually having to shell out additional 30 or so pounds in addition to being delayed for important appointment. | Never had this with megabus or national express, definitely never using again and would be putting in formal complaint.

Title: Wayne shows the way to do great customer service
Review: First time journey and it couldn’t be a nicer welcome. Wayne’s a star, he should be called the captain of our coach as he’s so friendly and helpful. He also gives the best considerate passengers advice, which had the desired effect. No need for in your face quiet zone stickers or instructions. Comfy seats too and plenty of legroom. Sit back, relax and enjoy the ride! Chose FlixBus as it offers a connection with the Jubilee Line Tube at Finchley in North London. Glad I did. (BOOKING NUMBER | 323 131 9780)

Title: AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL
Review: I’ve been booking Flix Bus Uk for about the last 9 months to bring my son home from Uni (Nottingham/London) and not had any issues at all but last night we had an email to say his departure point had changed from London Victoria to Green Line station which are near each other, so that’s not a problem…. BUT I’d also booked and PAID for a double seat for my son but I noticed on the new details he only had 1 seat. | I contacted them by phone, which wasn’t a great experience as the person spoke limited English and was obvs reading from a script!!!! They said they’d sold my other seat, even though I’d PAID for it and there were no more left. | Very strange as I went on to their website and saw there were 6 ROWS OF DOUBLE SEATS LEFT !!!! | Absolutely terrible way to run a business and unfortunately I’ve lost faith in their ‘service’ so will be booking elsewhere in future!!!! 🤬🤬🤬🤬

Title: Given reading these reviews
Review: Given reading these reviews! I will never use this company! | Here’s why? |  | Not one of these reviews poor to fair to positive have warranted any kind of response! These guys who are a limited company are scamming you all! Whilst you may not like mega bus! Holy bejesus stick with the,! Flix Bus is as it states it’s a Flix! Or a fix ?.. |  | If they employed me but I already own my own business ! So that’s not an option! I would advise a rebrand and to be fair make sure your drivers want to buy into your brand! Uniform attitude etc however I suspect that’s because you pay them are.y minimum wage! | I see no future for this company which is a shame as it has the potential to be so much very more!

Title: I definitely wouldn't use this service…
Review: I definitely wouldn't use this service again! My bus was cancelled by text at 1.30am in the morning when l was due to leave at 8.30am. I had to arrange train tickets in the middle of the night to get me to the airport on time. Shockingly poor customer service 😒

Title: Night trip to Glasgow from London
Review: Night trip to Glasgow from London, First of I was given the wrong seat which I didn't book, no leg room and I'm a short man, seats recline about 2 degrees only, no charging outlet for each seat, need to give your device to the driver to charge, packed in like sardines, there like the smallest seats ever and rock hard, there was no one asking just a few passengers to be quiet as this was a night bus, so I got no sleep at all for 10 hours. Never using again,

Title: Worst bus company
Review: From start to finish Flexibus booking & journey was terrible. They cancelled my outward journey a few days before my departure date and gave alternative which ment I would only have 2 hours in disneyland Paris, which was pointless. So had to book an alternative travel measure out to Disneyland. When it came to travelling home, neither of the drives wore a uniform until the bus was back in the UK and my panoramic seats weren't available which I had paid extra for. I think the company is awful.

Title: Departure and arrival were punctual
Review: Departure and arrival were punctual, seat was comfortable

Title: I was travelling with my family and bus driver was very rude …
Review: I was travelling with my family and we got late a bit. When we got into the bus someone was seating on my dad's seat and the bus driver started to shout at Us and was being very rude to my whole family then he said seat wherever you find space. We thought we meant to seat at our own seat but I was wrong and he was very rude.

Title: Bus left way before scheduled departure time causing us to miss it and refuse to refund.
Review: I booked a FlixBus, but it left 10 minutes early, causing me to miss it—and my connecting FlixBus, which I had also paid for. I had to take a taxi instead, but FlixBus refuses to issue a refund for the unused tickets. |  | Customer service has been a nightmare. They ignored key details, contradicted themselves, and even falsely claimed my ticket was scanned, despite me never boarding. After multiple emails and providing all the proof I could, they still refuse to help.

Title: Stress-free trip, stay away from Flixbus
Review: For your own good and a hassle-free journey, stay away from this company! I've had two serious incidents with them already. |  | The first one happened a year ago when, less than two hours before the bus was supposed to arrive, I was informed via email or SMS (I can’t remember exactly) that the bus had an issue and the trip was canceled. How can you notify someone just two hours in advance? I had to rely on friends to find an alternative, and my vacation was ruined. I thought it was an isolated case and decided to give the company another chance. |  | Not long after, I had another issue. I booked seat 1A, which costs an extra €3.99, if I remember correctly. A week after my reservation was confirmed and the money was taken, I received an email stating that my seat was no longer available. Instead, they reassigned me to a random seat at the back without even asking if I agreed to the change or if I wanted a refund. |  | It was clear that they had resold my seat, probably because 1A was next to 1B, and they didn’t want it to appear occupied in the system. Someone else must have been able to book 1A while I was left with no choice but to accept the change. The irony? There were still available seats in the same front row, like 1C and 1D, but they didn’t even bother offering me one. |  | When I checked the system, I noticed that only a few seats were taken, which made it obvious—they double-sell tickets even after you've already booked and paid for them. If they can squeeze out an extra €3.99, why not, right? Pure greed. But this kind of behavior will cost them their customers in the long run, and I truly hope their company collapses. |  | As for me, I will never use their services again. Consider this a warning—if you want a stress-free trip, stay as far away from them as possible.

Title: I bought my ticket then due to…
Review: I bought my ticket then due to unforeseen circumstances I had to cancel and they would not give my money back, they gave me a voucher but I wanted my money back so please read the flixbus terms and conditions before buying your ticket. Very bad customer service.

Title: Worst and most unreliable bus transport…
Review: Worst and most unreliable bus transport company ever. They misinform customers, call customers liars and try to cheat customers out of their money without actually giving the service. Zero percent customer service.

Title: The driver was so rude
Review: The driver was so rude, not just to us but to a poor solo female passenger struggling with heavy luggage who I got off the bus to go and help. 1st Feb 14:30 Lyon to Grenoble.

Title: Outdated archaic buses.
Review: Outdated archaic buses.. no USB ports, no charging points. Or if you find one it doesn't work or it is located far away from your seat. I cannot fathom that in 2025 they use these type of buses | .

Title: Eating in bus
Review: At arrival my wife and me the driver told to everybody "no food, no drink" till the service I stop. | I'm a diabetic and my wife have a allergy on her throat and she need to drink a hot water how I don't drink a juice and food.And also the toilet is out of service. Are this is a joking? | Are this is on flixbus policy?

Title: CLEAN COACHES ON TIME JOURNEY
Review: PLEASANT JOURNEY FROM START TO FINISH

Title: Well priced good experience
Review: Bus was clean, on time arrival. No dramas and a great price.

Title: They don’t allow you to use toilet on…
Review: They don’t allow you to use toilet on coach. This was very stressful.

Title: FlixBus from Chamonix to Geneva. Dangerous Driver
Review: We booked FlixBus from Chamonix in France to Geneva. The driver was dangerous. He started by playing his own loud music whilst smoking, dancing in his unbelted chair and constantly answering his mobile phone. He tried to overtake an articulated lorry on a mountain bend, eventually succeeding much to his pleasure but to the annoyance of his fellow passengers and the driver of the lorry. We headed into a thunderstorm, he had his wipers on full but still couldn’t see. I had to shout out ‘slow down’ before he did so. Other incidents also occurred too numerous to mention, but I recorded most of them. I hope the company contact me and sack him. Use this company at your peril !

Title: First time using Flixbus
Review: First time using Flixbus. Excellent service. Spot on time leaving and arriving despite awful weather conditions. Driver was brilliant. Coach was immaculate.

Title: Excellent service; amazing value for money!
Review: Excellent service, first time used FlixBus and found it to be better than expected. The bus was slightly late coming in which was understandable given the morning rush hour around the city; however, the bus reached its destination before time which was good for me. The driver was professional and courteous. The bus itself was clean and tidy. I kept thinking ’there must be a catch somewhere’, coach tickets can’t be that cheap these days.. but there was no catch! My ticket was excellent value for money. Thank you FlixBus, I would recommend FlixBus to everyone.

Title: Terrible service and outfit
Review: Tried to book a coach trip from Swansea to Gatwick Airport. | It was a nightmare. | Tried to pay with Paypal but it said 'Try again' which I did. Still no tickets | So I tried with my debit card, still nothing only an unsuccessful message. | However when I checked my PayPal account the payment was taken out twice. Also when I checked my bank another payment was taken. | Flixbus apologised and said they would refund the payments in two or three working days, | Terrible service and outfit

Title: Really disappointed with Flixbus
Review: Really disappointed with Flixbus. I’ve been a faithful user for a while now and have always recommended them. However, they have proven to be unhelpful and unreliable in times of crisis. I completely understand that unforeseen delays and cancellations happen, however I’d expected a little more understanding and accommodation to be provided to customers. This most experience has unfortunately ruined their reputation for me.

Title: I should have just taken the train
Review: Bus was 20 minutes late. The fact that you they only do exact change only and don't have card readers for paying onboard is ridiculous.

Title: Great!
Review: I must admit the bus wasn't my first choice but after travelling to Glasgow by train , myself and my daughter found ourselves unable to get back by train to Aberdeen due to Storm Eowyn. So Flix Bus was the best priced option for us and the journey home was perfect. WiFi on the bus allowed me and my daughter to watch shows on our phones / tablets. A toilet was available and my daughter did use it and it looked clean and tidy. Bus driver was very pleasant. Journey took a little longer than the train would have with stops in Stirling, Perth and Dundee but it still arrived at Aberden Bus Station exactly on time! | Would definitely consider Flix Bus again !

Title: Overnight from london to scotland
Review: Comfy reliable bus had a great sleep on the overnight from london to glasgow, price was cheap I'll be using flixbus again highly recommended

Title: On time
Review: On time. Great service and will absolutely use again.

Title: It was efficient and timely
Review: It was efficient and timely

Title: Short notice cancellation
Review: My FlixBus trip from Bristol to London booked several months ago and reconfirmed by FlixBus yesterday was cancelled by FlixBus this morning, roughly 6 hours before trip was due to take place. Reason: ‘circumstances beyond our control’. Poor.

Title: Fabulous service- easy to navigate…
Review: Fabulous service- easy to navigate website and on the ground. Punctual and friendly- 5 stars 🌟 🌟 🌟

Title: Beware of Flixbus Transaction Fees!
Review: Having had our Heathrow airport bus cancelled 30 minutes before departure,we were promised a full refund by Flixbus. I received a message saying that our refund had been processed.Upon checking my bank account I found a transaction £11 less than the agreed refund amount.I contacted Flix and they told me that they were not responsible for any charges imposed by customers' banks in the UK. After researching the company, I found that the refund was sent from Germany and that Flix choose to pass on any international transfer fees to customers.So, if your bus doesn't turn up and you try to get a refund then you'll be charged for it- this is a scam! UK customers are being penalised for Flix choosing to operate from Germany.Beware!!!!

Title: Bus was cancelled 2 consecutive days
Review: Bus was cancelled 2 consecutive days, which is not ideal when you need to be at a location. They would not transfer my ticket to travel from a different destination. |  | I had to get someone to drive me the 120 miles. |  | The reason was lack of drivers!!! Surly they knew that before 4pm when the bus was due to leave at 8.45.

Title: Cleaner than the Megabus!!
Review: A smooth check in for the bus than arrives and leaves on time. |  | Enjoyed the trip up to London but the journey back was not so enjoyable. |  | The driver said that the bus was fully booked so stick to your seating number, then checked for empty seats as he had some people who wanted to be added. He left 3 young girls on who were nothing short of annoying. They got people to change seats so they could sit together, then one played on her phone from London to Newport, where they changed seats, thankfully, but then they refused to move for the person who seats they were in. |  | We pay extra to allocate seats so the drivers should adhere to the seating plans. |  | London to Swansea 25th January 18:30.

Title: Excellent Service at an incredibly low price
Review: This was the 1st time using Flixbus from Bristol to London, & it didn’t disappoint. An excellent service at an incredibly low price. Will definitely be using again.

Title: Great price
Review: Great price. Excellent on time service.Friendly helpful driver. | Easy booking procedure

Title: Brilliant bus service on time no issues…
Review: Brilliant bus service on time no issues and a fair price would definitely use them again

Title: Fantastic experience
Review: Fantastic experience. Travelled from frankfurt airport to heidleberg to watch spurs in sinsheim. Cheap, on time, comfortable coach, professional staff. Will definitely use again .

Title: Decent option for long-distance journeys
Review: I've used Flixbus a number of times for long-distance journeys. I get a lot of perplexed responses from friends ("why don't you just fly/take the train?") but I stand by my decision to travel with Flixbus. I prefer to avoid flying for environmental reasons, and often the journeys I need to make are more expensive and/or more complicated (lots of changes) by train. Flixbus is very easy and convenient, and on a Flixbus -- unlike a train -- you are guaranteed a seat and somewhere to store your luggage! Sure, 15+ hours on a coach (or any form of transport) is never going to be the most fun in the world, but Flixbus make it as tolerable as possible e.g. generally if you are on a long journey there will be at least one short break where you can get out of the bus and stretch your legs etc.. My recent Flixbuses have also been very punctual, arriving if anything a bit early -- never late. My only complaint is that on a recent Flixbus the bus was far too hot for the final few hours of the journey, which made me feel a bit ill -- however, this hasn't generally been a problem, I think they just had the heating turned up a bit high on that particular bus. One thing to bear in mind (for any Flixbus novices!) is that not all of the Flixbus stops have facilities like waiting areas etc.; some of them are just bus stops on the roadside/in a parking lot -- so be careful, if you are planning a journey with a long wait between connections, that you are changing at a location with somewhere safe and comfortable to wait. Also consider time of day (I once had a slightly unpleasant experience changing at Paris Bercy in the early hours of the morning). Several of the Flixbus stops are at actual bus stations or at other public transport stations (rail stations, airports) where you can use the facilities associated with those stations. Frankfurt also now has a nice warm designated Flixbus waiting room (I think a few other buses use it too, mostly Flixbus though) and toilets (costing 1 euro), which I appreciated very much during my recent 6-hour wait between buses at Frankfurt (on a chilly January day and with too much luggage to want to wander far!). All in all -- would recommend.

Title: Just home from an amazing experience…
Review: Just home from an amazing experience tonight and cant thank the driver from the manchester 2.05 bus to glasgow the driver was honestly the most professional driver and his driving was outstanding battled through 90mph winds to get us all home safely and was stuck in a major traffic accident and he assured us all we were getting home. Thank you to whoever you are wish you all the best in your career path.

Title: We were very impressed with the…
Review: We were very impressed with the helpfulness and friendly demeanour of the driver on our bus, the 13.20 from LHR to LGW on 21.01.25. From start to finish he was great. The added bonus was the price of the ticket, it was reasonable compared to say, National Express.

Title: The bus malfunctioned and this is not…
Review: The bus malfunctioned and this is not the first time, something was wrong with breaks. I don’t feel safe at all. There is no Wi-fi, you can’t charge your phone, only false information. As well as seat reservation.

Title: Beware
Review: We've previously used Flixbus in Czechia with great success. However, our attempt at Colmar was appalling. Beware they do not collect passengers from the location they indicate on their ticket (the corner of Place de la Gare and Rue Georges Lasch). Passengers were collected from some other/earlier location. When we saw the coach drive past us, we called customer services, but they were very unhelpful, hid behind their T&C's and refused to offer a full-refund and/or reimbursement for additional travel costs.

Title: First time I've used this service I was…
Review: First time I've used this service I was very satisfied with easy efficient booking app absolutely great value for money comfortable journey each way very efficient on time service with friendly driver id recommend most definitely and I'll continue to use this service

Title: We were just on time but the bus left…
Review: We were just on time but the bus left already a moment before and sat at red light oposite bus stop so it appeared on the firm's tracker as being at the stop at time of booking. We were not believed.

Title: Overall great experience
Review: Easy to book. I got texts updating me when a service was running slightly late. Comfy coaches and great service. Have already booked my next trip!

Title: The driver drives with carefully
Review: The driver drives with carefully, he knows how to talk to customers

Title: One cant take a bus earlier anymore…
Review: One cant take a bus earlier anymore upon arrival at the airport unless at exorbitant costs. A real shame the change of policy not announced anywhere on the app and reason to look into other bus shuttles between grenoble and exupery (Lyon)

Title: was too crowded
Review: was too crowded, too many stops and people coming in and going out. This is unlike the experience i have had with national express or even with Mega bus that has double deck.

Title: So disappointed in this company
Review: So disappointed in this company. Waited for a bus in Glasgow for over an hour only to be advised by a driver on another route “don’t hold your breath!! They’ll likely cancel it” said driver even tried to call himself and got nowhere - and he was an employee! Had no choice but to catch a last minute train at great expense only to be told I’m not even eligible for a refund as the bus did eventually turn up almost 2 hours late and because I didn’t wait it out on the off chance i would be able to get home I get nothing back - despite the fact their own customer service team were unable to update me either when contacted on the status of the bus - never again!

Title: Amazing trip, very comfortable
Review: Easy to deal it was performed by partner company traventuria

Title: The company is heartless
Review: The company is heartless. They abandoned my family including a 15months old baby and a 4 years old boy in the cold in Stoke-on-Trent at 2.15am for their gross incompetence. | I bought a a ticket for adults for about £55 from Trainpal. The child category only spans from 5years to 16years. My kids who are 1year and 4years could not fit into this. | With this fault of theirs, they abandoned my 1year old and 4years old in the thick cold of the night. | I will never use them for anything. They are inhumane.

Title: The customer service is very poor
Review: The customer service is very poor

Title: Great service
Review: Great service prices and options of tunes friendly drivers

Title: Very good will be traveling with you…
Review: Very good will be traveling with you again.

Title: Cool ride Flixbus
Review: Despite the fact that my 5am trip from Newcastle to Edinburgh was delayed by 1hour(I only received one text message at 4:40 telling me the bus was delayed there were no further updates so I was left in the freezing cold not knowing when the bus would actually arrive. When it did the driver was very friendly and we were soon on our way to Edinburgh! The journey itself was pleasant with no further problems. I will definitely be travelling with Flixbus again.

Title: Refused on board a booked coach and refused refund
Review: I booked a one way ticket from Bristol to Gatwick paying extra for a better seat and luggage. I arrived 45 mins early and | sadly the coach was delayed by 30 mins - there was no announcement or Flix staff and I only found out from another passenger who received a text/email. Eventually the bus turned up and we | tried to board but about 8-10 people were refused entry to the bus as the hold was full of luggage - the driver blamed the previous driver and offered no advice other that it isn't his fault and we | cannot get on - again no offers of assistance or staff. The bus drove off and left us? Luckily there was a National Express bus leaving for Gatwick and they had plenty of staff to assist - several from Flix bought tickets and the bus left 30 mins later. On the bus I messaged Flix via their messaging app and after several attempts and discussions I was refused a refund because they said I had checked into the Flixbus? I hadnt even got on the bus? I sent a copy of my National Express ticket recepit and they still claimed I had checked into on the bus and refused any refund. Just to repeat I had not got on the bus as the driver refused entry - Flix has no ground staff, no customer support and refusing a refund given I hadnt even got on the bus is criminal - I would avoid Flix for any important trips and opt for National Express

Title: buses not turning up and had to travel in another coach with out reserved seat
Review: Live update online on info regarding bus cancellation and punctuality, people travel for a reason and an office/help at main station would be handy

Title: I was comfortable
Review: I was comfortable

Title: Ride of over 10 hours to London from Scotland
Review: We did enjoy the ride of over 6 hours however there was a point when picking up passengers that had a bad odor smell, the bus should be equipped with an air freshener since the odor was very strong and the commute was still long. Also the amenities were not quite the same as stated (foods and snacks aren't offered nor is there a toilet onboard)

Title: Fantastic Flixbus Journey
Review: Fantastic bus trip to London and back. On time and comfortable. Ease to get to bus stops from other bus services. Great price as Trains unreliable and expensive. Spent 40 mins in Bristol station last time. Had to be in London by 12:00. Coming back trains cancelled and people had to stand all the way back from London. You don’t expect that for the money they charge. Guaranteed seat on coach and very resonble.

Title: No stars FLIXBUS DRIVER THEFTS
Review: No stars ever! Flixbus Coach Driver left Victoria Station 19th January with one of my bags and drove off! Flixbus say it will take 1 week for me to get my bag back although it is stolen by him with all my equipment. Driver drove off quickly with the bag knowing I was waiting for it and only unloaded my clothes bag after telling the passengers to get off the Coach. Both bags were together. Flixbus told me to wait at Victoria Station for 24 hours until he returned with my equipment bag he has stolen! Flixbus are telling me I have to wait 1 week for them to check the CCTV on the Coach which shows what the Coach Driver has done with my bag and equipment. This is the worst 24 hours of my life!! I cannot do any filming and have had to cancel all bookings and my Course Work is all in the equipment bag and stored on my Camera in the equipment bag. I had travelled from Paris where I filmed for a couple of days. DO NOT USE FLIXBUS THEY WILL ROB YOU AND CLAIM THEIR POLICY TAKES 1 WEEK TO RETURN YOUR LUGGAGE!! Flixbus support the theft of luggage and rely on the Police to investigate their THEFTS instead of their legal obligations to return luggage temporarily handled on their Coach by their Driver who must be arrested for THEFT. The first thing I did was to report the theft to the Police which does not immediately help for my equipment to be returned. It was an orchestrated THEFT by the Coach Driver SUPPORTED BY FLIXBUS WHO ARE TOTALLY UNHELPFUL AND UNACCOUNTABLE. TFL must shut FLIXBUS DOWN and remove their Coach License that authorises FLIXBUS TO STEAL PASSENGERS LUGGAGE AND DISAPPEAR QUICKLY!! STILL NO RESPONSE FROM FLIXBUS 26th JANUARY AND THEY WANT ME TO WAIT 14 DAYS FOR THEM TO INVESTIGATE THEIR THEFT OF MY BAG!!!!

Title: Dangerous Flixbus Driver
Review: I didn't actually use Flixbus, I was unlucky enough to be driving in front of one of their buses in the UK yesterday. | The Flixbus was driving so dangerously, I wouldn't have wanted to be on the Flixbus. I have a picture of how close he was to me, and also a video of him being so close to other cars. | I rang Flixbus, they said they couldn't do anything unless I had booked with them, and I need to report it to the local authority, which I will do and pass along the picture and video. Such aggressive driving for a bus, if I had to slam on my brakes we would of had no chance. I would of have changed lanes, but couldn't of done that either. Shocking driving.

Title: How not to run a coach service.
Review: Provided less than an hour's notice that the bus was going to be over an hour late, with no reason given, which would've made me miss my rail connection, meaning I had to quickly make alternative arrangements.

Title: FlixBus has improved its the best trip…
Review: FlixBus has improved its the best trip I took in Sicily as day trip to athigento and had no problems only it was long as bus stopped at 4 stops on way back over 20 minutes while going it got earlier ! Still it’s the best journey I had in Sicily in 10 days with great wife and very polite good drivers too ! Italian drivers on inter bus are absolutely menacing ! Flix is better than all other three sais ast and interbus ! Bravo

Title: Very Good Experience
Review: Bus arrived at the scheduled time, and journey was seamless. However, at the beginning the driver only opened the bus 3 minutes before we were scheduled to leave, and left us to put our luggage in the carriage compartments ourselves. All in all, a great deal

Title: Avoid flixbus the drivers are vile and disgusting towards passengers
Review: Travelled on the n31 from London to Glasgow last night and the 2 drivers attitudes and obnoxious behavior towards individuals including my son was absolutely disgusting with absolutely no regard for any passenger whatsoever. The way they speak to passengers is vile and disgusting and it's not discreet the way they slag off passengers the whole bus could hear it and the fact they spayed air freshener after passengers had literally just walked off the bus and was not done discreet whatsoever. This was our 1st time using flixbus and certainly will never use again or recommend anyone use their services the vile and disgusting behaviour of your drivers is totally unacceptable and nobody should have to suffer their vileness telling passengers they were annoying and total contempt towards passengers

Title: Avoid. Don’t reserve seats!
Review: Bus arrived late, meaning the driver was already in a bad mood. Was told “there is no reserved seating. Just sit anywhere what’s the problem.” Problem is I paid for a specific seat. | Drive stopped along the route with no announcements. Then swapped driver, he was worse at making announcements, several people missed their stops because announcements weren’t made.

Title: Would not recommend
Review: The bus was on time and we also arrived on time. However, it was uncomfortably hot to the point where myself and several other passengers were unwell due to the heat. The toilet was overflowing with brown water and the whole seat and bowl was stained and no toilet paper was provided and the sink was over flowing with brown water, it was completely unusable. Luckily our journey was only 2.45hrs but if it had been longer I do not know what we would have done. The driver stopped at a service station to use the bathroom but did not offer anyone else the chance to exit the bus. The seat arrangement was okay but many passengers argued over their seats and whether they were correctly chosen. No plug sockets worked either, some were completely ripped from the wall.

Title: Would not recommend
Review: Sent to the wrong gate, made it back to correct gate prior to departure but refused entry. Told to wait one hour for the next one and then was denied entry even with valid ticket and 10 empty seats on the coach. Ended up spending £75 extra on train travel I was trying to avoid. Their rep was rude and dismissive and hid for most of the time. Awaiting full refund and reimbursement for additional travel

Title: Very good service
Review: Very good service, keep on going :))

Title: Cheap direct punctual
Review: Cheap direct punctual

Title: Excellent
Review: Nice, comfy, punctual and cheap. Only thing is drivers must pay attention to heating it is way too strong regardless of the weather conditions outside. This is a liability issue, people may ask for refunds or even worse someone may end up burned.

Title: I had a TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE yesterday…
Review: I had a TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE yesterday 16-01-2025. I was scheduled to travel from Amsterdam Sloterdijk to Odense Denmark. The time in my ticket says 20:55. I was at the station by 20:30. I waited for almost more than 3 hours in the cold. I asked all the drivers and none of them knew anything about my trip. I checked my email and my mobile to see if FlixBus sends me reason(s) for the long delay but I didn't get anything. I finally left the Amsterdam Sloterdijk after waiting for so long. |  | This morning, i went back to FlixBus office in station Sloterdijk. After giving my details (3215469856) to the receptionist, i was surprised when the lady told me that my bus never came. She said my trip was cancelled. My trip was cancelled without any information and i got sick in the cold while waiting for cancelled trip. |  | FlixBus made me miss my brother's Wedding in Denmark. I don't want to talk about other damages I experienced. I just hope that I recover from the cold.

Title: I did the route London x Edinburgh…
Review: I did the route London x Edinburgh overnight and the bus driver didn’t turn off the lights, just changed to a red light terrible to sleep. I suggest to turn off to leave the passengers sleep a little bit and change the settings of the last seats, that is 5 seats together, for a short trip is ok, but for a long 8 hours trip is TERRIBLE!

Title: 80' delay
Review: 80' delay. Not allowed to use different bus with the same ticket

Title: Flix the way forward...
Review: Excellent driver driving with utmost safety.. |  | Comfy service from Gatwick to Bristol and brilliant WiFi too...nice job. | Will see you again soon.

Title: Flixbus cancelled our return journey…
Review: Flixbus cancelled our return journey within five minutes of the departure time. They then offered us a little over half the refund amount for that single journey and used a combination of exchange rates and unhelpful terms and conditions to justify their meagre return. Thanks to the incompetence we were forced to spend far more on a last minute bus with a different company in order to get home. The total return journey including the refund amount which we had anticipated but not received came to four times the amount that the initial journey should have cost. Their feedback and complaint system was unhelpful, unsympathetic and formulaic. Won't use again.

Title: CARDIFF BUS STOP....LOCATION A BIT OF A…
Review: CARDIFF BUS STOP....LOCATION A BIT OF A NIGHMARE...

Title: Great overall service
Review: Great lighting | Comfortable seats | On board loo | Friendly and considerate drivers

Title: Total lack of passenger information.
Review: I booked to travel with Flixbus from Inverness to Edinburgh on the 16.20 yesterday. The bus did not appear, there was no information, and I had to change my plans and travel with Citilink. | I will not be back!

Title: Departed late. Arrived destination 1 hour late
Review: Departed late. Finished trip1 hour late . Shit service. Worst experience

Title: Flix bus. London victoria coach to nottingham
Review: A clean coach | The drivers very clean and presentable | Good routes especially in mornings | Central drop of | Prices reasonable | I have used flix bus to various destinations. I found London flix bus to Belgium 🇧🇪 good as a few drop of and all near tubes and trains | I am well travelled in UK and abroad.

Title: On time
Review: On time. No hassle. Sat in pre allocated seats. Peaceful journey. Was kept informed in advance of all stops. Thank you FlixBus.

Title: If your bus is delayed and you’re given…
Review: If your bus is delayed and you’re given a new departure time wait at the bus stop anyway. I went to the look 15 mins before the new departure time when I came back the bus had been and gone! And no way of getting on another without buying a new ticket.

Title: DONT USE THIS INCOMPETENT COMPANY THEY…
Review: DONT USE THIS INCOMPETENT COMPANY THEY DONT CARE THE SECOND YOU GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY!! MAING US 3 HOIRS LATE FOR A SIMPLE 4 HOUR JOURNEY THAT COST 100S MORE IN HAVING TO UY MORE PLANE TICKEKS,NO COMMUNICATION AT ANY POUNT ON THE WAY,NO APOLOGY UPON ARRIVING LATE, AND ALL 35 PEOPLE ON THAT BUS ALL MISSED THEIR FLIGHTS TOO, AND THE RESPONSE FRON THIS APPAULING COMPANY IS "BUT WE STILL GOT YOU THERE SO WE DONT GIVE 2 DAMS" DISGUSTING COMPLANY

Title: Bus sailed past without stopping to pick up.
Review: I booked a LHR - LGW transfer. The bus was late, but that is understandable, However, the bus sailed past the stop at LHR, forcing me to rush to gat a ticket with an alternative carrier (which happily just worked for time). The Flixbus process to complain and get refunded is (evidently deliberately) essentially impossible.

Title: Very good service and good value for money.
Review: Very comfortable. Good driving. Good price. Everything went smooth. Very good service in general.

Title: The coach was very cleathe coach was very clean n and…
Review: The coach was very clean and comfortable the driver was very helpful and friendly the only problem we had was that when we booked our seats we had 4a and 4b they had more leg room and a few day before are trip you changed are seats to 11a and 11b I would like to no the reason why that happened but apart from that it was a great experience with flixbus we would book with you again hope for your reply many thanks paul

Title: Comfortable warm journey
Review: Comfortable warm journey

Title: Excellent service at an affordable…
Review: Excellent service at an affordable price. | Leg room is on the small side for a 4hr journey but time to stretch legs during stops

Title: Turned up on time
Review: Turned up on time |  | Driver helpful and friendly

Title: The company sold me unavailable seats.
Was supposed to arrive in nottingham at…
Review: Was supposed to arrive in nottingham at 9 pm. IT'S 12 AM NOW!!!!

Title: Refused my refund due to bus not turning up
Review: Refusing to give a refund due to the bus not even turning up looked at the tracker and was not there turned around and continued didn’t even make it to the station poor, not riding with them again…

Title: Flix bus
Review: Comfy seats,,charger points actually worked and good value

Title: Nice journey
Review: Nice journey

Title: Quick easy affordable online booking
Review: Quick easy online booking. Good pickup point. Best price compared to other coach companies. Friendly staff/driver. Comfortable seats, smooth ride. Thank you for a wonderful experience.

Title: Horrific experience!
Review: Horrific! Use with absolute caution. This company have an inability to operate a reliable service. Received an email informing of a cancelled service at midnight. Woke to find this email and took the option of opting for a free of charge change to another scheduled service…only to find after making a journey to the nearest city that the service was delayed for over an hour - only received an email 20 minutes before! Called the customer service number and after eventually reaching a human being who took a few details, I was put on hold for so long that I incurred a huge phone bill for the privilege…and was cut off before even hearing back from the customer service agent. Absolutely disgraceful service and very costly. Trying to do my bit for the climate by using public transport and it’s completely unreliable and costly.

Title: Brilliant Service
Review: Used Flix all day - really enjoyed the experience - my nephew Saif said it was the best service he received in recent memory. Keep up the good work. Will definitely recommend and will be using your services again. 10/10

Title: Their customer service blows
Review: The customer service sucks, for a company that’s trying to build a clientele, they suck at helping people

Title: I plan to go to Birmingham from London…
Review: I plan to go to Birmingham from London Victoria on Saturday the 11th January 2025 @ 9.00 am, but I got information the coach got cancelled, all my plan got ruined and my niece birthday celebrations got devastated and she was flying back to middle East and she left.... I am disappointed and heart broken

Title: Flix bus has now become my alternative to trains!! 👍
Review: My Train from Coimbra to Porto airport was cancelled so as an alternative way to get there I chose Flix Bus, ticked all the boxes, Punctual, friendly helpful driver, no changing, board the bus and relax, great pick up and drop off space and great value, I then booked them again for my return journey. | Next time I travel if there is a opportunity to use Flix bus again I will definitely be using it!

Title: Punctual service
Review: Punctual service, friendly driver, clean bus, wifi on board

Title: Excellent Service
Review: I've used the Flix Bus a few times in the past, great prices and always booked two seats for more space, I'd recommend it and use it again.

Title: Reasonable pricing
Review: Reasonable pricing. The driving was smooth safe and satisfying.

Title: Dirty
Review: Dirty, unfriendly driver, seat reservation I paid for couldn't be used.

Title: Intimidating, brute, rude DRIVERS ( couple )
Review: Unfortunately I have to give this feedback to prevent future incidents. | Trip from Rotterdam to London - 20/4/24 - 8:40AM. |  | At least one of the drivers “must” know a proper English to support, and deal with the passengers matters in a polite and civilised way. |  | Started with the long delayed bus okay, my luggage weight 22kg, the Driver /big guy said in Polish something, ( I asked - In English pls) after the other Lady Driver said pay online. | I did purchase the luggage on line but no code of confirmation was received on my email so they’re very ungry/to wait. So they’re came up with “cash”? I said yes I have cash, paid €5 and of we’re go. |  | During the trip one of the stops, don’t really know where in Belgium, I was resting my kneee on the seat, the lady driver came allong doing the count down and slapped my leg out of the seat shouting/ cursing in Polish. ( I said, that she could asked politely) she was even more angry, carry on shouting in Polish and calling the other driver (big guy) that came up shouting/screaming/ forcing, pushing my legs down, and intimidating in Polish (only understandable word “ticket”), I said: What ticket? ??? | In English pls? | He Carried on screaming/ shouting in Polish and I believe that he was threatening me to take me out of the bus. |  | My 15th yrs old daughter where right next to me, she fell very scared and begged me no to say anything back to them. So, I did not spoke and were carried on the trip after 10 min or so. |  | I realised that there were a couple wile waiting for the heads up to get to the ferry, she was leaning on him exchanging kisses and hugs by the steering wheel. | A bit strange and unprofessional… |  | Never experienced nothing similar before it’s not the 1st time travellinf with Flixbus. |  | I believe that should be appropriate approached from the drivers. | Not intimidating, screaming and yelling specifically in a foreign language and not to mentioned physic contact.

Title: Really good
Review: Really good. First time user. Very comfortable, all facilities working great, on time... what more could you want?

Title: Excellent service
Review: Although the departure was delayed, the bus made up time and arrived 10 minutes early. Efficient service

Title: Go to National Express instead.
Review: Go to National Express! Poor service. Return coach cancelled and rearranged for 1 hour later, then delayed again another 15minutes. Then a Newport City Coach (if you can call it that) turned up. No toilet (some people are on here for 4 hours) no WiFi, no charging ports overhead spot lights won't turn off, seats won't come out of recline position. Absolute shambles.

Title: Flixbus changed out times.
Review: We got an email to say the bus operator had changed the times and the new times no longer suited us. No option to cancel with full refund even though the changes were outwith our control. When I contacted Flixbus I was cut off twice and they blamed the bus company. I contacted the bus company who said the bus was running as scheduled. Funny enough we were able to book directly with them and got on our originally planned bus with no issue whatsoever so why did Flixbus tell me the times had changed?! Not impressed and 2 return bus tickets went to waste.

Title: This company are happy to provide poor
Review: This company are happy to provide poor, poor, customer service. We tried to change a date on a ticket we had paid for and they wanted £35 extra payment!! Then when I tried to cancel they would only offer a voucher for £17 less than half of the original ticket price. I phoned their Germany head office and was recited their policy with no understanding of my situation!! So the hint here is read everything in their policies to ensure you don't go against them before you book.

Title: First-time passenger
Review: My experience on the bus was very good. The drivers (there was a changeover) were very polite and friendly. The bus was on time. Inside the bus was clean. Adequate legroom. There were plug sockets and USB charging points for phones, tablets, etc. It was a very smooth ride. The fare was very affordable compared to leading competitors. I will recommend Flixbus to friends and family. | Please note I am not Luftansa passenger, I don't know why the trust pilot review has defaulted to that and not just my review. Can this be corrected please?

Title: Avoid FlixBus
Review: Received a text at 1am in the morning to advise the bus scheduled to leave at 8.55am has been cancelled. If phone had been on silent would have missed text and not had time to make alternative arrangements, which would have resulted in missing a flight. Worst service ever.. would not recommend.

Title: Very clean bus also on time no delays
Review: Very clean bus also on time no delays, driver very good and friendly

Title: Excellent service
Review: Excellent service. Good value of money. | However there was no charging system on the bus.

Title: EXCELLENT SERVICE
Review: on time, very reasonably priced, comfy bus and helpful bus driver.

Title: Porto to Vigo - how easy was that
Review: I made a recent journey from Porto to Vigo using Flixbus. The booking process was easy, the price was fantastic, finding the departure point outside Porto airport was a doddle and the journey itself was very nice. I will definitely use Flixbus again on my next Vigo trip. Highly recommendable

Title: Had a comfortable and safe journey.
Comfortable seats driver kept people…
Review: Comfortable seats driver kept people informed when stopping at the destination

Title: First and last time I booked a trip…
Review: First and last time I booked a trip with this company.

Title: Coach was comfortable
Review: Coach was comfortable. Driver was & clear with his announcements. He got us there on time.

Title: Absolutely appalling service....
Review: Absolutely appalling service - we were left stranded in minus 5 degrees as the coach was full, despite us paying and reserving seats. The coach had been booked to get to Heathrow airport for a flight - we had to pay for a taxi at 4am along with several other passengers to ensure we got to the airport on time. The customer service were not interested in trying to help provide a solution and the driver told us this was the third time it had happened! Disgusting service all round - the driver closed the coach door in our faces and drove off - not his problem!

Title: Very reasonable price and on time
Unfriendly staff and rude customer service
Review: If customer concerns are not addressed, and staff fail to be friendly and helpful—particularly when dealing with travelers arriving from an airport who are likely to be extremely tired—it could ultimately lead to a loss of business and jobs.

Title: They are simply pretender to the throne without any eligibility/credibility.
Review: Everything from A to Z went wrong with my journey with FlixBus. Despite reading negative and below par rating online, I was too cocky that those experiences would definitely have to be in minority but to my nightmares of nightmare it was just a reality that I was not willing to accept as I chose them over others. | Customer Service: | Their customer service is people pleaser rather than making things happen, would just say random things out of prompt to make user like they are heard while actually ignoring them at all. | I do not particularly blame drivers as they are under staffed and over worked while constatntly facing barges of tourist that do not understand their lingo and the company puts the whole responsisbilty upon that hapelss driver. |  | Business model: | This is my personal opinion, that their sole business model is based upon one time transcation model which is highlighted by the next to non-existing service provided by them.I am baffled by their outrageously low service provided by them and still existing in the market.They are not designed for long journeys especially for night journeys as their bus stops at their will and in very unevenly times to take customer bladder and bowel movements into accounts.

Title: my reserved seat was occupied and the…
Review: my reserved seat was occupied and the driver would not move the person sitting in it. it was total "free for all" madness boarding the coach people just sat anywhere. no clear "reserved" notices on seat and no clear indications of seat numbers, a total farce of a journey

Title: Just book the tickets n travel peacefully
Review: No issues , happy travelling

Title: Great method of transport
Review: Great method of transport, simple instructions and updates to journey received via text and email. Bus was nice and clean and overall pleasant journey. Would recommend and use again.

Title: Always arrives late and they never tell…
Review: Always arrives late and they never tell you they will arrive late.ontop of that they take long breaks at service half hr. Every time.ive used the bus they take half hr break and we arrive half late or 1 hr late

Title: Friendly driver
Review: Friendly driver | Ike drove Smoothy

Title: Bus delayed 4 hours in the middle of…
Review: Bus delayed 4 hours in the middle of France no notification from driver no compensation offered I wanna stress DO NOT TRAVEL WITH FLIXBUS

Title: I wanted to give this service zero…
Review: I wanted to give this service zero stars, but that's not an option. The service is horrible, and I recommend avoiding it as much as possible. The bus drivers are rude and unwilling to provide any information to customers. Additionally, the bus stops and pick-up points are incorrect, which is especially problematic for tourists who are unfamiliar with the area.

Title: Smooth journey
Review: Excellent service, 2 friendly drivers. Comfortable seating, toilet in board

Title: The bus was around 4h late to the…
Review: The bus was around 4h late to the destination which meant I had lost the train ticked I had already paid for. There was no additional information from the driver along the way about the delay either. And when I asked I was informed since I took the bus I am not eligible for any compensation. Drivers also didn’t seem very friendly and before departure form each stop no one counted the passengers. Additionally the toilet was locked for the remaining 2h of the journey so no one could use the lavatories. I was also told I should put my backpack in the luggage compartment and it was lost. Overall i would say use any other means of transport you have.

Title: Watch out!! Flixbuss drivers are putting baggage out themselves, and without any logic you can arrive at your destination either Your bag already been thrown out in some of previous stops!!
Review: Driver throw out my bagage in some of previous stops. He checked my ticket, then directly took my bag from my hands, putted in bus. And later told that he putted it out in other stop and takes no responsibility. Then don’t touch my stuff in first place!!! Let the people take their baggage!!

Title: I took the bus from Leicester to…
Review: I took the bus from Leicester to London, with my family and I hed followed all the safety rules and all the co concerned in to the journey, but the driver abuse us with saying that we are to loud to sit in front row, because I am brown and the driver was white, so I left that bus with my family at 10 pm in night, and I have to trouble a lot so I highly recommend to all the pecengers to not book your rides with this company😡😡😡

Title: Fantastic driver
Review: On my journey this morning from Inverness to Perth the driver was absolutely excellent, aswell as being a fantastic driver ge was so professional. Took a few minutes before the journey to explain safety measures but also explained that due to weather conditions he wasn't sure what we would face ahead but reassured passengers that we we're in good hands and that just made all the difference. Thank you

Title: Trip from Paris to Mont Saint Abbey
Review: The ride is pleasant, but I might recommend people to stay at the Abbey area for 1 night for better experience as the ride is 5 hours long from Paris to Mont Saint Abbey

Title: Trip
Review: Great all round

Title: Good
Review: Very good trip, thank you

Title: We missed the bus because it was early, but were not notified.
Review: Please notify the customer in case the bus is delayed or early. We unfortunately missed the bus, because it was 15 minutes early. I often checked the app for news, but it was not until the very last moment that I noticed that the bus would arrive early. We were 10 minutes beforehand the original departure at the stop, but the bus had left 4 minutes earlier.

Title: No wifi, significant delay in EU
Review: No wifi, 6h delay, it was big mistake to travel by bus between cities, my seat was taken by someone else, avoid and take car or plane

Title: Great bus
Review: Great bus, one of the best I’ve used tbh

Title: Cancellation rubbishwas more expensive than…
Review: Cancellation was more expensive than the actual ride nearly

Title: Delayed twice!!
Review: Delayed twice!!! Bus got broken, toilet doesn’t work, now I-fi - I have missed my two next buses and delay made me miss my medical operation!!! How can Flix bus service be trusted? Don’t recommend, as it is always late and buses are not repaid at all

Title: Aarhus
Review: Aarhus - London, from Aarhus - Hamburg bus was nicer, the one from Hamburg to Paris was dirty, the seats and tables were dirty. Sitting next to a stinking toilet, that had not been clean was rather unpleasant. The heating was not on or turned down, it was cold. there was no working wifi, Seats were like sitting on a rock and trying to sleep. I ended up getting off in Paris and paying for a train ticket. The bare thought of sitting 9 more hr, in a cold bus, made me want to cry.

Title: The reason It’s cheap is because it’s…
Review: The reason It’s cheap is because it’s not a great service unlike Nat exp it feels cheap the seats are uncomfortable for long journeys the drivers are rude and unhappy not welcoming the usb slots old the trays dirty and won’t hold anything it all slides off no holes for bottles the return trip is a week away …why? The suspension is bad as they are cheap coaches harsh driver braking | The only upside is it’s cheap very cheap | Would give them another try if I could actually find one available as in Cornwall FlixBus doesn’t exist yet

Title: Happy Kind and Safe driver
Review: 11am victoria London to Bristol on January 2nd, had the most pleasant, cheerful and kind driver. It made a trip we weren't looking forward too, enjoyable. A good start to the year. Sad I can't remember his name. The coach was comfy, warm and even had a quick toilet break at services. This made a huge difference.

Title: DREADFUL SERVICE FROM FLIXBUS
Review: We were on our way to the bus stop in Cardiff when 1 hour before we were due to leave for Gatwick Airport we received a text to say the bus was cancelled. Without any other means to reach our destination we had no other alternative but to return home and go by car. Luckily, we arrived in enough time to catch our flight but the inconvenience, stress and additional expense left a very nasty taste.

Title: I booked my 17 year old a ticket from…
Review: I booked my 17 year old a ticket from Manchester back home to Newcastle and the driver was very abrupt and made his trip home not very pleasant which is no good. This should of been a very nice journey home but my son felt quite intimidated by the drivers manners.

Title: Booked 2 coach tickets in advance from…
Review: Booked 2 coach tickets in advance from Bristol to Heathrow for flight to India. 2hrs before coach due to leave l got an email/text saying 'coach cancelled' no other explanation, customer service closed on Sunday. Alternative coaches either fully booked or wrong timing for flight. Very disappointing Flexibus.

Title: I’m still confused and frustrated
Review: I’m still confused and frustrated. I booked tickets and reserved my seats, but it seems your system didn’t actually reserve them. Even though I have proof of the reservation, I wasn’t charged for the seats. This experience has been very disappointing. I think I’ll stick with your competitor from now on—at least when I | book and reserve seats with them, the process is straightforward and honored without any problems. I also complained about your driver wearing earphones while driving. This raised serious safety concerns for me and other passengers. Furthermore, the temperature on the coach was uncomfortably high, and despite my request to the driver, the air-conditioning was not turned on.

Title: Flixbus cancel buses and do not care about passengers.
Review: Had a booking for the 10:10 Perth bro den to Edinburgh bus station 05/01/25. | Received a message posted at 01:05 cancelling the bus .picked message up 09:00. | No time to rebook as I had firm arrangements made. | I never thought a company could be worse than megabus but how wrong I was. | Obviously think because they have seen of megabus over the border they can let down passengers in Scotland now. | Thanks for nothing.

Title: Nice trip from Stevenage to London
Review: Nice trip from Stevenage to London

Title: Bus on time very clean driver polite…
Review: Bus on time very clean driver polite experience good

Title: Missed the FlixBus back from Bristol to…
Review: Missed the FlixBus back from Bristol to Cardiff. We were looking for it in the snow with my 82 year old mum who was in an assistance wheelchair because she has a heart problem, but couldn’t find it because it was unbranded. Finally spotted the coach as it was pulling out of the bus park. Had to travel by bus and train instead.

Title: Flix gets you there
Review: Bus was on time, no issue in finding our seats, which were comfy. Bus was clean and modern and temperature just right on it. Driver was friendly and approachable and enjoyed playing a good selection of music during our trip. Will definitely travel with Flix again!

Title: Very friendly and professional drivers…
Review: Very friendly and professional drivers and very cheap from Scotland to England. I use FlixBus a lot so I highly recommend theses.

Title: The bus was very comfortable and very…
Review: The bus was very comfortable and very warm | I felt asleep | The driver was also very good | I recommended it

Title: Both drivers were absolutely…
Review: Both drivers were absolutely outstanding! They were not only professional but also very friendly and entertaining throughout the journey. Their excellent service made the experience truly enjoyable, and I would highly recommend them to anyone.

Title: Please fix seat assignment issue
Review: Huge negative: it's always messy with seats assignment in the Flixbus UK. My experience all the times I am using it: I have seat assigned , someone is already sitting there, they say that somebody was seating on their seat so they took another one. They suggest I take another one. Ok, I actually don't mind (as I didn't book the seat it was just assigned to me), I take another one only to have someone coming to me minutes later and claim it is their seat. It is a really bumpy start to be honest! |  | To avoid that I'd suggest to clearly mark each reserved seat as "reserved" (where people paid for that) so that people would not sit there, and keep the rest unassigned. It seem to work for National Express. |  | If not that issue above, I'd put 5, as otherwise the bus itself is nice and clean and the driver is polite, schedules are good etc. Just please fix the seating problem!

Title: No point paying for a reserved seat
Review: I also paid for the seat next to me so i could travel but the driver insisted someone sat there. Not happy.

Title: Left stranded with no other option available
Review: It is one of the most economical but worst bus service I’ve travelled with. I travelled with them multiple times and every time the bus was either delayed or cancelled. I stopped with them after I got stranded at a station as their bus was cancelled couple of hours before the travel and there was no other option available as it was holidays. Never gonna take any more chances with them just to save couple of bucks. Their service is absolute nightmare!

Title: Reasonably priced, fast and reliable travel
Review: Bus arrived on time, speedy luggage packing, friendly drivers, fast and reliable service. Would definitely use again

Title: The coach arrived 30 min late and there…
Review: The coach arrived 30 min late and there was no updates as passengers waited in the cold. |  | The coach driver's assistant was excessively rude to passengers both on the ground and also on board the coach. He was condescending and verged on bullying passengers. One of my worst experiences and many passengers were complaining.

Title: Smooth drive from A to B .
