Review: I had an excellent ride from Geneva - Courmayeur. Bus on time, driver driver safely , bus was comfortable, and the price is unbeatable. I can only recommend it !

Title: Fantastic bus journey experience
Review: The bus journey was exceptionally pleasant. The bus was right on time, impeccably clean, and well-maintained. The driver was very kind and helped us with our luggage, adding to the overall positive experience. Highly recommend!

Title: It was very nice and the driver was…
Review: It was very nice and the driver was very friendly and nice!

Title: A truly terrible company - left my wife and kids stranded
Review: A truly terrible company, my wife who was travelling with out two toddler kids got denied access to the coach for not having a car seat with her. This is absolutely ridiculous. Who brings a car seat with them for a coach journey. The bus driver was incredibly rude and the left my family stranded in the dead of night!!! Avoid this company at all costs.

Title: Complaint Regarding Unacceptable Behavior of FlixBus Driver on Route 807 on December 28
Review: Subject: Urgent: Complaint Regarding Unacceptable Behavior of FlixBus Driver on Route 807 |  | Dear FlixBus Customer Service, |  | I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally file a complaint regarding an incident that occurred on your bus, Route 807, traveling from Brussels Gare du Midi to Paris Bercy Seine on December 28th at 11:40AM |  | During the journey, I witnessed a deeply upsetting and disturbing incident involving one of your drivers. The issue stemmed from the fact that my traveling companion and I were unable to purchase a ticket for a 1-year-old child, as your system does not allow tickets for children of that age, and there was no option to add her to our existing tickets. Despite this, the driver refused to allow the child to board the bus and insisted that she could not travel. |  | We then purchased a ticket for an adult to cover the child, but the driver still refused to let us board. In an incredibly inappropriate and aggressive manner, the driver physically pushed the mother, who was holding the 1-year-old, off the bus. This behavior was completely unacceptable, and we were left feeling shocked and distressed by the situation. |  | This treatment was not only rude but also highly discriminatory and harmful. No passenger should ever experience such behavior, especially when traveling with a young child. I am deeply concerned about the safety and customer service standards of FlixBus, as this incident clearly shows a failure to uphold basic dignity and respect for your passengers. |  | I urge you to investigate this matter thoroughly and take the necessary action against the driver involved. It is crucial that FlixBus ensures its staff is properly trained to handle sensitive situations and that all passengers, regardless of their age, are treated fairly and with respect. |  | Please confirm that you have received this complaint and let me know the steps you plan to take to address the issue. I also appreciate any information you can provide regarding the investigation process. |  | Thank you for your attention to this serious matter. I look forward to your prompt response. |  | Kind regards, | Jeneva

Title: There price are good
Review: There price are good, the drivers are polite the set was Comfortable, it left on time and arrived early, and the WiFi worked well

Title: Better than national express.
Review: Simply it was superb as compare to national express. Seats are way more comfortable as compare to national express.

Title: Bus cancelled but rebooked an hour later
Review: Although our bus we bus was cancelled and advised five minutes after the bus was supposed to depart we easily rebooked fir an hour later , all in all good value for money

Title: Not cheap but worse
Review: The worst service to use. The bus driver was literally shouting at the passengers. My return journey that night was delayed over 140 minutes and had to stand in the freezing cold as shelter at the stop. I contacted customer services the next day for delays compensation and was shrugged off as the journey took place even it was delayed. Will never be using FluxBus again :(

Title: Horrible
Review: Horrible! We were waiting during 1hour at -7 degrees, under the snow. With no answers, not comunication and final y the bus was cancelled with no explanation. We have to take a flight so it costs us 300 pounds of taxi

Title: Very cheap service
Review: Very cheap service

Title: Shit bus
Review: I just can't believe this. | They kept on delaying the bus timings until they cancelled the whole journey. Ruined my Christmas. Shame on you flixbus. Bullshitbus.

Title: Very poor service
Review: Very poor service. Couldn’t find their right stop as Sat Nav took my uber to another stop and I was there waiting. Called the customer care and said my bus already left at the stop. I was stranded as it was an evening bus. Had to take another uber to get to National | Express for another ticket

Title: The company has the best drivers I…
Review: The company has the best drivers I can't forget the one that gave us snacks and motivated everyone to believe in ourselves | Thank you

Title: Superb service
Review: Superb service, to be highly recommended!

Title: Great Trip
Review: What a superb company to travel with, plenty of times, clean and comfortable bus, friendly driver, so cheap. | Mould definitely recommend

Title: Had a bus booked for 2 adults and 2…
Review: Had a bus booked for 2 adults and 2 children dated 31.12.2024. Bus was due to leave Dundee at 9.55 to travel to Glasgow. Received a text message at 7.04 to say bus was cancelled and to reschedule a new bus for free. This was done between 7.30 and 8am. Got a new bus booked for 9.25 and Family of 4 stood at the bus stop waiting from 9am. Came to 9.25 and no bus arrives that says Glasgow only Edinburgh. I had checked my email for the new booking number and spoke with a driver who told me this wasn’t our bus so we didn’t get onit. We stood waiting for a further 45 minutes before an Aberdeen bus arrived, then spoke with that bus driver who told me not to worry as I was panicking with it being my daughters 11th birthday , to contact flix customer service, tried to do this but the price of the call was scandalous so used the app and got connected to an agent named janine or Janet, who said she would help. Came back 3 minutes later and told me , no refund, no getting put on the next bus unless I pay again, I then proceed to tell her , I’ve been waiting over an hour for a bus , I was 25 minutes early , I’m stranded with 2 kids can someone help me as this is no fault of mine, got told no. So basically to put it into one, the original bus was cancelled, the one that did arrive was infact my bus but the driver told me it wasn’t, so how is that my fault? And why am I now out of pocket? Wasn’t the only person either. When I spoke with the agent I also told her there is several others who haven’t got that bus as I spoke with passengers who all said the same thing to be told ‘ they all made it on the bus ‘ even tho I stood there for a further 45 minutes waiting. Honestly , this isn’t the first time I have used flix bus , anytime I have in the past there hasn’t been an issue but after this I won’t be using this service and I don’t want others to either , because if anything goes wrong and your in a situation like me where I didn’t have the extra money to book another bus esp with young children , on there birthday too! I would hate for this to happen to anyone else.

Title: Great journey
Review: Everything went without a hitch. Great storage on board, comfortable, and lights out at night. Great internet to boot. 5 stars!

Title: Appalling service
Review: Appalling service when I left my luggage on a coach to Bradford . I spent the entire weekend trying to get back my luggage when I was travelling to another city. Customer service advisors were no help.1 advisor disconnected my call after telling me we are going round in circles the other 3 gave same robotic response to advise it will take up to 14 days to get my suitcase back.

Title: Easy ride
Review: Very punctual and clean bus. Used flixbus from Prague to Teplice

Title: terrible bus driver
Review: terrible bus driver showed antisocial and aggressive behaviours towards me and other passengers. never use this company again.

Title: Ciise saved us from rejected valid ticket!
Review: It would be 1-star review if it wasn’t for Ciise!! This guy saved our trip! Appreciate it! |  | Flixbus converted a simple trip to a terrible and stressful experience. My girlfriend and I, had booked 2 tickets, London to Leeds and back for Christmas eve, months ago, due to the probable high demand on that day. | When we arrived for the outbound, the driver told us the our QR code is not valid and we do not have seats in that bus, believing we were mistaken. So the bus driver and the manager there did not let us in and our bus left without us!! | As it turned out, the tickets were correct and flixbus had cancelled our tickets without any notice or refund (!!!) due to some station name change or system problem, I dont know. So imagine, we had booked and paid probably first of all the passengers of the bus and finally we were the only ones without tickets and staying without bus in Christmas eve!! Imagine the stress, the frustration and the injustice of this situation, without having done anything wrong. It was a clear theft and then ignorance from flixbus. | At that point we couldn’t do anything, but fortunately we explained the situation to the manager (probably), who was Ciise, he understood that we were right and acted quickly after understanding the issue. He talked to the bus driver who had already left and agreed that he would wait for us on a next stop where we found him using the subway after 40 minutes! It was a stressful and tiring experience, but at least we managed to find the bus and hop on (without having actual seats, but seating where other previous guys left!)) reaching our destination on time fortunately, thanks to Ciise who arranged the whole thing! | He also updated our inbound tickets without any extra cost, because if we had to wait for flixbus support…we would be still there! And he did all that on Christmas day! Thank you Ciise! |  | We have been using flixbus for a lot of trips and we have never faced or expected a situation like that from a trusted company like that. We didn’t expect either to be dependent on one man’s good will. | Of course we will ask for a refund and hope such a situation doesn’t happen ever again to us or anyone else.

Title: Flixbus Review: A Journey of Disappointment
Review: I had high expectations for my trip with Flixbus, but unfortunately, the experience was far from pleasant. The advertised amenities, particularly the Wi-Fi, were one of the main reasons I chose this service. However, at the last minute, the bus was swapped with a subpar one. | The replacement bus was dreadful: | No Wi-Fi, as promised. | Uncomfortable seats that made the journey a literal pain. | The entire bus smelled unpleasant, which added to the discomfort. | To make matters worse, the trip was significantly delayed due to a collision on the road. While I understand that traffic incidents are beyond the company's control, the lack of promised amenities and the poor condition of the bus made the delay unbearable. | Flixbus should ensure that their services meet the advertised standards, even in cases of last-minute changes. This experience has made me think twice about booking with them again

Title: Best option to travel around Portugal
Review: Best option to travel around Portugal. Safe, very comfortable, good Internet, good price. Don't need to worry about GPS, losing exits, paying tolls and road taxes... my first option from now on. | *just one concern. During long trips toilet is a problem. Something they can work on. They have WC on board but not all drivers like to give the keys.

Title: Get the National Express coach or a train
Review: Get a load of this. Coach was supposed to arrive at 13:40hrs. At 14:00hrs, the coach is a no show. I check live updates and it’s apparently already left. I speak to customer service and they tell me that it left at 13:41hrs and all passengers are on board. There’s about 7 passengers with me and they said they didn’t get the same coach. Mind you I was at that stop from 13:20hrs. So unless I’m blind or that coach was powered by superman, I didn’t see shit. They refused to refund my ticket and customer service had the cheek to say “Have a nice trip” like I’m supposed to abracadabra to my destination.

Title: Great service at an unbeatable price
Review: Great service at an unbeatable price. Driver between Edinburgh and Glasgow worked to accommodate us on an earlier coach. Excellent customer service 👍👍👍!

Title: Great service
Review: Great service, comfortable coach and direct journey with no transfers. Pleasant and helpful driver. Good wifi and usb chargers on seats.

Title: Relaxed way to travel
Review: I had no problems with the journey. The driver was clean and comfortable. The driver was calm and friendly. Overall a very good experience.

Title: Cancelled the bus with no notice 5 mins…
Review: Cancelled the bus with no notice 5 mins AFTER departure time and told us by email. Used weasel language like 'your journey has changed'. Dreadful.

Title: Glasgow to Manchester then Stoke
Review: Glasgow to Manchester then Stoke | Excellent journey, I would recommend and would use FlixBus again | -easy booking system with updates | -great price and value | -well organised departure | -lovely modern coach with usb and comfortable seat | -on time, not too many stops, arrived on time | Overall I was impressed and pleased with the service and journey | It was a lot less stressful than using the trains, journey took a little longer but nice to be seated all the way, safe, comfortable and relaxed

Title: Good way to travel.
Review: Big, comfortable bus. Timely reaching the destination.

Title: Bridgend to Bristol airport
Review: The bus arrived on time at Bridgend. It was nice and clean and comfortable. The down side was that we paid for allocated seats but the seats where not numbered so lots of pasengers confused to where to sit. Luckly the bus was not too busy. There was also no wifi.

Title: Safe and Comfortable Journey that was delayed
Review: Safe and comfortable journey at a low price, though take sanitized hand wipes with you if you use the toilet facility. Bring a torch if you want to read a book etc. due to dim lighting. Arrival was delayed by two hours due to heavy traffic and no fault of their own.

Title: Delayed and Rude Driver
Review: Delayed. Driver not very nice. Rude. Email advising delayed when 5 minutes from final destination.

Title: 35% refund of total cost in vouchers :(
Review: Unfortunately I couldn’t make my return journey from London to other city destination due to personal reasons beyond my control. I contacted Flix Bus in good time and was told nothing could be done except for offer me a refund in vouchers. I was within 14 day cooling off period so I’m not sure this was correct. However, for a trip I paid £40 for I was offered £14 in Flix bus vouchers….which I wasn’t sure I could use again. Will definitely use NE in future.

Title: Unreliable service
Review: Unreliable service - bus didn’t arrive. Only got informed via e-mail half an hour after scheduled departure time.

Title: Driver was extremely friendly and made…
Review: Driver was extremely friendly and made the travel experience much more calming as someone who has anxiety.

Title: We travelled from Geneva to chamonix on…
Review: We travelled from Geneva to chamonix on 23rd of December . | The driver was very rude !!! | He was on his phone taking a call whilst driving in the snow !! | Next thing he was video whilst he was driving for 2 half minutes he then sent this to his contacts. | He had no hands on the wheel whilst he was doing this . | I have never been so scared in all my life on a bus . . | I am writing this review has it could save someone’s life in the future on flix bus .i also have pictures and video of him doing this !

Title: False advertisements and rude driver
Review: And if I can give negative stars I would, they advertise using NEC cards for a discount but the driver won't let you on just bc they feel like it. Absolutely 0 help when asked what can we do to solve the issue bc we had a train booked and they just gave us their back and left us stranded. We missed our train for our holiday and there was no way to refund us. And months of planning just went down the drain bc of the driver kept speaking over us and refusing us. And online chat think we got on the bus again 0 help. |  | I asked the box office at buchanan bus station and they told us they were valid tickets. Maybe it's bc we're Muslim? If flexibus see this please contact me bc I can't think of another reason other than ur racist driver.

Title: The journey was smooth
Review: The journey was smooth, staffs attentive and ticket purchase was seamless.

Title: Appalling service and ethos.
Review: My partner booked a 19:45 coach on boxing day, solo traveller, female. Flix changed the departure time, without informing her, to 19:30. She arrived at the stop at 19:30 to find the bus leaving already. She tried to resolve the issue with the helpline, who promptly logged off at 20:00, leaving her stranded. A lone, female traveller. Luckily we could make arrangements to get her somewhere to stay, but this won't be the case for everyone. |  | Flix have just said they won't refund the ticket because the bus wasn't 2 hours late. It boggles my mind that they can do this. They literally changed the time and dint give any notice. How can they claim they provided the service as paid for? I'd be grateful to anyone who can comment on a way to hold them to account. |  | The refund is one matter. But I'm also pretty angry about the disregard for their customers' personal safety. The person on the chat knew she was stranded due to their changed departure time, but reached the end of their shift and simply logged off. Flix gave no comment on the safety implications at all. |  | No refund, no coverage of costs for alternative travel and accommodation, no acknowledgement that they put someone in a potentially dangerous situation. I'll certainly never use them again, and I'd urge others not to either.

Title: Friendly driver
Review: Friendly driver | Drives carefully | Bus was comfy | Neatness maintained in the bus

Title: Flixbus is my go to
Review: Flixbus is my go to , when I travel from Aberdeenshire to glasgow . Punctual, friendly professional drivers and state of the art coaches , with everything you need for a comfortable journey .

Title: There was wet vomit on the floor and seat in front of me
Review: There was vomit on the floor and the pocket on the back of the seat in front of me. The vomit was wet and got on my shoes, and it smelt horrible. I had to bare with this horrible smell the whole way, and obviously couldn't use the pocket on the back of the seat. |  | Sorry, but it's hard to give a positive rating given my experience. Please clean the bus more thoroughly between trips.

Title: Normally my experience with FLIX bus is…
Review: Normally my experience with FLIX bus is not a bad one but my last trip the heating was off and my whole 3 hour trip home I was freezing it felt like I was outside the entire time instead of in a bus .

Title: Coach did not arrive at CL stop on…
Review: Coach did not arrive at CL stop on Finchley Rd and Flixbus app was not updated correctly. All drivers of other coaches were not helpful. | Ended up sharing an Uber with a fellow deserted passenger. Shocking experience would not wish it on anyone. |  | I have since learned that service was cancelled, without any notice. App never told me anything and actually showed journey being completed. Cost me £150 in an Uber. Shocking experience all around, shame on you Flixbus...

Title: Lost for words with this company
Review: Lost for words with this company. Received a text message about the relocation of the bus stop where the bus was meant to collect us from. Not ideal but I purchased a taxi to get across the city to the designated area. Upon arrival to the bus stop there was several individuals waiting for the same bus. 30 minutes after the bus was meant to arrive all the individuals that were waiting for the same bus have started to contact the customer service. We all were informed that they don’t know where the bus is or when it’s arriving. After additional 30 minutes of wait I then decided to go to the main bus station and get some information. The amazingly helpful individual that was NOT part of the Flix bus team has informed me that the bus has already left and that the text messages was a complete mislead. How can an individual that’s not part of the company know more than the individuals that work in FLIX bus ! When I have received this information I immediately phoned Flix again to find out how I am going to go home. Over the 25 minutes of useless phone call the staff were lying to me that the bus has arrived at the given bus stop which was complete and utter rubbish. After me informing the staff on the phone that I do have eyes and I was at the bus stop well before the given time, the individual on the phone has admitted that he actually has no idea where the bus went, was or made the original collection. How can you not know were a bus, driver and the passengers are ? I was refused to speak to a supervisor several times. Absolutely horrendous, I suggest everyone stays away from them doesn't matter how attractive the price is. Will never use this company again

Title: Reliable and professional service
Review: Reliable and professional service

Title: Time accuracy
Review: Time accuracy

Title: GOD WILL JUDGE YOU FLIX BUS
Review: FLIX BUS GOD WILL JUDGE YOU FOR THE EVIL YOUR DOING TO YOUR PASSENGERS

Title: Excellent service from locating bus…
Review: Excellent service from locating bus terminals, bus transfer and throughout the journey.

Title: Pleasant journey
Review: Bus stop was fairly easy to find, bus arrived 10 mins early, and the driver was lovely and helpful stowing bags. Journey was smooth with no dramas. My complaints are the scheduling - not enough buses to choose from for flight times, and if your flight arrives late for return journey you have to buy a new bus ticket (too late to cancel for refund)

Title: Worst bus company ever
Review: Worst bus company ever. They refused to let my 2 years old child to travel because the driver said she needs a ticket. Although it is mentioned in their website that below 3 do not need a ticket

Title: The coach was 10 minutes late arriving…
Review: The coach was 10 minutes late arriving but there was a warning email to inform passengers of this. The journey was smooth and comfortable and the coach was not full so I had two seats to myself. The information provided by the driver was relevant and helpful. It arrived at its destination 10 minutes early in spite of a late departure. Very good value for money.

Title: Fantastic and Comfortable Journey!
Review: I had a fantastic experience traveling from London to Manchester with FlixBus! The journey was smooth, the bus was punctual, and the seats were incredibly comfortable. The onboard amenities, including charging ports and Wi-Fi, made the trip even more enjoyable. The driver was professional, friendly, and ensured a safe journey. I also appreciated the clean and well-maintained interior of the bus. FlixBus truly offers excellent value for money, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for affordable and reliable travel options.

Title: Booking page doesnt state clearly the…
Review: Booking page doesnt state clearly the prices for childres | As all other transportation in the country have free tickets for toddlers | Also doesnt clearly state the need for a car seat for their travel |  | And after we areived to the departure point , waited for 20min the bus came late and so didnt have the ability to fix anything by buying other tickets or getting a car seat from my car just adjacent to bus stop | And although he came late he didnt waited for me to solve these issue or to call customer service | And so my Christmas holiday was shit because of this and we couldnt get on the bus | Although they ticked my ticket and considered me already travelled that Trip!!!!!!!! I wouldnt use this bus company again

Title: Best Option for Cost and Worth ... Just Try Your Luck !!!!!!
Review: The staff was friendly and helpful. And the ease of Travel is amazing ... just Not Comfortable enough ...Mostly chose because of Baggage Allowance |  | But the Sudden change of Bus timing ... and Cancelling our bus ...was Absolutely inconvenient |  | Also the Recliner of the Highest Paid Reserved Seat was Not Working ... That was the Most Uncomfortable part followed by the Unclean Bus Smell

Title: Don't trust this lying bus company!
Review: It's Xmas eve and I'm trying to get to Bali for 4 weeks.. What a start to my journey, the coach didn't arrive! I arrived 20 mins early and waited 3hr40mins in the cold, I was shaking, speach beginning slur as hypothermia was setting in.. I had to travel light so I was dressed for the hot weather ahead. I called 5 times a no update apart from its on its way, if it hasn't arrived in 15 20mins call us back. On the 6th call they said it arrived on time and collected one person! | With it being Xmas eve there was no alternative way to get to London so I missed my connection to Stanstead. I cancelled 4 flights to Asia. Lost out on hotel booking and a 5th connecting flight. Had to pay £900 for new flight and now have to drive to Manchester at 6am leaving my car for 4 weeks in an unsafe place. Thanks and Merry Christmas | *Update.. They admitted that the bus didn't turn up and refunded me the £25 ticket but I'm still over a thousand pounds down! | If you are travelling for anything important, I wouldn't trust this but company.

Title: Avoid FlixBus at All Costs
Review: I had an absolutely appalling experience on FlixBus while traveling on the Pärnu - Warsaw route (19 December, 21:10 - 10:25, bus number 1205). As a 17-year-old Ukrainian student studying in Estonia, I chose this company to travel home for the holidays, but it turned out to be a terrible decision. |  | The drivers behaved in a disgraceful manner. When I handed in my luggage, they spoke to me in Russian—a language I don’t understand. When I replied in English and informed them I didn’t speak Russian, they insulted me by calling me a “hohol” (a derogatory term for Ukrainians) and a “shakal” (jackal). Such behavior is not only offensive but also deeply discriminatory. |  | Beyond their abusive language, their overall behavior was hostile and unprofessional. They didn’t speak English, which is shocking given that they are working in Europe on an international route. Additionally, the bus lacked Wi-Fi, making the long journey even more inconvenient. |  | This experience was one of the worst I’ve ever had while traveling, and I strongly advise anyone considering FlixBus to avoid it at all costs. If you value professionalism, respect, and basic customer service, look elsewhere.

Title: I lost money with Flix bus ticket and…
Review: I lost money with Flix bus ticket and will never consider them for travel.

Title: Fantastic efficient service
Review: Fantastic efficient service, clean, comfortable bus.

Title: Cheap tickets and comfy seats
Review: The bus arrived on time and the seats were comfortable for our 4 hour journey. The route was exactly what we were looking for and a fraction of the price of the train service. No complaints!

Title: Some things to improve
Review: The schedule was precise, the driver was very friendly. The place where to take the bus was not very clear and it caused us some inconveniences. The seats, even after paying for the ones that said they offer more comfort, are too short.

Title: they denied to transport my cat in…
Review: they denied to transport my cat in carrybag

Title: It was a nice journey.
Review: It was a nice journey.

Title: If I could leave zero stars I would
Review: If I could leave zero stars I would. When we arrived in Dover the driver told us there would be a FIVE HOUR delay, with NO EXPLANATION he simply angrily said it wasn’t his problem. So when we got to Paris we were so late that we missed our connecting trains from neighbouring Gare de Lyon (even though we had allowed several hours in case of any delay) and had to purchase new tickets costing over €500 and getting us to our destination 14 hours later as the trains were all booked being so close to Xmas and we had to wait until the night and get a night train. The driver was unfriendly and rude in the circumstances. Shocking really.

Title: Lost time & money because FlixBus miscommunicated!
Review: Had my first FlixBus experience (3218096055) on Friday December 20, 2024 travelling from Dundee to Leicester - okay ride. |  | The problem happened on the return trip, at the early hours of Sunday December 22, 2024 I received an SMS from FlixBus that my trip UKN11 was running behind schedule and I can track timing through a link. The link showed me the bus would be 29minutes late. Only for me to come back to the bus stop 20minutes later to find out the bus came earlier and had left! |  | I had to rebook another ride with them (3219218616) that 22nd morning at £76.98, just so I leave Leicester for Dundee that day. Sad! Wasted money for FlixBus miscommunication!

Title: I had a very disappointing experience…
Review: I had a very disappointing experience with FlixBus on my trip with route number 3270. My bus was supposed to depart at 1:50 AM from Krakow, but the bus never arrived. After some investigation, I learned that it had been rescheduled to 11:30 AM, but I never received any notification about this change via messenger or email. |  | I was left stranded at the cold bus station with my two children at 2 AM, completely unaware of what to do next. After an hour of waiting, I had to find another way to travel with a different provider, paying a higher fare for the urgency. |  | I submitted a request for a refund to the support team, but all I received was an automated response. It's now been over two days, and nobody has contacted me or processed my refund. |  | This experience was very frustrating, and the lack of communication and customer service has left me extremely disappointed.

Title: Never again with Flixbus
Review: Bus was changed, we rebooked the sits and due to change the original sits was not available! | Toilets out of order | Over 2 hrs delay reaching the destination Paris | No charger and no WiFi | Very dirty bus and the driver was driving extremely careless and fast never again!! | Photos available but can’t attached

Title: Use public transport
Review: Used Flixbus to get to the ski slopes. Comfortable, cheap and on time. I would encourage anyway to use public transport when they can and Flixbus are doing it right.

Title: Flixbus - fantastic!
Review: What a great bus service this is! Quick, clean, warm and comfortable with friendly, informative drivers. The only complaint is that there is only one bus a day!

Title: pro and cons
Review: positive: | - very reasonable price for long distances | - plug for electricity simply great | negative | - dirty tables | - unkind and unpleasant staff, especially to foreigners

Title: Never ever use it, unless you’re planning to arrive to your destination 2 hours late!!
Review: The worst Bus service ever!!

Title: Really very disappointed It was my…
Review: Really very disappointed It was my first time travelling with them i booked tickets and booked 2 times I asked them for the refund but they refused to give me that amd instead they issued me a voucher. | apart from that I booked for 16:30 and guess what bus was departed at 21:00 and i was supposed to be at my destination at that time but they didn’t care about that. Seriously this was my first and last time.

Title: Waiting in the cold night without any information
Review: The app said our bus was on time, so we did go to wait as instructed at the stop at 20:45. |  | The flixbus web page told us, we can track our bus online via the app or via the webpage. We did check it in every 2 min and there was no up to date information at all! It said our bus is in a 10 min delay or in time, depending where I clicked. At the bus stop there was no information about the bus at all! The screen at the station said that it is scheduled at 21PM, it is on time and that it will depart from stop "C". |  | The station is an international bus station with vehicles arriving and departing 24/7. But it closed the customer service and the inside waiting room around 21 PM... We clould go nowhere to ask about the bus and had to wait outside in the cold for a bus we did not know if it was deleted or just late, as the bus disappeared completely from the screens shortly after 21PM! I called the customer service at 21:55 and they told us the bus has 20-25 min delay (we waited for 55 min already, so this info was clearly not up to date) and that we should not leave the stop as it can arrive any minute now. Then we waited another 35 minutes! That is clearly not any minute. |  | At the end, we departed around 22:37 instead of 21:00. Instead of 23:50, we arrived to Budapest Népliget station around 02:00. |  | In short we waited almost 2 hours in the cold winter night for a bus we did not know anything about. Nor the app, neither the phone customer service provided any correct information

Title: Comfort
Review: Very comfortable

Title: It's been a bad trip think twice before using Flixbus
Review: It's been a bad trip, driver mid way said it bus is missing its routine service and ask all passengers with luggage to get down and wait at Bristol the next bus will come in few minutes. Which then became more than 1 hour waiting in the cold, after that another older bus loading all passengers back on way to Exter and Plymouth. With the late evening traffic finally a 6 hour intended trip became greater than 8 hours running into late evening and rush hours traffic.

Title: Frustrating Experience with Bus Service Scheduling
Review: My bus scheduled for 4:30 pm was cancelled. Instead of placing me on the next available bus at 6 pm, which had empty seats, they rescheduled my ticket for 9 pm. I only discovered the 6 pm bus had space when it eventually arrived at 8 pm, and I had to force my way on board. It seems they moved my ticket to 9 pm just to avoid refunding the small amount I paid for my seat, leaving me stranded at the coach station for nearly 5 hours. While the bus itself was good, the service was extremely poor.

Title: Good and comfortable experience
Review: It was great! Very fast and comfortable. I like FlixBus very much since I did an exchange program in France and I used it a lot.

Title: Horrendous customer service
Review: Will never use this company again- en route to the bus stop I received a text and email telling me my trip was delayed. I clicked the link and was informed that it would be 25min late. So, I put off some time in the warmth of a shopping centre. I went out in plenty time to find out that the bus had in fact only ran 2mins late! After much holding on the phone, was told that I could obtain neither a refund nor be allowed on the next service. May I add, by a very rude customer service agent. I | In disbelief. Would never trust this company again!

Title: Bus driver smoking non stop
Review: The driver kept smoking all the way from Sofia to Thessaloniki. | Apart of that we were bitten by bed bugs and the luggage compartment was covered with a thick layer of dust. | Most likely the bus wasn't clean properly because we have to come back to Sofia to change bus due a mechanical issue, but still...was a very bad experience.

Title: Very efficient service
Review: Very efficient service

Title: I lost the bus because my flight from…
Review: I lost the bus because my flight from Brasil was late.

Title: It was ok in general
Review: It was ok in general except for the space for my hand luggage. On time, comfortable but this was an issue during journey because the movement was "normal" but my luggage went down.

Title: The bus showed up on time and reached…
Review: The bus showed up on time and reached the final destination on time. The bus was clean. | However, for internationals traveling, it can be a little difficult communicating because the drivers usually dont speak english.

Title: Unhelpful unkind bus driver
Review: The bus driver was so unhelpful...when someone tried to enquire when our already late bus was possibly going to arrive he looked grimly and made a T shape with his hands, didn't even open the door/window and listen to the woman...even worse though was when we arrived at Perth Broaden a woman asked is this Perth? She was struggling with two children ( one with possible additional needs) and lots of baggage..The driver replied yes Pretty Broxden...instead of "are you going to the town centre?" Or can. I see you ticket....It was obvious to.me and others in the bus she wanted to go to the town centre...I just assumed that wasn't in our route and couldn't believe when we turned up there...I had a word with him and said I thought he was really unhelpful \unkind..he looked at me so angrily that I didn't continue incase he threw me off..and made some excuse about his total lack of care for that family...I felt so angry and upset...Total sickness driver..I WILL NEVER TRAVEL BY FLIX AGAIN

Title: Shambles of a company
Review: Shambles of a company. Firstly there was no professional, courtesy friendly welcome from the driver, once I had sat in my seat, the windows were greasy from who ever last sat in the seat. This next incedent is unfortunate that it happened. The bus broke down, due to a leak from coolant, it’s from here that again the driver wasn’t professional, instead of informing passengers, both driver and his companion stood outside of bus vaping and laughing, it wasn’t until about 20 minutes that the passengers were informed, no apology, just that the coolant was leaking. It wasn’t until the mechanic arrived that he told a few passengers of problem, the driver still hadn’t informed or updated the passengers. When a passenger did ask a question, they were given a sharp reply that he didn’t know what was happening. By this time maybe 2 hours had passed and finally the driver informed passengers that other coaches were coming to pick us up, asked how long, again his answer was boarding on rude, that they will be here as soon as they can. It was at this point, I got on a bus to Lancaster train station and completed my journey.

Title: I was sent a tex 20 minutes before…
Review: I was sent a tex 20 minutes before departure? I was not told what station number. I waited a the station that all other flix buses stopped 12,24 the sign had flix logo. No one told us of the change?

Title: Just had my first trip on Flix bus
Review: Just had my first trip on Flix bus. I am most impressed. Comfy bus, lovely drivers. Absolutely on time arriving in London, a bit late on the way home but that is my fault for travelling home on the last Friday before Christmas. | My only complaint was the app which sent me to the wrong place in Victoria coach station and I only just caught the bus. Thank you to lovely lady who radioed ahead for me and the driver who waited. | fantastic value for money and really simple booking process.

Title: Affordable and punctual
Review: Very punctual and smooth driving. It will be better if there is a guide card in the bus or information center in the station.

Title: had a near collision on motor way
Review: had a near collision with a lorry on motor way… driver was too interested in moving his seat about rather than focusing on his 65mph driving and so we had a lorry screeching its horn and flashing us due to the drivers driving “ skills “

Title: Worst bus journey in history …
Review: Bus arrived with two drivers that didn't speak English and they were extremely unfriendly. Bus also had a blocked toilet that didn't flush and when I told the driver he acted like I'm crazy to expect a clean working toilet on the bus. We also ended up changing bus unexpectedly without any reason from drivers or proper communication unless you understood their language. It also delayed us which seemed no problem to the drivers as they didn't seem to care about the passengers which also showed by how careless they were driving in the late hours. I can only thank god I made it in time and was able to catch my connection in Warsaw. I have been using flixbus several times to different locations over the years and it saddens me has become of this company. Seems like money greed got the better of them so they don't care about customer satisfaction or safety no more. Avoid if you have other alternatives.

Title: First time user.
Review: Porto to Lisbon. Bus was late by 20mins, but no matter as we weren’t on a schedule. We were front seat passengers, so comfortable and pleasant trip during our 3hr+ journey. | We have another journey booked, hope it reflects the first? 👍🏼

Title: Flix bus provided incorrect collection…
Review: Flix bus provided incorrect collection point and did not seem bothered. |  | When I found the correct collection spot the driver was very good. That is the only positive.

Title: FlixBus: Nuremberg to Paris
Review: The seats were comfortable and far apart, it was quiet inside the bus and I could sleep well, the internet was also good, the driver's driving was comfortable. Everything was better than expected.

Title: Do not use this Company worst journey of my life
Review: worst journey of my life, rude driver made me put my work bag in the under compartment as it was “not safe you” then he shouted at other passengers - bus broke down half way through - Flixbus worst transport company DO NOT USE you will regret being bated by the low price waste of money

Title: Abdul and Bradley and cisse at Victoria coach station
Review: I was extremely pleased with the service and attentiveness of the employees. Abdul, Bradley and Cisee at Victoria Coach station helped me with a problem I had with my ticket and was not only efficient and calming but polite. I hope that all employees work to the level of these 3. Thank you very much.

Title: Ciise
Review: Ciise | Bradley | Abdul | I would like to thanks to 3 of them because they helped me to book my tickets at the last moment. | As well as I got a promotion voucher which I used and I got a good bargain. | I would definitely recommend flixbus and will be happy to travel in future. | Thank you ciise specially for all your support in the station.

Title: Excellent value
Review: Excellent value , excellent bus , and excellent driver , was late leaving but didn’t create any issues departed 30 minutes late and previous service driver told us our bus was running late , so no problem at all

Title: Flixbus is always late
Review: Flixbus is always late! If you want to get to your destination on time, do not use flixbus! | They are more expensive than the more reliable bus. I paid £54 single journey to Bristol expecting I will arrive earlier, but bus is an hour late!. Compared to National Express fare of £34 to Bristol and bus came on time. I was so tired after 19hours plane journey and waiting at the coach station in Heathrow out in the cold is very frustrating. So disappointed! I should have chosen National Express is so much reliable than flixbus.

Title: À mixed bag between Manchester and Paris
Review: A mixed bag. |  | We travelled from Manchester to Paris and back on the direct service. |  | We had a fantastic team of drivers on the way out. | They were very attentive, told us everything we needed to know, including when going through the border, customs... |  | They kept the bus clean, drying the steps so no-one would slip. |  | They worked together very well, for instance when passing through tight spots... |  | On the return leg, the drivers hardly said a word to passengers. Didn't bother to say where toilets were, or telling people to use their seat belts. | They didn't say anything about mobile phone use but when my daughter talked to her boyfriend, the non driver told her off in an unacceptable way. Furthermore, their instructions at French border control were unclear which irritated the French security staff who demanded all luggage to be scanned as a result. |  | One passenger was detained at British border control for nearly an hour. The drivers didn't bother to explain what the situation was. |  | When leaving the ferry, the driver made a slight mistake and the right mirror of the bus hit the left mirror of a lorry. No damage done. |  | While I gave our experience 3 stars, I enjoyed the journey and my next trip to Paris will be on-board a Flixbus coach.

Title: They must have friendly drivers that we…
Review: They must have friendly drivers that we sort the service users problems. Not to leave people that already paid in advance stranded

Title: Excellent driver Kai, makes Flixbus standout!
Review: Excellent way of traveling. Good connections, good price, clean bus, usable toilets, good drivers. I’m using Flixbus instead of driving for almost a year now, I hope they’ll keep the prices down. | Kai, the driver, made my journey memorable. Smooth driving, no doubt the best of my journeys so far with Flixbus.

Title: More than 2 hour delay - refused to give refund.
Review: The service between Aberdeen to Glasgow has been delayed for more than 2 hours. |  | I had to take a Citylink after 1 hour of waiting. |  | Initially, I contacted customer support, and they didn't know what to tell me. They said that they had no information and that they'd get back to me. |  | While travelling on Citylink, I received a message that the bus was delayed. I managed to follow it on their app, and it looked like it would departure from Aberdeen with a delay of 1 hour and 40 mins. |  | Looking on the app the buss was still stationed in Aberdeen even after 3 hours. So in that case - I am entitled a refund - I've got the evidence which is their own app. |  | They refused to refund me on the basis that the bus was delayed less than 2 hours - but showing them proof that their buss was still at the station even after 3 hours wasn't enough to convince them. |  | It's a pity because the company seemed great, it was my 3rd experience with them, and I told everyone about their affordable prices and the good conditions on the bus. |  | I won't recommend this company since I feel they stole 16£ from my pocket.

Title: good driving
Review: The driver arrived 5 minutes before departure, driving skills are good, not bumpy or whatsoever. He even waited for one of the customer that was late, we left station 10 minutes after scheduled.

Title: Timely and safe
Review: It was a great trip from Madrid to Lisbon. The bus departed exactly as scheduled. The journey was safe and pleasant. Reached destination at the promised time. I would recommend Flixbus to people who are looking to travel via bus

Title: Bristol bound
Review: Coach and driver great, only downside is no facilities for toilets or weather protection

Title: With Flixbus you are in good hands
Review: The trip was great. From the station, to the bus and driver: I felt really safe during the trip. | From Liverpool to Manchester and vice-versa. It's a company I will definately use again and recommend to everyone.

Title: Reserved seat changed
Review: Flix bus changed my reserved seat without my permission, then they put our seat different place,.

Title: Comfortable ride and easy to book
Review: Comfortable ride and easy to book. I look forward to travelling with FlixBus in the future. Great value for money.

Title: Delayed by an hour
Review: We booked the flixbus to go to Aberdeen for the pantomime. | The bus was delayed by an hour and so to get to Aberdeen in time we had no option but to drive

Title: Easy to book
Review: Easy to book, on time, seats are roomy and bus is clean.

Title: If a zero could be given..
Review: If a zero could be given, I would. When you book a coach, it surely is a reasonable expectation that they get you there, and at the very least communicate what they are going to when the coach breaks down. Instead customers were left to make their own arrangements after being told to exit the coach after less than half way.

Title: Needs improvement.
Review: Good points: punctual; comfortable seats; WiFi good; seat reservations worked; good value. | Bad points: absolutely disgusting toilet: urine/water all over the floor; hand drier broken; no useable toilet paper; extremely cramped space. | Driver played his choice of music loudly. Unacceptable & just encouraged passengers to do likewise.

Title: My journey on the Flixbus from Cardiff to Heathrow to zH
Review: The bus left Cardiff on time, there was no mention of a diversion of traffic due to road closure. | The bus arrived 1hr 15mins late and as a consequence I missed my flight. | Trying to re-book another ticket was a major issue,causing me a lot of stress,even before my holiday started

Title: Already booked another trip
Review: On the bus at the moment, so far everything is going smoothly. Sits are comfy, there is working WiFi on board and charging points. Already booked another trip.

Title: We arrived nearly an hour ahead of…
Review: We arrived nearly an hour ahead of time, this was much appreciated because I was on my way to work. Driver was good but spoke a little too close to the microphone and I couldn't always understand what he was saying. | Would have been good to have had a reading light above the seat, I suggest if you want to read on your journey, take a torch.

Title: Bus cancelled, no explantion
Review: Email received 40 minutes before bus was due to leave saying it was delayed by 1 hour 15 minutes with no explanation. I was travelling to the pick up point when the email came in so I did not get it until 10 minutes before the bus was supposed to leave, therefore I was too late to cancel the trip for a refund. Not reliable, use another service.

Title: Website easy to navigate
Review: Website easy to navigate - prices very competitive.

Title: But now I am stuck between having to forfeit my money or endure the terrible service one last time.
Review: If I could give this a negative star, I would. |  | First things first, the outbound journey departed late and we ended up getting to our destination an hour later. No apologies or acknowledgment from the team. |  | I had to rethink my return seeing as FlixBus have no sense of urgency to get me to my destination on time. | Cancelled the journey because their help centre read only marketing and promotional vouchers cannot be exchanged for cash. | I didn’t mind the ridiculous cancellation fee, all I wanted was to have my cash back as I highly doubt that I would ever use their services. But now I am stuck between having to forfeit my money or endure the terrible service one last time. |  | Fun fact, their terms and conditions are very ambiguous and don’t explicitly state that a cancellation vouchers cannot be exchanged for cash.

Title: Very convenient
Review: Very good transportation company, always on time, the buses are very comfortable

Title: Always reliable
Review: Always reliable. Highly recommended | Travel with flixbus for seven years in italy… never disappointed

Title: Bus timings and price were good but worst journey ever!
Review: Bus timings and price were good. But the actual journey experience was terrible. Driver was flabbergastingly rude and kept shouting at everyone, panorama seats were a waste of money

Title: User friendly and very helpful ....
Review: It was super easy and good experience! Petra was very helpful. Thank you and keep up the good work!

Title: Great service
Review: Great service, clean buses, friendly and helpful staff. Good value. On time

Title: For one year baby also they make us to…
Review: For one year baby also they make us to buy an adult ticket.but not allowed to take car seat with us.if they take adult charge to baby also then they need to provide the safety to the baby also.

Title: Behavior of the Bus driver with the…
Review: Behavior of the Bus driver with the passengers.. He doesn't even let me sit on my reserved seat... Comfort was totally missing in the seats.. Too tight and almost no leg room .. I think this was my 1st and last trip via Flixbus

Title: Very easy to book
Review: Very easy to book

Title: FlixBus
Review: FlixBus supposed to turn up at 12:50 Heathrow-Newport but at 15:30 it still hadn’t arrived. Had to catch National Express. At extra expense.

Title: Flixbus - no service, yet they still charged me :(
Review: Flixbus took my money off me and then cancelled the service an hour later because the weather was so bad. They knew the weather was bad before taking my money off me, and there has been no mention of returning my money. Thieves?

Title: Our First Flix experience
Review: The bus was 5 minutes late in arriving, but I received an eml. informing me of the delay. Inside the bus was lovely and warm, as the weather was bitterly cold. | Only problem - people who had boarded earlier, did not comply with seat allocation. Hence our allocated seats were occupied and we had to sit in odd seats. I feel the driver should check and insist as people board the bus, that they sit in their correct allocated seats. Especially, as pre-reserved seats, cost more money than the standard fare. | Only other complaint - the tray table was dirty and had chewing gum stuck to it. Hence, another prior pre-check for cleanliness and hygiene standards, would be advised.

Title: Buses always timely and clean
Review: Buses always timely and clean, very helpful drivers.

Title: We were well served by a friendly…
Review: We were well served by a friendly driver. We were early so managed to take an earlier bus than booked and we were in Freiburg with the hour.

Title: I lost my luggage from the bus..The bag…
Review: I lost my luggage from the bus..The bag was stolen from the luggage compartment in front of the driver when the bus was stopped at Finchley road. This happened despite the driver's presence, which I believe demonstrates negligence in protecting passengers’ belongings.

Title: Cheap but you get what you pay for.
Review: Cheap, but you do get what you pay for. |  | Bus was 55 minutes late. Wifi is pretty unstable therefore pointless considering 5g was a little better. Some chairs don't have a proper charging point and only a low-powered USB port. |  | The bus was clean and the trip was cheap though.

Title: Always facing delays from Glasgow to…
Review: Always facing delays from Glasgow to Dundee. No updates of delays money waste | No time keeping | Driver not responsible

Title: Appalling service!
Review: On 9th Dec, I booked a return ticket for my 82 year old Father to visit at Christmas. I chose FlixBus as there was an option to pay for an extra seat next to him which would mean he was more comfortable as has limited mobility. | 3 days after booking, I received an email to say the booking had changed on his return journey - Flixbus had cancelled his extra seat and located him at the rear of the coach on an inside seat. Also, instead of refunding the difference in ticket price, they issued a voucher. | I checked online to see what seats were still available and found there were many empty seats still on the coach - at least 18 options of 2 seats together. I called customer services as I thought this must just be an error. I was told that the seat had been changed and the extra seat cancelled due to either safety reasons or that the seat didn't exist and it was not possible to just move to an alternative pair of seats. When I explained that I was currently looking online and there were many seats available, she kept telling me it was not possible to change to any of these. When asked to explain why I would still be able to book alternative seats but she couldn't honour what I paid for, she just kept telling me no, not possible. I asked if there were 2 people travelling, would there be seats, funnily enough this was possible to book. So they would not honour what I had booked but if I pretended there was someone else travelling, that was ok... | Frustrated with this, I then asked to just cancel the whole journey instead and get a refund - again was told no - not possible and this is clear in their terms and conditions. | I was told the terms and conditions does state no refunds, only vouchers but she did agree to refund the part payment for the extra seat only BUT I would have to wait 14 working days for the refund! By now, I have lost all trust in this company so asked for an email confirmation that the refund had been processed but guess what - no, not possible!! | I have no idea what is going on with this company but it seems like very bad practice - I am wondering if they advertise seats to get the sale and then cancel knowing they won't be refunding the money and they can then resell to someone else to get their cash as well..? | I hadn't heard of this company before but did check reviews and all seemed well before I booked. I should have known better and used a trusted company instead. | I have found the business ethics poor and the customer service shocking - would definitely not recommend.

Title: very easy to book
Review: very easy to book, from pass experience it is very good serves and mostly on time.

Title: Arrived 15 minutes earlier than the…
Review: Arrived 15 minutes earlier than the scheduled time, and this gave me the opportunity to connect to my next bus that was supposed to leave in 10 minutes time

Title: I really liked they departed on time
Review: I really liked they departed on time. Coach seating was comfortable and bathroom was clean. Also big bonus, they have chargers on board so you can charge on the go, ready for a fun day out.

Title: Thank you
Review: Thank you! For excellent service! Jesus loves you ✝️🙏🙌🏽✨

Title: Very convenient and easy to use.
Very good I love it
Review: Very good I love it

Title: Smooth ride
Review: Smooth ride, but the sites could be more comfortable for sleeping in the near future

Title: Flix changed my mind about long distance coaches
Review: I originally tried travel with a rival company however their service was very poor. At Victoria Coach Station I happened to talk to a FlixBus driver, joking about why I had been put off using long distance coaches and he said have you tried Flix? I did and the trip was far superior to what I expected, being so I decided to use them again and this is now my third journey to Europe with Flix. I have only had one minor problem using Flix, a major crash closing part of the M3 and the Flix crew not being familiar with English even the police had difficulty telling the drivers what they wanted them to do: turn around to be escorted to the previous exit. It was a shame as the crash was something no one could predict but drivers who had to be told by gestures what the Highways Authority required them to do was concerning. At least once we had been directed onto the diversion route everything, although delayed, went smoothly again. I can really recommend their services, clean warm and comfortable busses, friendly (hopefully familiar with English language) staff and great on-line information and tracking.

Title: Easy to use and speed of tickets to go…
Review: Easy to use and speed of tickets to go in my wallet

Title: Bad experience very aggressive driver and bad temper with all the passengers, angry he mentions that he will be given a tip for helping to install the suitcases! They shouldn't have that type of drive
Review: Very bad experience. We are travelers from Chile. We travel from Orlando to Miami today, December 11. At 10:30 a.m., we arrive punctually at the bus departure point, the driver with very bad character and bad mood! He sent us to place the luggage and yelled at us because we didn't put it in the appropriate place! I couldn't pack my bags and he didn't want to help by mentioning that he doesn't do it because they hadn't given him a tip, that only if they gave him a tip he could do! He was very rude with all the passengers who later told another person from the company how bad we felt, later on the trip the driver continued very upset, he is also an older adult and abuses passengers who want to spend a pleasant vacation! Very bad service!

Title: Efficient and reliable
Review: Efficient and reliable. Excellent and on time communication

Title: Always a great journey with Flixbus!!
Review: Always a great journey with Flixbus!!! 10*

Title: Zero stars if possible.
Review: I should give zero stars but this is not possible. Before booking our trip to Bruges I checked with their customer service who assured me I could join the bus from London at Dover before it got on the ferry. There is no-one to talk to at FLIX so this was via the chat service on their website. This is good for the company as the only way to have a record of the contact is to photograph it. When we arrived at Dover, no-one knew of how we could join the bus and the Port Police told us FLIX had never picked people up at dover. We watched the bus sail by towards passport control with no way of stopping it. We then bought foot-passenger tickets for the same ferry hoping to join the bus. The Driver refused to let us do so. Therefore we had a useless cruise to and from Calais and lost hundreds of pounds on accomodation and other pre-booked events. We thought about getting a train from Calais to Bruges (4 hours, 2 changes) but could not be sure our return ticket would be accepted.

Title: Driver was great
Review: Driver was great, drove safely and smoothly. The whole service was on schedule and received a free food voucher for the Ferry which I didn’t expect!

Title: Unsafe driving
Review: Whilst on a service travelling on the M6 in a restricted speed area (50 mph) our driver frequently exceeded this and on at least one occasion tailgated a car and got as close as a metre and when overtaking them then cut in very suddenly nearly causing an accident. This was quite scary and our driver seemed to forget he was carrying passengers !

Title: All went as advertised
Review: All went as advertised | All is done (and feels) on the cheap, but it’s not this life’s winners who are reduced to using long-distance coaches. If you place yourself in the appropriate frame of mind, then FlixBus delivers.

Title: Flixbus is reliable and comfy seats
Review: Flixbus is reliable and comfy seats

Title: The bus was on station I came driver…
Review: The bus was on station I came driver was closing door I knocked to open the door he ignored me started bus and left me he watched me and laughed and left the bus. I missed my university and exam because of driver irresponsible behaviour never gonna use or refer to anyone they're not worth it.

Title: Route Garmisch Partenkirchen to Munich…
Review: Route Garmisch Partenkirchen to Munich airport. Coach came from Innsbruck in the morning and having snow. I expected along delay but it was only 10 minutes late and arrived at airport only 10 minutes late and just outside of Terminal 2. Tip! Take an umbrella or rain Poncho, as there is no cover at the Garmisch Partenkirchen Bus Stop and both times I took a flix from there, it was raining/snowing and I was glad I had an umbrella to keep dry. As the coach arrives from Innsbruck in Garmisch Partenkirchen, the Border police do their checks on the passengers on the coach before we could board. So I guess you could wait in the Bahnhofs Halle and watch out for the bus and then walk the 50 meters to the stop. Also I recommend to reserve a seat as the coach was always full when I have travelled. Would book again. Comfortable seats, pleasant and safe driving driver.

Title: We used Flix bus as it was the quickest…
Review: We used Flix bus as it was the quickest and best price to get from Groningen to Bremen. | Really easy to book tickets and as part of the e-ticket you get a link for a map to take you to the pick up point. There is also a link which gives a live status on where the coach is along the route. | The coach was modern, clean, comfortable and got is to Bremen as per the schedule. | Would happily take Flic bus again.

Title: Very fast and easy to make
Review: Very fast and easy to make

Title: Poor service when things go wrong
Review: Facts: I booked a return journey in good faith and paid in advance as requested. My outward journey went well. My return journey was cancelled in the early hours of the day I was due to travel and so I awoke to find that my journey had been cancelled without any real reason. I was offered a free ticket on any other bus departing that day. The next available bus was too early for me to get and the next one was at 9pm in the evening meaning a very late arrival home. I was also able to obtain a refund. I needed to travel and reach my destination at the time originally planned. I had two web chats and each agent said that I would be able to get a refund for alternative transport if I arranged it. I had to book a train and so the ticket was £77 due to the short notice. I had to pay. During the journey I applied for a refund as directed by the two agents and uploaded my receipt/ticket. Five days later I have still not received a refund and what with this and other bills I have low funds in my bank account and may end up overdrawn hence causing bank fees - through no fault of my own. I have emailed Flix twice and the agent did not read my communication answering by saying that they could see I had had a successful outward journey. I tried web chat again this morning and was 'on hold' whilst investigations took place but they revealed nothing. I requested to speak to a supervisor or get a call back from one but I was refused. That experience took too long and I had to go to a meeting so left the chat without any resolution. I understand things don't always go to plan but when you make a mistake or change someones plan or schedule then you need to own it and respond rapidly and efficiently. This experience was not my doing and Flixbus have caused me a lot of inconvenience and I am out of pocket. Systems are fast and effective for making sales and taking money but dealing with problems seems to come a poor second best. | UPDATE 23/12/2024 | 18 days later and Flixbus still haven't paid what they owe. It seems clear that if you complain they sit on your money for longer. Appalling service.

Title: Amazing, friendly and funny bus driver
Review: We travelled to Edinburgh from Aberdeen on 07/12/2024 and had to change at Perth and get the 11 am bus to Edinburgh. The driver on the 11 am bus from Perth to Edinburgh was amazing. So welcoming and very funny, she had all the customers in knots. She really made our day and is a credit to your company. Also have used Flixbus a few times and think the service is great and very good value. Will definitely use again

Title: Fab!!
Review: Our bus was warm, comfortable and all round brilliant! It was dead on time leaving and the same for picking us up. The driver was courteous and informative, can't fault it at all. Highly recommend!!

Title: Great trip from Heathrow airport to…
Review: Great trip from Heathrow airport to Cardiff. On time, clean bus, smooth ride and a cracking price. I’m would recommend to anyone reading this review.

Title: Excellent customer service.
Review: Excellent customer, clean bus ambiance, clean toilet, safe driving.

Title: Storm Dara delayed my flight which was…
Review: Storm Dara delayed my flight which was well reported, but FlixBus made me buy another ticket!! Then guess what the bus was late due to adverse weather conditions. Cheap but a false economy

Title: Disappointed This is the second or third time I have…
Review: This is the second or third time I have reserved seats with Flix and those seats have been occupied . I have even paid for adjoining seats in order to ensure some privacy but those too have been occupied. Very disappointed indeed.

Title: I am really honest saying this
Review: I am really honest saying this! I am always happy to travel with Flix I appreciate every thing they do to comfort their customers and I hope they continue like this in my future ventures.

Title: Delays delays poor service
Review: No information provided to me telling me the start of my trip was delayed by 1.5 hours. The representative at Victoria didn’t even look at me and said sorry about that’. However I did receive a message to say the return trip coach was delayed by 20 mins although the coach never turned up until 1 hour and 20 mins later and the driver started shouting orders at us all. I tried calling customer service who were totally inept and were unable to provide a resolution or apology.

Title: great value service
Review: great value service, easy to book, drivers are very friendly. I wish other customers would behave better but that is not the companies fault. I commend them on keeping prices affordable and the transport regular and available.

Title: Great Straight Forward Booking
Review: Great Straight Forward Booking

Title: Another trip to go home after seeing…
Review: Another trip to go home after seeing family. It’s easy to book and pay for, and the trip to here was worth the money. Comfortable, friendly and cheap, I’ll take Flix every time.

Title: (1) bus toilets not so clean, inter change time limit should not exceed 1 hour please.
Review: (1) bus toilets not so clean. | (2) Inter change time is too long. | (It should not be more than 1 hour please)

Title: Really impressed with my experience.
Review: It was so easy to travel on flix bus. I made a round trip from Birmingham to London, the coach arrived before time of departure which allowed us to get on board and get comfortable before setting off. Seats were comfy and it was just a really good experience. Thanks to the driver Joseph too, he gave us updates and added some light humour to them too which made it seem friendly. Will definitely be using the coaches again!

Title: Need more considerate drivers
Review: Need more considerate drivers, I had a message saying our coach was delayed, original time to leave was 8:45pm but the company changed it to 9:55pm, we waited an extra 2 hours for our coach after a 12 hour flight, we walked to the bus stop for 9:35pm to make sure we weren’t going to miss our coach, arrived to find our driver about to drive off, we were begging him to let us on as he was still stationary, he was refusing, even though we were misled by the information given to us from flixbus, they lied saying the bus was delayed when it never was, the driver left us stranded in London without a ride back to wales. That driver is a disgrace to humanity

Title: Because driver go smoke
Review: Because driver go smoke, and don't let go passengers smoke.

Title: Superheroes
Review: During a severe weather warning where all other buses were cancelled, FlixBuses were still running and got me to where I needed on time👍👍would be more convenient if they stopped at the coach station in Birmingham on every trip but that’s ok

Title: Excellent drivers!
Review: Both drivers to London and back were brilliant. The road conditions were not the best and was shocked FlixBus were the only ones in the southwest that didn't cancel their journey's! The drivers humour and careful driving made it less stressful. Bus there was old and cold but on way back a new modern coach.

Title: Quality Bus Travel
Review: Quality Bus | Very Clean | Came on time | Great driver

Title: bus ride between LHR and…
Review: It was a bus ride between LHR and Gatwick Booking was easy. Bus left and arrived on time. No surprises.

Title: Stranded with no onward travel provided
Review: Me and my daughter had a weekend trip to London with this bus company. The travel down was delayed as we had to switch busses with the wipers having broken on the journey. Upon meeting the first driver I was taken aback as the the unprofessional manner in which he spoke to passengers. Swearing and being extremely rude to almost all, these passengers were not in anyway difficult. |  | Return journey was the worst. Having parked in a coach stop the driver who at first seemed really nice proceeded to have a shouting argument with another coach driver that needed to park also. It was very unnerving. We then were all ordered to get off the coach as he was not taking us further. |  | Me and my daughter went to get in the warmth and wait to see what we were to do to get the rest of the way home. |  | An hour layer we were told via email by FLIX to make our own way home. Bearing in mind we were at a shopping outlet on the outskirts of a city thus was utterly out of line to be left stranded. |  | I was lucky I had my husband come and drive the extra hour and a half it was to get home as to navigate getting home any other way would have been very intimidating and hard. I felt more upset for the other passengers as they were visibly concerned how to get themselves home. What if they did not have the funds available to get taxis into the city or train tickets home? Goodness knows where you would start with any public transport from a foreign place way outside near city center travel hubs. |  | Never again. Also after emailing them I never received a word back. It may bemore but I will always from now on take the train. |  | Disgusting to leave people stranded, possibly with no way to get onward travel!!!!

Title: Had to find a way to get to London
Review: Had to find a way to get to London. Flight was diverted, the bus was the only way as it was late and nothing else could get me from Glasgow to London at midnight. Staff was friendly, bus was new and clean. Couldn’t connect to the wifi. All in all it did the job and got me home when no one could.

Title: Poor service
Review: Email half an hour before departure to advise no bus service due to weather conditions. No alternative offered by Flix. So, at the end of a 12 hour flight, I had no way of getting home. Thankfully National Express were running so I managed to get part of the way, then a taxi leaving me £113 out of pocket. Thanks Flix.

Title: Really Easy
Review: Really Easy, use Flix a lot. Great service

Title: Very good experience
Review: Very good experience

Title: Friendly helpful driver,left and…
Review: Friendly helpful driver,left and arrived on time ina comfortable clean bus. Excellent time table.

Title: Professional friendly new Cardiff Service
Review: I’ve made several trips now with Flix to and from airports from Cardiff. |  | Punctual with friendly drivers and really competitive prices compared to National Express. The Cardiff start location at Herbert Street/Lloyd George Avenue also good for drop offs and pick ups |  | Toilet location in middle of bus also better than location at rear of bus. |  | One point of concern is driver stated that small hand luggage cases with Wheels count as hold luggage and should be paid for. This should be noted in booking form. |  | Overall a great new addition

Title: Cheap and comfortable travel
Review: The coach was comfortable and well-driven, from Glasgow to Preston but had been designed without reading lights. As an 80-yr-old book reader on such a journey I found this annoying after 16:00. | My daughter told me to use the flashlight/torch function on my phone – problem solved.

Title: Excellent service
Review: Excellent service. I can't fault any aspect.

Title: Very easy to deal with the app and buy…
Review: Very easy to deal with the app and buy tickets.

Title: Don’t rely on Flixbus to take you from…
Review: Don’t rely on Flixbus to take you from Gatwick to Heathrow to catch your next flight! | They cancelled ours 17 minutes before departure. I cannot believe they didn’t know before then, but for some reason (incompetent?) didn’t bother. | So did the cancellation message give a link for a refund? | Er……… | NO!

Title: Bus was late
Review: Bus was late, I had to get off one stop earlier not to be late for my appointment. AirConditioner not working, 32C in bus, toilet blocked. My seats were occupied by someone else. Not happy at all.

Title: Comfortable, clean and great internet!
Review: My recent journey from Manchester to Newcastle upon Tyne on December 5th, 2024, was a pleasant experience overall. The bus itself was clean and comfortable, and I appreciated the thoughtful addition of plastic bags for rubbish. The onboard Wi-Fi was excellent, providing consistent connectivity throughout the majority of the trip with only a brief, one-minute interruption. |  | However, I was disappointed by the lack of a working USB charger at my seat. Despite the window banner indicating their availability, I couldn't locate one, which would have been problematic on a longer journey. |  | Despite this minor inconvenience, the three-hour ride was comfortable and efficient, thanks to the clean environment and reliable internet access.

Title: Kept to time
Review: Kept to time, easy to use payment platform

Title: Great semplicity in showing the options…
Review: Great semplicity in showing the options for purchase the trip right for my needs.

Title: My reserved seat was not available and…
Review: My reserved seat was not available and the driver on my bus drove dangerously during a storm period (tailgating slow moving vehicles and flashing his lights). Driver was also erratic with his interactions with passengers including attempting to manhandle a paying customer off the bus (the customer's crime was arriving a minute late and the driver didn't want to scan his ticket). Considering I was taking this bus to replace a cancelled train journey, the bus experience added additional stress to an already stressful day. I wouldn't recommend Flixbus. Relief driver who did the Leicester to London stretch was excellent by contrast.

Title: Awesome well worth it beautful quality…
Review: Awesome well worth it beautful quality of coaches

Title: The bus was cheap enough but the driver…
Review: The bus was cheap enough but the driver was in such a bad mood, and dropped us off before the bus station saying we wouldn't want to drag our stuff through the bus station, even though I had another bus after that one so needed to go to the bus station. I paid for assigned seat and none of the seats where numbered so we couldn't have found our seat if we wanted to, so they charged me for nothing, that was a complete waste of money. Just appalling from hidden costs to grumpy drivers, definitely crap all round.

Title: A comfortable journey
Review: The bus arrived at the departure point and the arrival point on time. It was very comfortable

Title: Very good service with punctuality and…
Review: Very good service with punctuality and reasonable price. What else we need. I would recommend them strongly.

Title: On time arrival and v clean bus
Review: On time arrival and v clean bus. Would definitely use again.

Title: Very easy to book.
Review: Very easy to book.

Title: Dreadful from start to finish
