Review: Driver was very rude and dismissive at one point he refused to take my disabled husband because he didn't know he had a disabled passenger even though I pre registered with the company my husbands wheelchair whenever we had to get off the bus it was too much trouble for the driver to get his wheelchair out the luggage compartment huffing and puffing etc he also told people to sit where you liked even though we had specific seat allocation and the person in our seats would not move as my husband only has one leg moving from one seat to another was impossible causing the person whose seats we were in not to get their allocated seats. The bus from bham to London was delayed over 3 hours due to an accident on the motorway which we accept cannot be helped but no communication whatsoever from the employee who was dropped off a previous bus other than it's delayed and don't know when it will arrive we ended up getting a taxi to the train station and a train to London in order to meet the connecting bus and ferry would not travel with this company again and would not recommend

Title: Bus was on time to pick me up very…
Review: Bus was on time to pick me up very comfortable

Title: This is my second time travelling with…
Review: This is my second time travelling with this bus I totally love it. The only concern is I wish I could recline my seat but I don't want anyone behind me to feel uncomfortable, but the ride has been smooth and the team excellent

Title: Great price at such a cheap price
Review: Great price at such a cheap price, cheaper than the train taking roughly same time and without having to change

Title: Easy to book great price
Review: Easy to book great price

Title: The bus was over an hour late!!
Bus was on time
Review: Bus was on time. No delays. Driver on Swiss side seemed very stress. Driver on Annecy side was relaxed and friendly.

Title: Newport to Bristol 5.40am bus was brillCouldn’t believe how much Bus trips…
Review: Couldn’t believe how much Bus trips have moved on , driver was so professional while being personal the bus was clean and plenty of room arrived on time left on time

Title: Smooth booking experience
Review: The booking experience was very smooth. And cheap tickets too

Title: We paid for 50 kg and driver charged…
Review: We paid for 50 kg and driver charged another 10 euros. One bagged was missing in the end of the journey. No responsibility with the baggages

Title: Very easy and an excellent
Review: Very easy and an excellent means of booking

Title: Always late and the customer service is…
Review: Always late and the customer service is terrible they don’t get back to u!

Title: One of the worst service provider
Review: One of the worst service provider. We book our return coach from Leicester to London for 4:50 PM bus arrive after 6PM. We were in rush and we booked another ticket for 5:20 pm and that bus also got delayed by more that 90 minutes. On their website it's still showing on time. Very unprofessional.

Title: Excellent driver
Review: Excellent driver, good space, a very beautifull journey.

Title: The bus arrived 30 min delayed but all…
Review: The bus arrived 30 min delayed but all good until I realised my journey is 2h delayed. I am currently stopped in the middle of a random gas station, 1h away from my final destination, and the driver decided to turn off the lights inside the bus and take a 30 min break. |  | It’s completely unacceptable and disrespectful to the passengers schedules and commitments. I chose Flixbus instead of National Express (though they were the same price for this journey) because supposedly the journey took less time. I was lied to, and the customers are not supported when a journey is delayed. You’d assume Flixbus would be apologetic and make an effort to minimize the delay but here I am in a dark bus waiting to arrive 2h late. This unacceptable. |  | UPDATE: I arrived 3 hours late and Medina from Flixbus costumer service has been ignoring my requested for help - instead choosing to reply to me with the same prewritten email (that has nothing to do with what I wrote).

Title: Flixbuses are reliable and…
Review: Flixbuses are reliable and comfortable..what more do you need.

Title: Bus didn’t make it to the destination booked
Review: Bus didn’t make it to its final destination after a hold up on the motorway. The driver said he had driven up to his driving hours and left us at the wrong terminal with no advice of where to go.

Title: Affordable and reliable service
Review: The booking process was straightforward and hassle-free, and I appreciated the option to pre-assign seats. This feature not only prevented overbooking but also ensured a more comfortable journey for all passengers. |  | The coaches were clean, well-maintained, and equipped with modern amenities. The drivers were professional and courteous, making the trip enjoyable. I was particularly impressed by the company's commitment to enforcing good behaviour and rules, which contributed to a peaceful and respectful atmosphere on board. |  | I would definitely recommend this coach company to anyone looking for a reliable and affordable travel option.

Title: Bus got delayed for 4 hrs, then canceled
Review: Bus got delayed for 4 hrs, one of the helpers gave us an explanation of the delay only after the 2nd hr. The bus was canceled shortly after it was fixed, and it left us stranded at 1 am. I had to stay at the coach station until 5am.

Title: Service was cancelled at very short…
Review: Service was cancelled at very short notice (eight and a half hours) and no alternative or help was offered, other than being told to book and travel with another company.

Title: Driver was professional
Review: Driver was professional, it was a 5hr 50min journey from manchester to glasgow. Journey was fine driver kept us updated when the next stop was and when he had to stop for a 30min break and arrived in glasgow with 5 mins to spare

Title: Fabulous journey from start to finish !
Review: Fabulous journey from start to finish ! | I will return

Title: My bus was delayed for 2 hours and 43…
Review: My bus was delayed for 2 hours and 43 minutes which made me missed my flight and ruined my entire holiday. No explanation why the bus was delayed. I chose night trip as no hassle and a lot quicker. No traffic on the road it was a very smooth trip but almost 3 hrs delayed was insane. No toilets and the driver never communicate with us what to do if in case we need toileting. I had to hold on my urination for the entire trip which is 11 hours. It sucks

Title: Reliable and reasonably priced service
Review: Seems like a good , reasonably priced and reliable service .Easy to book/ reserve seats.

Title: Great Service
Review: Great Service! The Driver was helpful and friendly.

Title: Very easy to book
Review: Very easy to book, fantastic price compared to GWR who either cancel or are late and far to expensive. Second time booking this service

Title: Flixbus do not care
Review: First experience of using flixbus. Our bus was leaving from mulhouse to freiburg. When we got to the German boarder. The bus was stopped and checked by police. A 300 euro fine was issued to the driver who refused to pay and we were told we couldn't leave until the fine was paid. We were then told the battery for the bus was then dead. Driver refused to cancel the trip and said we had to wait for a mechanic which would take up to 11 hours. Nothing nearby for food or drink. No working toilet. |  | Tried speaking to flixbus customer service who are useful as a chocolate tea pot. All they say on live chat is to wait and wait and wait. After awhile they just close your chat after reading and don't reply. |  | Still here after more than 4 hours |  | It's a shame you cannot attach photos

Title: Lied about the reserved seat
Review: Lied about the reserved seat. Seat could not be used. We had to stand during the long journey. Company uses manipulative practices where they let you reserve the seat and then there are no identifications of seats in the bus, so seats are taken by whoever comes first.

Title: I use my money to buy the tickets,I…
Review: I use my money to buy the tickets,I canceled it,but I didn’t get refund by cash but get vouchers,that is unfair,this is a very bad company,never never use it again and I will tell everyone not to use the FlixBus!It is the worst bus in this world!

Title: Good  and comfortable
Review: Good and comfortable

Title: Train arrived on time
Review: Train arrived on time. The journey was smooth and we reached earlier than the expected time! | Loved my experience!

Title: Excellent service
Review: Bus left promptly, the journey was smooth and the staff were courteous.

Title: I didn't get the seat that I booked, and cold and uncomfortable
Review: I booked a seat, the location of the seat was shown via a seating plan of the bus. I chose a seat at the front (1D) However, when I entered the bus I discovered that a woman was sat in the seat that I had paid for . The driver asked her once to move but she refused. I therefore had to sit in a different location in the second row, and on the side opposite to what I booked. I booked a seat at the front of the bus due to disability, both physical and mental. Also the bus had no WiFi and no sockets to charge a phone. The driver stated that the bus is different to the usual flixbus. Additionally, the bus was cold as if the heaters were off and a window near the driver was open. I could feel a draught and plainly hear the noise of the road and other traffic.

Title: Great prices
Review: Great prices, friendly, helpful drivers, punctual buses

Title: Excellent will definitely come back soon
Review: Excellent will definitely come back soon

Title: Quick and Easy
Review: Simple and easy booking. No need to login or create an account

Title: Driver mentality
Review: I had the worst experience with the driver on the 15:30 Bristol to London service on December 2, 2024 (Bus No. UK041). When the bus, already delayed by an hour, finally arrived, I politely asked the driver, "When can we expect the bus, sir?" His response was shocking—he shouted at me and replied, "I am not the only driver, I don't know." |  | While delays can happen, and I fully understand that buses are machines subject to issues, the attitude of this driver was completely unacceptable. Politeness and clear communication go a long way in such situations, and his behavior left a terrible impression. |  | In contrast, the driver who took over for the journey back from Bristol to London (also Bus No. UK041) was professional and respectful. He took the time to explain the cause of the delay in a calm and polite manner. This is the kind of conduct passengers expect, especially when faced with delays. |  | The company needs to address such unprofessional behavior and ensure all staff maintain a respectful attitude toward passengers. One rude employee can ruin the trust and goodwill built by others.

Title: Terrible experience, use National Express
Review: I left London for Leeds on an early morning journey. Everything started well — the coach was on time, my seat was not occupied and we left on the clock. The first driver had a smooth drive. First issue: the plug sockets were not working and there was no WiFi on board. |  | Later on, there was a drivers’ change. The new driver was utterly unprofessional and overall rude. His driving was terrible, frantic, dangerous and made me feel nauseous. He also honked many times when he was clearly at fault. The communication was barely understandable as his English seemed limited. Along the way, we encountered an issue with an alarm. He stopped the bus on the side of the motorway and went though the coach, ending up with accusing my forward neighbour of activating the sensors and asking him to move seats. The alarm kept going off, so he started opening and closing the emergency door exit frantically while talking to someone helping him on the phone as he was completely unable to fix the issue by himself and required assistance from a fellow passenger to open the door and pull it back all the way strongly, that after being told he wasn’t very strong by the passenger. After a few more minutes, he managed to get the alarm to stop. I reached Leeds with a massive headache and a close to thirty minute delay. This is unacceptable. I am dreading going back to London tonight with a night bus of yours because that journey was atrocious. Not to mention that the bus was cold.

Title: 21:30 London Victoria Coach Station…
Review: 21:30 London Victoria Coach Station ---> Bristol |  | Got kept waiting from 21:30 (time coach was supposed to depart) up to nearly 1 am, when the trip got finally cancelled. London Victoria Coach Station has barely any seating, so had to wait standing and were kept on our toes as the screen kept stating "delayed" without specifying any timings. The tracking in the app was unavailable, which made the waiting process even more stressful. | Finally, after waiting all that time, which made it so that no other bus was available (as the 21:30 bus was the last for flixbus and the others were fully booked), the only compensation for the stress was a refund. | No more trains were available at that time and the subway was shut. | Needed to be back to Bristol the day after for a flight, so had no option to stay for the night. Had to book a really expensive Uber ride all the way back. Will never use Flixbus again.

Title: enjoyable
Review: coach was on time and we had a safe and comfy journey

Title: was smooth.
Review: was smooth.

Title: Drivers need more training and must speak English coherently,
Review: The drivers spoke little English, could not interact with passengers and were unfriendly. We arrived at 1.15pm and were refused help into our paid seat, the drivers apparently having told passengers to sit anywhere. We had to sit in a broken seat at the front. They initially refused us onto the bus saying we had too much luggage. We were actually one 20kg case light. They said the luggage was full and refused a passenger before us, only letting her on when my daughter intervened. There was half a luggage compartment free. Two ladies arrived two minutes late as the bus was about to leave and the drivers refused them. One of the ladies stood in front of the bus so the driver started the engine and moved forward as if to knock her over. Passengers at the front were shouting. I was told to walk through passport control without my wheelchair and customs officers told me I should have stayed on the bus. Seat belts were not checked. Announcements comprised of a few words and were ineligible. The driver did not tell the ferry people he had to access wheelchairs, was guided close to the wall and as a result could not fully open the luggage compartment, dragged my wheelchair out and the nut and bolt for the brake went flying. We only recovered the bolt. The two FlixBus employees were good drivers, otherwise it was a very unpleasant and uncomfortable trip, unlike the previous ones that were excellent.

Title: Punctual and professional service
Review: Punctual and professional service. After travelling 10hrs by plane and locating the bus stop easily. Stowing our luggage and sitting in a very clean and new coach, was great. The driver was very pleasant, professional and punctual.

Title: Pheeww, Excellente!
Review: Pheeww! On time, reasonable priceclean,respectful drivers, delivers as promise, very convenient!

Title: Booking process is easy and…
Review: Booking process is easy and straightforward

Title: Horrible
Review: I was early for my 2:35 bus to London, the bus arrived at 2:40 I showed the bus driver my ticket which said 2:35 and he said that this was the 2:30 bus and the 2:35 but was running late and I should wait 10 minutes for the next one. I waited until 3:00 and decided to call and ask what was happening the lady on the phone pretty much told me I was lying and that they showed up on time so they couldn’t help out and left me stranded even thought their own bus driver told me to wait. I had to pay for another ticket home. This is horrendous for them to not even try to offer to help or a refund at all and to leave me stranded because of their staffs wrong doing.

Title: The legroom on the bus was…
Review: The legroom on the bus was insufficient, necessitating uncomfortable seating between the seats. The heater beneath my seat was left on for the entire journey, despite my request to the driver. Instead of turning off the heater, they simply turned on the air conditioning. As a result, my trip was extremely uncomfortable. The drivers' unfamiliarity with the route resulted in multiple turnbacks, leading to a delayed arrival.

Title: Excellent driver and staff
Review: Excellent driver and staff, very professional. Bus was on time. Comfortable seats. Only wished the charging ports were working, but a power bank is helpful in this instance.

Title: I was let 2 mints and the bus is gonna
Review: I was let 2 mints and the bus is gonna

Title: Was a perfect trip back home from London
Review: Was a perfect trip back home from London

Title: Journey from Bruges to Edinburgh via…
Review: Journey from Bruges to Edinburgh via London. Bus from Bruges to London was fine but bus from London to Edinburgh was not. The seats were too close together and there was no legroom. Got swollen feet as a result. I'm not a particularly tall person either.

Title: I had my trip from Birmingham to…
Review: I had my trip from Birmingham to Victoria Coach station, arrival was late on 1 hour 25 min, i was late for my bisness meeting and missed my return coach that cost me extra £39 for another coach. I find it very disgusting that company has not responsible for their customers. I chosen FlixBus for friendly price and short journey time but paid twice and was upset and stressed

Title: Could not fault this trip from…
Review: Could not fault this trip from beginning to end. Very affordable and customer service was outstanding the drivers were gentlemen. I was by myself with a young child and they helped so much. On time and driven a safely and so on time saved me so much on train or parking my car thank you

Title: Bus clean warm comfortable -Brilliant bus service
Review: Bus clean warm comfortable and ontime-second time I have used this service-would certainly use again and recommend to others

Title: Flix bus are an excellent choice of…
Review: Flix bus are an excellent choice of coach. On time, staff very accommodating, clean comfortable and reasonably priced. Avoid National Express! Twice the price!

Title: From booking to travelling Above expectations everything…
Review: From booking to travelling everything went smoothly. The drivers were very friendly and took good care of our luggage. The journey was punctual , the price was very good - much better than Nat Express. There coach was very modern and spotlessly clean and provided excellent free WiFi along with charging and clean toilets. Highly recommend.

Title: Your departure time has been a…
Review: Your departure time has been a disappointment and twice I have missed my appointments with no refund. Pathetic service....very epileptic

Title: Very good service
Review: Very good service fantastic value for money

Title: Excellent journey
Review: Excellent journey, on time, excellent driver, good value for money. Thank you

Title: FlixBus Aberdeen
Review: Absolute joke, first off my bus never arrived. After calling the help line the guy said he'd phone back in 15 mins. Never did. Then after waiting at the bus stop I decided to leave. 2 hours later I got an email saying it was delayed. I phoned customer service stating with no warning I lost my hotel room because flix didn't give me enough time to sort that out. So I lost money for the hotel and never made it to my destination. While the other companies were telling their customers they can get the train for free. While flix didn't put out any notice. Absolute joke and will never use them again as this is the 3rd time this has happened where flix just doesn't update on what's happening. Customer service kept hanging up on me and said they will not compensate me. Then rudly shout at me.

Title: Well this is not the first time as I…
Review: Well this is not the first time as I use flix every other week, the switch over bus at Perth is always late and passengers have to beg another driver to take them because some people need to catch another bus or get to work this is not fair. A proper compensation should be given to customers in such situations.

Title: Easy to understand
Review: Easy to understand, clear, quick and simple to use.

Title: Very happy with the journey
Review: Very happy with the journey, punctual and excellent driver. Would however like reserved seats so marked. It should not be customers responsibility to ask someone to move from your seat

Title: I do not live in Nottingham I found the…
Review: I do not live in Nottingham I found the picknup area being Greyfriar Gate Stop C11-12 daunting. No idea where this was. Sounds like a Gate for the coaches. Rather than an address. When I gave this address to a person who lives in Nottingham and who would have driven me there they didn't know where it was. |  | I ended up getting the train back into London.

Title: Was easy too book and I use this…
Review: Was easy too book and I use this service fairly regularlu

Title: Bus arrived 100 minutes late this…
Review: Bus arrived 100 minutes late this morning today at Leeds coach station. Obvisoly nearly 2 hours late in arrival at destination.

Title: I just like to be Gratefull for the…moment
Review: I just like to be Gratefull for the Moment | 😉💫🤟

Title: Absolute criminals
Review: Absolute criminals. My bus was 110 minutes late to my destination, they said if it was 120 minutes I would have been entitled to a refund! Absolute joke, scum! Avoid at all cost!

Title: As good as Nat Express
Review: Comfortable, seats reserved. Ru ning late

Title: Smooth ride and friendly
Review: Nice company | Understanding. |  | I missed my coach but I joined the next without hassle and extra cost. |  | Overall my journey was so smooth. | They can do better with internet. It has to be unlimited.

Title: Late on both journeys and one of the…
Review: Late on both journeys and one of the coaches toilet was out of order and some of the charging plug are not working

Title: Don’t bother paying for two empty…
Review: Don’t bother paying for two empty seats, someone will sit there anyway despite saying you paid for two seats fyi. This is my first time choosing flixbus and first my ticket said “no paid order” when they scanned the QR code and I had to tell them my name so I got onto the bus then someone was in my seat and asleep..I sat in the isle next to justify paying for two seats and then at the next stop filled more people up, now i’m crammed on the bus with all my luggage on my lap.

Title: Excellent and comfortable journey
Review: Excellent and comfortable journey. | Would definitely book again.

Title: Brilliant Experience
Review: Absolutely Brilliant !!!!!! From making the booking, pickup and email communication and the onboard experience and welcome from the driver. Can’t fault the entire team.

Title: Customer Service infuriating, and make any issues feel worse
Review: Ive used Flixbus twice. The first time a delay cause missed connection, Customer Services will never refund any part, to put something right. | This time I had a booking problem before I even got on the bus... | I was booking a ticket at £37, it showed pending on my card, but then transaction 'error' message and I never got ticket. | I tried again at £42, 'error' | Tried 3rd time, it worked but then the price was £53 ! | Transactions 1&2 were in a 10minute hold window, artificially rising the price when the third purchase attempt worked. | Even though the extra demand was Me, Me & Me, I paid £15 more than if they hadn't reversed the first attempt. |  | I spoke to Customer Services who said 'this happens with their system', and absolutely wont refund down to first price. Even though tickets now are £37 again, as the other 2 transactions have timed out. |  | Whether this is a deliberate scam, or just a bug that Flixbus benefit from, the fact is they dont care. |  | Flixbus have useless customer relations, and will just fob people off. Its a complete, infuriating, waste of time. They should be held to account. |  | Edit: I emailed Customer services again, telling them what happened, with screenshots, and they replied with an obtuse and factually incorrect non-answer. The reply did not address the point I was showing them. | They also suggested that a number of people may have booked tickets and then cancelled them straight after, all within my sequential booking attempts. An implausible 'fob off' that just makes you feel worse. | Some of the time Flixbus journeys can be ok but if Flixbus could be responsive when things go wrong it would be much better. | They almost have a monopoly on some routes, but I will try and find an alternative because of the way the customer service are :(

Title: Great bus to buy tickets and amend and…
Review: Great bus to buy tickets and amend and get value for money.

Title: Absolutely terrible.
Review: Absolutely terrible. | Travelled from London Victoria to Brugge return journey. The time of the bus was changed three times. Once on the way out and twice on the way back with 20 minutes notice and a 2 hour delay. | The drivers were so rude with no manors. | The coach from Brugge to London Victoria was filthy. The toilet was unreal full up and urine spilling onto the floor! We were shouted at for wanting to use it. It clearly was not cleaned or emptied from the previous journey! |  | Pay a little extra and go with another company. | You have been warned!

Title: Company did not answer my calls when I…
Review: Company did not answer my calls when I tried to see if my bus was running during a storm, when i messaged them to complain I was left on read

Title: Outrageous service
Review: Outrageous service. | Don’t bother booking. The bus collection time was changed 3 times, once going from Victoria to Brugge and twice on the way back. It ran 2 hours late. | The coach was filthy. Rubbish on the seats and floor. We were advised not to use the toilet as it was full. There was urine all over the toilet floor. There were two drivers for both journeys, on both occasions they were so rude and were bullying towards the passengers. there was limited information given so for example when we boarded the ferry the microphone went on and the driver said 5C. That was it no other words.If English was not your first language you had no way of knowing what they meant. I had to help the other passengers. | Pay a bit extra and go with another company!!! | You have been warned.

Title: Great trip
Review: Very comfy bus that came when it was supposed to and was carefully driven, arrived on time too. The coach was clean and the staff polite and helpful.

Title: unacceptable.
Review: Delayed leaving Victoria | Delayed leaving Bruges by over 2 hours | the drivers especially from Bruges were rude and bullish. | the coach was dirty, food on the floor there was no attempt to clean the coach when passengers got off at Bruges and we embarked on the coach. The toilet was locked because it was over flowing and had not been emptied. unacceptable.

Title: Cheap reliable service.
Review: We travelled to Manchester from Middlesbrough was comfortable and really didn't feel like we were on the bus for nearly 3 hours the price was really good so much cheaper than a train would definitely use this service again driver was really good too.

Title: Perfect and would do again
Review: Storm Bert forced us - a family of 4 - to abandon the train and use the coach to travel back to South Wales from London. Coach was new, very clean and a super smooth ride. Power sockets worked and whole process very efficient and arrived on time. Leg room a bit tight for me (6,1) and coach got quite warm and humid. Overall a really positive experience and no sign of profiteering out of the train situation unlike a certain other company. We’re regular train users but would now defo consider using FlixBus again.

Title: AVOID
Review: AVOID - better to throw your money in the river |  | Booked a trip from Bristol airport to Bath for 2 persons. The bus never came, and there was no updated travel information available. We had to buy new tickets with another company. |  | I tried to get a refund for the trip but they keep referring me to the company that they hired as subcontractor. Very unfriendly customer service. |  | Better to throw your money in the river.

Title: Very Simple to Book
Review: Very simple to book

Title: What's with dynamic style pricing for seats, SHOCKING
Review: Not something I do very often however I do feel I need to express my opinion this matter. |  | Use Flix bus they say, it's so cheap compared to other operators. But the whole truth from someone who travels up and down from Scotland every week racking up 1000 every week on the bus. I feel that the information from Flix Bus is very misleading and is only appropriate when you buy your ticket 2 months in advance. However when you look to book a bus at short notice you get hugely stung and have to in some cases pay 3 times the original fair. This is dynamic pricing and is not fair on Customers. In times of austerity where people live week to week, I find this very unfair. The feeling that is received is that Flix Bus would rather have an open seat or have someone pay 2/3 times the price and in many cases these are for longer journeys where you may have to change bus. So instead of a 9hr journey from Scotland to London will take 12hrs due to having to change bus. |  | For a student who travels from Scotland to London every week, my view is that many public transport companies pry on the vulnerability of its customers and their need to get from A to B. |  | Since September I have chosen to travel Via Mega Bus on sheer value on booking buses at shorter notice. |  | I will also conclude that this will not be something that will be addressed on the near future or anytime in the future. FLIX bus will simply run by numbers and dynamic pricing for seats on their buses will remain the same. Let's see how much the price increase reaches by this time next year.

Title: Very poor customer care
Review: Booked a trip in error (booking 3213095072; change of plans) and, as per their T&Cs, cancelled within 60 minutes for what should have a been a full refund but they offered only a voucher without the option of cash. A voucher is useless to me as I won't be able to find a similarly priced booking. Customer service refused to budge or appreciate my situation and gave robotic (automated) responses. |  | I won't be booking with them again.

Title: 5  stars?
Review: Would of given 5 stars but on the journey back the driver swap was delayed due to our new driver going to the wrong place apart from that made good time journey was comfortable fully recommend

Title: Flixbus Prague Florenc to Karlovy Vary day trip
Review: Booked back home in UK, special price for seniors, made sure we had our passports, to prove our ages, Florenc bus station under refurbishment but ok, buses on time, smooth comfortable and safe ride both ways, despite some fog. All at a very reasonable price, and worked like clockwork

Title: so simple and straight forward than you…
Review: so simple and straight forward than you Flixbus

Title: Awful experience.
Review: Awful experience.. | 1. The bus was 30 minutes late. | 2. After bus arrival, we’ve been asked | to wait outside for another 20 minutes in the terrible weather, because the driver was doing his checks. No idea why he couldn’t do it with the passengers inside. |  | 3. Lots of broken staff inside the bus. (USB sockets and other stuff).

Title: Delay
Review: Like always, the bus has too much delay—over 2 hour

Title: Changed the schedule
Review: As a regular Megabus user, we decided to give Flixbus a try for a change. Cardiff to London Victoria was fine which couldn't be said for the return journey. Arrived at London Victoria just after 11.30am for a 12pm departure to Cardiff. On arrival the departure board was not showing a 12pm Flixbus which was the departure time on our ticket. After finding a Flixbus rep via the Megabus customer service, we were told the departure time had changed and the bus had left. The next departure was at 1.30pm and we could get on that if (repeat if) there was room. Not willing to take that risk and also wait nearly 2hrs, we decided to board a Megabus which was leaving at 12pm, this cost us £20 each. So it's back to using Megabus for us as we have never had reliability issues with them.

Title: Bratislava to Vienna
Review: My wife and I took the FlixBus from Bratislava to Vienna and back and not that we are over precious but we simply couldn’t fault either journey. On both occasions the bus was on time, clean, comfortable and the driver was very good giving us a really smooth ride. Would definitely not hesitate to use FlixBus again and definitely recommend them Thankyou FlixBus.

Title: I've used Flixbus quite a few times
Review: I've used Flixbus quite a few times - always had a good experience

Title: Drivers were super friendly
Review: Drivers were super friendly | The ride was smoth | Had no leg room though | Over all I'll ride with Flix bus again

Title: I paid extra for a front row reserved…
Review: I paid extra for a front row reserved seat and the driver didnt let me sit in the front row with leg room |  | Also bathroom couldnt be used the entire drive |  | awful experience i would like a refund

Title: Bought a return ticket to London months…
Review: Bought a return ticket to London months in advance. Changed the departure time. |  | Journey to London was efficient. In London received a text message during the day to so return bus is cancelled. Disgusting caused unwanted stress. Booked with National Express. First and last time I book with flix bus shambles !!!

Title: Not considerate
Review: Last time I went with flixbus, they delayed the bus a few times but it is after this experience of mine that I was motivated to write a review. Due to unforeseen circumstances I came to the bus stop just two minutes before the deadline. The driver was asked if I can come in, he waved no, then waited a minute before driving off. I understand not being able to wait for everyone, but if someone is there, at least let them in! I wasted unnecessary money and got late for an event.

Title: Helpful staff and on time bus

Title: Excellent costumer service

Title: Will always give them -many stars
Review: I wish I could give them less than one star, maybe minus stars? Tried to change my outbound, did not work. Said that my card was not accepted. Tried with several other cards. Not worked again. | Worth mentioning that I did change my inbound, so I have been given a second, different booking number. Used that to change my trip and the booking was showing the old booking number, after using the new one. Called into customer service, it took ages. Dreadful service, do not recommend at all. Avoid!

Review: Scheduled and booked bus from Heathrow to South Wales cancelled. Arrived tired from flight to find my arranged transport was not going to happen. Distressing. I wont use again.

Review: Clear consise and easy to use

Title: After the bus was an hour late I was…
Review: After the bus was an hour late I was denied boarding because they wouldn't accept my Swiss residents card and demanded a passport instead... I had ridden the bus from Zurich to Munich the night before and it wasn't a problem. The ticket checker had personal issues and was very rude. The last time I used flixbus the driver stopped at every stop to smoke and it resulted in us being 2 hours late. This company is really not professional. I'd recommend using another.

Title: Dreadful service, and very poor communication.
Review: After a previous poor experience from Flixbus when a bus was delayed by several hours with little or no explanation, my son took a chance and again booked a bus which was scheduled to leave at 9 am, he arrived in good time but the bus had left early, leaving him very distressed. As a student, he has little money to waste like this. I had to buy him a train ticket to make his journey. We will be looking for compensation, but nothing will make up for the inconvenience and upset caused. Dreadful service.

Title: no refund from flixbus,just useless voucher
Review: i booked a journey on flixbus from glasgow to aberdeen.and by mistake i filled out the booking form wrongly as i am over 60 i put my name on the bkking form twice,after about half an hour i realised my mistake,so i cancelled and asked for a refund for the booking i got wrong,and i tried to get a refund but they said i could only get a voucher for the cost which i cannot use,so i have lost my money and they have took my money,surely because of the timeline they could have gave me a refund,sent two e mails to them,still refused to refund me,just send me a voucher which is useles to me,so be careful filling out forms on flixbus

Review: Left on time and arrived on time. Clean and quiet bus. Safe driver.

Title: Great value and comfortable way to travel
Review: I travelled to Paris from Birmingham with my wife and 11 year old daughter for a few days in the half term holiday. We'd never considered using a bus for this sort of journey before but the flights were expensive and inconvenient, and the trains even more so. | The journey was great - all the buses were near enough on time, and apart from the appalling state of Paris Bercy coach station (Victoria is loads nicer), the journey was very comfortable. There were a few issues - only one of the four buses had the advertised WiFi, and the driver of the Paris-London leg decided that seat reservations didn't apply on his bus. I contacted customer services when I got back though, and they refunded the cost of the seat reservation without any hassle so that was fine. We still got to sit together, just not where we'd booked, unlike the train. Plus I had to drive to Birmingham from mid-Wales to catch the bus in the first place but that's because of where we live. | All in though, great value, comfortable and reliable - we'd definitely do it again. Now if Flixbus could bring themselves to come to mid-Wales, now that Megabus have pulled out of Aberystwyth, everything would be perfect.

Title: Excellent communication
Review: Excellent communication. Polite and helpful drivers. Comfortable seats.

Title: Lille to Antwerp on Sunday evening
Review: Lille to Antwerp on Sunday evening. Safe and fast ride. However, my legroom was fit for a child, while other seats provided more space. Luckily, I was able to find another available seat. The noise and smell next to the toilet was far from comfortable.

Title: A Good Way to Travel
Review: As an American, I fell in love with Cardiff, Wales, UK from the sci-fi series "Torchwood" and "Dr. Who." Due to an accident, my transatlantic was cut short and I wound up with a couple of days extra in the UK. I looked at airfare and at nearly $500.00, more than I could afford. For under $50.00, I booked a round trip ride on a comfortable coach. I highly recommend using Flixbus.

Title: Catalogue of poor service
Review: I took the bus on a return from Birmingham to Paris. I originally booked Bristol to Paris and to change it was cheaper to buy a new ticket for the amended leg as they won’t change part of a ticket. |  | They then got back two hours late Paris to London resulting in me missing my connection and refuse to pay the compensation I’m entitled to under their terms and conditions. The bus was late due to the driver delaying things unnecessarily and it had two huge cracks on the front windscreen. |  | The customer service is appalling and they refuse accountability! Even lieing about their delays.

Review: I traveled on a brand new coach, it was very comfortable and stylish. The driver was very attentive, updating us along the journey. The drive was smooth and before I knew it.. it was time to get off.

The ferry part over the Channel was a lovely part of the journey and haven't done that crossing since I was in my late teens. We would easily travel with Flixbus to other parts of Europe and very happy with the whole experience.

It may not be the fastest way to travel but it's the least stressful and more comfortable than standing on an overcrowded or delayed train. | Good value - Wi-Fi better than the train too. | Have booked my next journey.

I booked them recently from London to Birmingham return. |  | On the outbound leg the toilet was blocked, there was no wifi and I couldn't charge my phone, 3 of the promised amenities on board. On the return the toilet was disgusting, it clearly had not been cleaned, my seat saw soaking wet and I couldn't change as the bus was full, the wifi again didn't work and from my aisle seat I could not reach the charger ports without leaving cables across the passenger beside me.

Title: Unreliable comes to mind .
Review: Unreliable comes to mind or sums up this excuse of a Coach Company . Booked tickets well in advance to pick up me and my partner from Nottingham to take us direct to Heathrow Airport. Thought because of their magnificent advertising we were confident that our transport to Heathrow was 100% especially as we were flying to the Philippines the same day . On the evening before we were to travel on FlixBus around 9pm my partner whilst checking her emails,noticed there was an email from FlixBus saying they had cancelled the coach with no explanation or alternative , might I hasten to add we were to board the bus at 2am leaving us with 5 hours to organise alternative/ reliable transport being National Express. | FlixBus stated that they would compensate us for up to the value of a second class train ticket . To date we haven’t been compensated even after following their protocol of sending them the invoice . | My conclusion of this company if getting to your destination is important don’t use this coach company so AVOID!

Title: Ridiculous experience
Review: I had a ridiculous experience from Birmingham to Bristol on 9/11/24. My bus was delayed by 45 mins, the bus finally arrived at 6:30pm. The ticket shows travel time is 1 hr 55 mins. The driver drive in to Gloucester Service Southbound at 8:10pm. It just 36 mins (32mi) away to destination (Bristol bus station). Driver told us he needs take 45 mins break and the bus will resume at 9:00pm. OMG!!!!!!! It totally unfair for all customers take a long break with driver and unacceptable. | Of course, if driver feeling unwell or bus technical issue need to cool down, I fully understand the situation. However, I don't think any issues happened. | How ridiculous the driver need to take 45 mins break for just 2 hrs journey. If I need to catch the other bus or flight who to bear this delay? | If 45 mins break per every trip (no matter the distance) is your company policy for driver, you should included into the travel time, customer can aware the total travel time. | Finally, I spent total 4 hours for 87mi! !!!!!!

Title: Poor customer service and uncomfortable travel conditions
Review: **Trustpilot Review for FlixBus** |  | Rating: ★☆☆☆☆ |  | I had a terrible experience with FlixBus and would not recommend it to anyone. My bus was delayed by over an hour, and FlixBus did a poor job informing passengers about what was happening. I was left stranded at an outdoor bus stop in 6°C weather at 11 pm with no update, shelter, or support from the company. |  | When the bus finally arrived, both the driver and the assistant were rude and dismissive. Neither spoke English, which made it impossible to ask any questions or get help. The bus was freezing inside with no blankets provided, making the already uncomfortable situation even worse. To top it off, the driver played loud music throughout the night, which could be heard even on the upper deck, making it impossible to get any rest. |  | This was one of the worst travel experiences I’ve ever had. If you’re considering FlixBus, be aware of their lack of communication, poor customer service, and uncomfortable travel conditions. I strongly recommend looking at other options, such as train (even if there are 2-3 changes).

AND NO CUSTOMER SERVICES EITHER? 8AM TO 8PM MONDAY TO SUNDAY MY ASS. YOURE SHUT RIGHT NOW. IM FURIOUS. And if you reply with an apology, you can simply shove your apology up your dumb asses. Title: Worst Company and Useless Customer Service
Review: This has to be the worst Coach company in the uk. Got on the Flix bus service UK-N11 from Edinburgh to Aberdeen on the 12th of October 2024. On getting to Aberdeen later than scheduled time. In a hurry to meet up with my next bus to Portlethen, I accidentally left my luggage in the bus luggage compartment. On realizing my error, i dashed back to the bus stance but the bus driver had just shut the door and about to begin his manoeuvre. He didn't even acknowledge me despite my yelling and chasing the bus. Immediately reported the missing luggage to Flixbus. Didn't get a response until 12 days later saying they had found my luggage and it was safe at one of their depots. Responded immediately wit the required information. Fast forward to 8 days later, i got an email saying they don't have my luggage. Called the customer service a couple of time and i must say the customer service representatives are the most appalling, clueless and useless reps ever. No idea of their company product, processes and no understanding of their job roles. One had the Audacity to hang up the call after yelling at me. Its been emails after emails to the Lost and found email address, with no response. Lets not mention the losses i'm having to count and the mental torture their shambolic service has caused myself and my family. We have offered to drive down to whatever depot the luggage is been held to retrieve it but they have refused to give details. | I'll be taking my time and give the a month after which i'll be taking legal action against them. Already raised a complaint and no response yet. | Advice all and sundry to avoid them like a plague. They are as useless as the K in KNEE.

Title: Not a Reliable Service
Review: The Bus Route is wrong from Coming from Glasgow to Manchester. Lancaster there was about 2 people to pick up. They got held in Morning Traffic School Traffic and Work Traffic. They spent 3 hours in Preston alone..3 hours late is something I can't use for reliable service. Maybe it would help if they sold snacks and drinks like in the Trains Rubbish Service I urinated in a bottle because the Toilet was out if order

Recommended

Title: Glasgow to Inverness
Review: Saturday 2nd November 2024, Glasgow to Inverness. First time going by coach, amazing price, clean comfortable, free WiFi, very pleasant helpful driver. Returning journey Sunday 3rd November 2024 exactly the same experience, thanked our driver Jack for getting us home safe and sound. Highly recommend 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Title: I had a shocking and distressing…
Review: I had a shocking and distressing experience with FlixBus on September 28, which I believe travelers should be aware of when considering this company. What should have been a simple journey from Middlesbrough to London turned into a traumatic ordeal due to the behavior of the crew. |  | The bus was 30 minutes late, leaving my relative and me waiting outside at midnight in near-freezing conditions. The bus stop itself was just a local stop, with no shelter to protect us from the cold, wind, or potential rain, and there were no toilet facilities. We were both freezing and uncomfortable by the time the bus arrived, and I asked a simple question about the delay and how long we’d need to wait to board. |  | To my surprise, the female driver responded with aggression and outright hostility. She shouted at me, telling me that she was "the boss" and that she didn’t need to answer my questions. Her attitude quickly escalated, and she even threatened not to let me on the bus. I tried to explain that I had a connecting flight to catch, but when I stood at the bus entrance, the driver and her colleague blocked my way, attempting to shut the door in my face. At that moment, I genuinely feared for my safety, feeling vulnerable, humiliated, and deeply unsettled. Being verbally attacked, physically blocked from boarding the bus, and made to feel vulnerable in such a dangerous situation has left me with serious concerns about my safety when traveling with FlixBus |  | In the end, I had no choice but to apologize repeatedly just to be allowed on board. This behavior was not just unfriendly—it was abusive and entirely unprofessional. |  | As someone with a traumatic disorder, the incident left me shaken and in tears for much of the journey. This was an appalling experience, especially for my first trip with FlixBus. I had heard positive things about their service in other countries, but my experience in the UK has been anything but reassuring. |  | I have since reached out to FlixBus, hoping they’ll take serious action to prevent similar incidents in the future. If you’re planning to travel with FlixBus, especially in the UK, please be aware that customer service and accountability may not meet expectations, as my experience has shown.

Title: I took my journey from albafura to Lisbon…
Review: I took my journey from albafura to Lisbon and back with flix bus. I downloaded the app which is extremely simple to use. I had no issues booking tickets. The bus stops were easy to find and the coaches were smooth and reasonably comfortable. We stopped halfway on the journey at the services for a toilet break. Visiting Lisbon was amazing and I would recommend it to everyone. You can buy a day pass/ticket for the trains, trams and busses for around 6.80 euro in the station below the bus depot. This will get you everywhere. The only struggle I had was which side to get on the transport in Lisbon. The information available is very difficult to understand. Don't be afraid to ask the Portuguese are very helpful and speak good English.

Title: They should travel with Flix Bus because it is the best Bus.
Review: The experience for me with Flix Bus it was great and amazing.

Title: RACIST RUDE DRIVER
Review: RACIST RUDE DRIVER |  | Trip Details: | Date: November 1, 2024 | Departure: 13:10 from London Finchley Road | Arrival: 15:35 at Leicester St. Margaret’s | Bus Line: UK005, Direction Leicester |  | I had an extremely disappointing experience on my recent FlixBus journey (Bus Line UK005 from London Finchley Road to Leicester St. Margaret’s on November 1, 2024). The driver’s behavior was appalling—rude and unprofessional from the start. Midway through the trip, he abruptly stopped the bus and started yelling at passengers about using their phones, creating a tense and uncomfortable atmosphere. He targeted a young Chinese woman specifically, making offensive, racist comments, and attempted to mock her conversation. The driver appeared exhausted, as though he hadn’t slept in days, and his aggressive demeanor only heightened the anxiety on board. This kind of treatment is unacceptable, and I sincerely hope FlixBus addresses this issue to ensure future passengers aren’t subjected to such disrespectful behavior.

Title: Very good experience.
Review: Very good experience. |  | Smooth transfer and on time.

Title: Drivers too rude and unfriendly
Review: Drivers most of them too old . They can’t handle luggage. Also speaking to passengers quite rude .

Title: Travelling with two young children
Review: Travelling with two young children can be a nightmare but travelling with Flixbus was a dream. The seats were comfortable and spacious and the bus was clean. The bus tracker on the app meant that we were able to see where the bus was and how long we had to get snacks before our journey. Thank you Hayley Russell for the recommendation- we would definitely use Flixbus again.

Title: It was a nice trip
Review: It was a nice trip, except Wi-Fi not working.

Title: Very good thought and encouraging…
Review: Very good thought and encouraging driver gave us sweets and was very thought reminding everyone that they matter on this earth

Title: The driver was very good
Review: The driver was very good, he explained the trip, asked if everyone was OK, and got us to the destination on time.

Title: Excellent
Review: Punctual, clean and modern bus, and cheaper than their competitors. What's not to like.

Title: Bang on time
Review: Bang on time. Clean. Plenty of legroom. Working Wi-Fi. Decent price, too. |  | I’ll be back!

Title: Great, affordable service.
Review: Have used the services of Flix a few time. Swift, affordable, clean and a pleasant journey. | Comfortable and access to usb charger ports.

Title: I was denied boarding when travelling…
Review: I was denied boarding when travelling to Paris as I didn’t not bring a car seat to travel with for children 3 and under, nowhere on the booking site does it state such a vital piece of information when booking. The coach staff were extremely rude and handled the situation in the worst way possible in front of me my 1 year old child and many bystanders I went back and forth with customer service and they refused to give me a full refund stating that the information is on there help section on their website however vital information should be stated when booking so adequate arrangements can be made before travelling not everyone has access to a car seat had I known I wouldn’t of booked that method of travel first and last time booking with FlixBus.

Title: Hey can I change my booking the other…
Review: Hey can I change my booking the other way

Title: It was great
Review: It was great. There isn't much space to put your legs but for the price I am well happy.

Title: The perfect ride
Review: The bus was on time. Drivers changed in Newport. | Nice leg room, comfy seats and a USB charger on every seat. Very pleased with the price too

Title: Good service from Brussels to…
Review: Good service from Brussels to Amsterdam. Bus was clean and comfy. Driver was helpful and drove smoothly. Wi-Fi didn’t really work and the signs to the bus stop could have been better, but all in all would do it again

Title: Avoid.
Review: Booked a trip for February, the event was cancelled so I cancelled my trip. They put my refund in to an unwanted travel voucher and demanded I accept this. When I requested my own money, that was not owed to them as I had no received any form of service, they said no, even though on their website it says you have the legal right to be refunded in to your bank. | I ended up contacting my bank who claimed the refund on my behalf. Would never recommend them again..

Title: Lots of leg room
Review: Lots of leg room, friendly driver, bus was clean and comfortable. I managed to book this last minute and was still able to reserve a seat.

Title: Comfortable and reliable transport with…
Review: Comfortable and reliable transport with a nice driver from York to Manchester. On time.

Title: Comfortable
Review: A comfortable, convenient and inexpensive travel solution.

Title: Excellent work and very polite drivers…
Review: Excellent work and very polite drivers so I enjoy travelling with FlixBus and my son also .

Title: On time nice bus driver
Review: On time nice bus driver, very good experience

Title: From Toronto to Nigeria falls was…
Review: From Toronto to Nigeria falls was amazing warm comfortable seating polite driver and on time

Title: Great experience with Flix Bus from London to Birmingham!!!
Review: Great experience with Flix Bus from London to Birmingham. Very convenient. Friendly driver that was very kind and willing to help with the bags. Would highly recommend FlixBus!!

Title: Great value and experience. I will use again.
Review: The booking process quick & easy. | The condition of the coach is great, comfy seating and WiFi/charging ports. | Seating can be confusing as people don't realise they have seating allocated and people sitting in the wrong seats. So check your seating prior. | Pick up/ drop off points not very clear. I think maps would be good so no confusion. Bus stop location should be clear.

Title: Do not ever ever ever use Flixbus - ever.
Review: Do not ever ever ever use Flixbus - ever. Appalling. |  | Booked, paid for, 100% confirmed Bristol > London > Ghent Oct 27-8 2024. Long voyage with a 6 hour wait from 01h to 07h in Victoria Bus Station. Refused boarding. |  | Reason: nothing wrong with my ticket, they had just decided not to stop at Ghent and Den Haag (even though it was still up there on the bus 'header'). Without informing me and the six other people with perfectly valid tickets. Took ages for the Flixbus people at the station to find this out, because they had not been told in advance either. Fundamental, appalling, incompetent and insane non-service, |  | Their 'excuse'? 'Operational reasons'. The email came in 20 minutes after the bus left the terminal. Can't even spell 'cancellation' properly. |  | The remedies? Wait until the evening bus (delaying my trip by many many hours when already I had waited hours without sleep), get a full refund, and/or take 2nd class train, that I pay for up front and then wait on them to reimburse me. As if I believe they ever would. |  | I'm a (now very tired) female old age pensioner! For sure I'm going do my best to make them pay for this chaos and discomfort.

Title: Outstanding customer service
Review: Bus driver very friendly and helpful at Edinburgh bus station 745 this morning. After a late flight into Manchester and a 7 hr bus ride with a small child, we arrived at Edinburgh and couldn’t get the FlixBus app to load to book the last leg of our trip, was panicking about not making the bus but he was able to help me find the route and pay and totally calmed me down. Outstanding service! Seats were really comfy, could recline, and all had usb sockets, very clean, perfect temperature, WiFi, surprised how low price they are for the level of service and comfort you get compared to other bus companies. Also used the service Vejle to Copenhagen and bus was great. Will be using Flix bus as my go-to for travel from now on. 5 star 🌟

Title: Punctual
Review: Punctual. Good driving. Friendly driver. | It would be 5 star if there are different USB types for power source.

Title: Provide onboarding  SOP to driver with considering FIFO
Review: I came to the Newport bus stop 8:30 am with my family,bus was schedule to start at 8:50 am,it arrived at 8:45 am, the driver who drived the previous shift shouted at me without any reason and he went to load baggages without considering FIFO ,its ok if I was alone,I had to carry my baby and were waiting at the door 7min even I came early, but after that another driver came and drove the bus to London.(042). When we were returning to newport from London (21:30) there was lady driver and she is good and her onboarding method was different.Both trips we had good comfortable time.

Title: Way cheaper than National Express!
Review: My first try with Flixbus. The search engine, booking and payment process is very smooth. The fare is cheap (£10.99) but take note that it charges a £1 booking fee, but it still works out much cheaper and better timing than NatExp (£25.20!). Compared the two companies before you book.

Title: My bus is delayed for 3 hours 19…
Review: My bus is delayed for 3 hours 19 minutes. | The trip was Kopenhag to Berlin 08.00 a.m. to 16.50 |  | The customer service is rejected to make a refund. |  | Please don't trust their terms of policy which is written in website. |  | That was totally unsatisfying and frustrating experience that i had

Title: First trip. Good experience.
Review: Was overall very pleased with my recent trip Paris to Lisbon. Seats are a bit small particularly when seat in front reclines but comfortable too. Was content too with temperature control. The bus is kept at a lower temperature which is much better than being too warm. Four stops en route for a comfort break and well timed. One stop for 35 minutes allowed for hot food. Good value for money and no baggage restrictions as I could see. Would use again for long distance travel. Cuts airport hassle and I enjoyed the scenery too for such trips.

Title: Great value
Review: On time ,clean , no problems, great value for money, | If you have long legs then maybe leg room will be issue , but for the average size person comfy will use a lot more often

Title: I was charged adult ticket for 2 years old baby
Review: I was travelling with my family, myself, my wife and 3 kids from Munich to Zurich. I booked online on advance, I couldn't entre the details of my 2 years old baby. The supervisor at the station charged me extra ticket for adult with EUR 60.99. Horrible experience.

Title: My journey 26 Oct 2024 for 16:40 from…
Review: My journey 26 Oct 2024 for 16:40 from Manchester- Shudehill interchange to London Victoria was severely delayed for over 45mins. | Kind regards, | Ifeoma Ahumibe

Title: Great service
Review: We missed the 6pm coach as we thought ours was delayed 15 minutes but we were on arrivals rather then departures. Staff at victoria station were brilliant and we got on the 6.30. Many thanks, great service 👍

Title: We had travel from Edinburgh to…
Review: We had travel from Edinburgh to Aberdeen. It was the worst travelling until now. It was everything fine to Dundee but from there it was horrible. The driver took up some young people, between age 12-17 and they had a really bad behaviour. They was smoking and drinking all that way, and having party with music and shouting all the way. It was horrible to watch it with my 6 year old son,who was really tired and couldn't sleep because of it. And the driver didn't even try to speak with them. It was really sad. I hope you will be able to do something about this kind of behaviour on the bus. Thank you

Title: Traveled for the first time with…
Review: Traveled for the first time with Flixbus on a 8 hour long round trip & with no overnight stay, I was highly impressed how good of a experience it was for me, since my major concern when traveling is my back injury, their seats are well designed for that kind of issue, all the extra conveniences like phone charger, internet, etc make the trip a lot more relaxing and the staff were friendly and very professional. Had our short breaks to get off the bus which is helpful to change the routine & get some leg stretches and fresh air. To add, each person has a place to put their feet higher which helps the blood flow of the legs, that's another good health consideration they've put into their high standards of comfort which I absolutely loved those extra touches.

Title: Quality
Review: Quality, timing ,charm and kind

Title: Very comfortable
Review: Bus was very comfortable. Timely departure and arrival. Staff were nice

Title: My experience was great thank you
Review: My experience was great thank you

Title: Avoid this scam company at all costs
Review: Avoid this scam company at all costs. They charge fees for nothing! If you try to change your travel date well in advance, you’ll be forced to pay 80% of your ticket price. And if you attempt to cancel your booking, they’ll only refund 25% of the amount you originally paid. Unbelievable scam!

Title: Hot and smelly
Review: It was extremely hot and smelly and all the passengers were gathered at the back, we were told we couldn't use the empty seats at the front even though there were no passengers there for the whole trip...when we asked to switch off the heating, the aircon was put at full blast and we were freezing

Title: Best and easy
Review: Best and easy

Title: Great service - great prices
Review: Great service - kept to schedule. Clean bus, good WiFi. Much better to go to main bus station as a final destination than be dropped off on a back street as happened with competitor when I travelled with them. Great prices too.

Title: My travel from London to Cardiff is…
Review: My travel from London to Cardiff is always ruined by 30-40mins waiting time in Newport waiting for a driver running late. You guys are no different from megabus always running late. You guys can do better

Title: dont use this company if you have a…
Review: dont use this company if you have a connection to make. I was 12 hours late and didn't receive any form of refund. Communication is appalling.

Title: First time I booked my trip using this…
Review: First time I booked my trip using this company.I had never heard of it before but the price is unbeatable compared to the other major bus company!The journey duration and the departure times are so convenient they won me over!Hope they keep up the good service.

Title: Appalling experience
Review: What a shocking experience. Astounded that such a vehicle is allowed on the roads. Non functioning toilet in a dilapidated bus that should have been removed off the roads long ago. Not a single functioning power / USB point, tray tables loose and not maintained, seats could not adjust, and then mechanical issues with the vehicle too. And it arrives two hours late, so you miss your connecting travel. And Flixbus' standard response - you boarded the bus, so no refund or any compensation. How are you supposed to make alternative plans after you were supposed to depart? Zero "delay repay" type of compensation. Like what else are you supposed to do - you're at your departure point and then get told 30 mins after you were supposed to leave that the bus will be there in a further hour's time. Appalling company. Completely unreliable. And don't bother making plans at all at your destination until such time as you actually arrive as they are always late, and usually by 2 or more hours.

Title: Clean modern coaches
Review: Clean modern coaches, keeping to time schedule. With good selection of coaches during the day to my destination (Heathrow terminal 2).

Title: Bus driver
Review: I don't normally do this but you've forced me to file a complaint here after ignoring the chats and no response from you today 23.10.24 your driver at 6am towards London in front of the Hammersmith flyover with registration number (if you ask i will give to you) almost caused two collisions he was driving like a maniac he was tailgating almost everyone who was driving at the speed limit and he was driving above the speed limit, there are not enough insulting words to describe his driving I demand a full investigation into his case, how can someone like that be trusted with a bus I regret I don't have a dashcam because he should lose his driving license for life

Title: Bus on time
Review: Bus on time | Price fantastic | Clean &comfortable | Driver helpful

Title: It may be cheaper at first but it's a false economy purchase
Review: First time to use the Flixbus and due to this I made sure I was at the location early as informed using the 'what 3 words' on the app. I waited and both the Newcastle and London bus pulled in at the specified spot which is a pull in at a Hotel in Leeds. However, no sight of the Bristol Bus. I asked the driver of the London if he had any update as nothing came up on the app to advise. He didn't have a clue. It was after that another couple of people waiting for the bus advised that apparently the bus stopped across the busy road rather than the designated area and had already left. This left me stranded on a Sunday. There is no option to speak to anyone as the Flixbus offices are closed at weekend. So at a huge expense I had to find an alternative to travel the 200 plus miles to get home. On Monday the reply was 'other people got on'. Where is the checking, obviously I was expecting it to come where the other buses were pulling into? Nobody came over or yelled out for Bristol. I do not wish to use again and would expect the fare to be refunded but they are refusing. Save your money, this bus company is a false economy. Worst customer service, it's cheap for a reason.

Title: Often using Flix bus
Review: Often using Flix bus, they are always reliable and comfortable to travel with

Title: Great stuff 👏
Review: Great stuff 👏

Review: All been on time staff are friendly and helpful

Title: Comfortable
Review: Flixbus, half the price of megabus, comfortable seats that recline, driver announced the drop off points, clean toilet on board. Drivers are extremely nice, chat with passengers. Felt comfortable and safe all through journey.

Title: Very easy booking system
Review: Very easy booking system, lots of times to choose from

Title: Its first time and it was simple
Review: Its first time and it was simple

Title: An awful experience
Review: An awful experience. Was left In Brussels on a journey from Venice to London. Our luggage was on the bus .Some has been found but after 12 weeks I've been emailing the partner company to get this back but getting no reply .This is ridiculous all I want is some correspondence from them

Title: Bus delayed
Review: We were supposed to get a bus from Matera to Bari for our flight home but the bus was delayed by 2 hours we would never have found this out as no notification whatsoever. Only from the help of a kind Italian speaking passenger, who arranged a mini bus taxi for us all to share and get to Bari (Monday 21st October)

Title: Safe with a good driver
Review: Safe with a good driver. Comfortable seats, value for money

Review: Reliable service

Title: Amazing journey.
Review: Amazing journey on a punctual, clean and comfortable bus which was professionally driven.

Review: Excellent service and good clear booking guidance

Review: Easy booking great times
