Review: On time, comfy and great value

Title: Amazing trip
Review: Buses are too comfortable smooth trip from berlin to poznz,timetables are sharp

Title: The drivers were brilliant we arrived…
Review: The drivers were brilliant we arrived at our destination ahead of schedule nice and tidy bus

Title: Excellent and very good service
Review: Excellent and very good service

Title: It wasn’t until after I finished…
Review: It wasn’t until after I finished booking and paid that it indicated summer row, when I’d asked for Birmingham coach station

Title: First class online booking no hastle
Review: First class online booking no hastle, very easy to use and customer service is 5 star. I have spoken to surgen over the phone. He was precise and to the point, solve the problem in few minutes as I messed up online booking! Thank you very much!

Title: Fast,easy booking
Review: Fast,easy booking

Title: The bus was on time (both departure and…
Review: The bus was on time (both departure and arrival),it was clean and very comfortable

Title: Day out to Bristol
Review: Good service | Very reasonably priced

Title: More than 50 percent of the times bus…
Review: More than 50 percent of the times bus is delayed

Title: Worst company experience
Review: Per the last review I left the company got upset I guarantee. Can't tell me otherwise that you don't do that my experience was genuine as were the people waiting there for hours for no real explanation then the Driver never showed up and I did wait for 8 hours. You were not there and you cannot claim that other wise. |  | They can get all upset that they want. This company is completely mismanaged and this was the US not sure how the UK varies but it must be better there. Greyhound owns them in the US I guess and the whole experience was a nightmare and just gross negligence on part of the company, The people who work the bus stop are not at fault it's the policies for the drivers. Do better and maybe don't think a review is unrealistic because FlixBus is trying to save face. Yes just bow to corporate interests who cares what the customer thinks right? |  | I would give no stars but that's not possible....

Title: Perfect experience
Review: Perfect experience ! Thank you!

Title: Very clean & spacious buses
Review: Very clean & spacious buses . Polite & helpful drivers.

Title: IT VERY EASY TO USE THANKS
Review: IT VERY EASY TO USE THANKS

Title: Rather expensive but …
Review: Rather expensive but fairly straightforward to book.

Title: I didn't had a good experience
Review: I didn't had a good experience. | First when I went to the bus stop, the bus was on the other side of the station, when I approached the bus driver told me I had to pic up on the other side, what it was okay by me. | When he move bus to stance G he opened the door asked for the last 3 number of certain booking but never asked for my booking number. | I had to go and show him and frown at me, the I had a small bag in my hand with 4 cinnamon pretzel he asked what I had in the bag I told him what it was, then he asked if I have anything else aside from the pretzel, liquids or other stuff. | I responded no. | Then he proceed to open my bag without asking, when I look at his face is stopped. He had no right to do that especially without asking my permission to search my bag. I felt I was racially profiled. But didn't said anything. | I went up the stairs an most of the front seat was unoccupied, so I decided to seat In the front row of seat on the left side near to window and nearly beside the driver, because I like to enjoy the view and because was no one there I thought why not? | As soon everyone was inside the bus driver came in side of the bus an in a rude way asked me, what I was doing there and very sure was not the number I have been placed when I bought the ticket, so for me to leave the place go and seat at number place that I was allocated. I could see the racism on the tone of is voice, and the disgust in is face. | I was in shock. | How can a human being trate another human like this? | This his appalling that we are In twenty first century and we still people thinking they are superior than others because of their colour skin or their religion. I don't know, but that is ludicrous, yes it is. | But well what can the company do? | Maybe a back ground check perhaps would make a significant. | So people will not be in this situation.

Title: Comfortable trip and good driver. No destinations signs
Review: An easy 2 hour trip.Seats could be cleaner, especially headrests but seats were comfortable. Good driver. | Unhappy about lack of signage as to where the bus was going. | A mass of Flixbuses with not one indicating destination and no one to advise was infuriating.

Title: So clean
Review: So clean, comfy, on time and friendly staff. I love it

Title: Not reliable poor service and refund and compensation policy
Review: How on earth has this company got 4.5 DO NOT USE THIS BUS SERVICE.. my reason for being as follows I booked a return ticket to go to London Gatwick airport at 1.20am on 30th September as I was going away with my wife the bus came at the time started we got on the coach but that’s as far as we got. The driver said there was nobody to take over the driving and the next bus would come for me and my wife and other passengers at 4.30 well that’s no good to me there are now trains at 1.45 at this time and had no other way to get to the airport a taxi would have cost from Newport wales to London Gatwick would have cost a fortune so I rang around friends must who had work at 8am mana to get a friend to give us a lift cost £100 petrol managed to get to the airport for our flight and enjoy our holiday. We came back what a surprise the bus was late but at least I got home I rang up customer service after 7 attempts trying to get through on their automated phone system and spoke to a man who was no help at all after me telling him what happened and that I had to pay £100 petrol to a friend to take me to the airport so I don’t loose my holiday I asked for a refund for my ticket and compensation for the petrol I had to pay and was told I due to company policy I would only get £24 seriously.. SO EVERYONE YES ITS CHEAP BUT IS IT WORTH BEING LATE FOR A MEETING OR GOING TO THE AIRPORT OR JUST TO GO SOMEWHERE AND IT DONT TURN UP ITS NOT USE NATIONAL EXPRESS

Title: Punctual and affordable
Review: From Arlanda to Stockholm Central | The bus came on time, the driver was friendly and helpful putting luggage in the hold | It was very cheap which was very affordable | I couldn’t see any signage with the WiFi information. I think it would be good to put stickers on the windows with the information on by each seat.

Title: Impressive Assistance with Lost Item – Thank You, Ciise!
Review: I recently traveled to Birmingham and accidentally left my Apple Watch behind. Upon returning to London the next day, I reached out to Ciise, a FlixBus representative, for assistance. He went above and beyond to help me, coordinating with the team in Birmingham to locate my watch and have it safely returned to London the following day. Thanks to Ciise’s exceptional support, I’ve just received my watch, and I couldn’t be more grateful. His professionalism and dedication make him a true asset to FlixBus.

Title: Excellent Bus network
Review: The bus network round the countries is excellent. Thank you flixBus, you are flexible indeed.

Title: Excellent
Review: On time, comfy and fast travel. Will be using plenty more times.

Title: Great
Review: Bradley and Ciise were very helpful, found the right bus at London Victoria on time! And got to Sheffield, meanwhile National Express had no staff at the station to help.

Title: The worst customer service imaginable
Review: On the basis of our experience you should avoid FlixBus like the plague! We booked tickets from A Coruña to Pontevedra, for a service operated by their "partner", Monbus due to leave at 10:00. On the day of travel we received messages about the bus being delayed. but these were never updated to indicate that the bus was approaching/arriving at A Coruña. Worse, the link FlixBus sent that claimed to show the "live" location of the bus never showed it getting anywhere near A Coruña! Nevertheless, we waited at the designated departure bay. A MonBus bus, displaying a Pontevedra destination, arrived at those bays - and its driver promptly left the bus without saying anything to the queue of passengers. | While the driver was away another MonBus bus pulled into the arrival bays, discharged passengers, moved elswhere (not into any of the departure bays!) and shortly afterwards left the bus station. | When the driver returned to the bus in the departure bay and we presented our ticket she said that hers was the 11:15 departure and she couldn't accept our tickets (she SEEMED to say that this was because they were issued by FlixBus, but language difficulties mean 'm not certain about this). She insisted we bought new tickets in order to make our journey. | On taking this up with FlixBus they insisted they could do nothing about it and we would have to take the matter up directly with MonBus. | Note that despite the journey being on a relatively busy Saturday morning, there were no FlixBus or MonBus staff in evidence at the bus station, no passenger information apart from a departure board in the main waiting concourse (which is on a higher level than the departure/arrival bays), and no passenger announcements. | It seems that FlixBus's attitude to customer service is that they'll happily take your money, and if all goes well they'll take the credit. But if anything goes wrong they'll wash their hands of you!

Title: Closed washroom, bad wifi, more stops
Review: Washroom was closed and there were at least two more stops than noted on my itinerary. The lady sitting beside me was going to miss her train as a result. Wifi didn’t work for the last half of the trip. Not what I expected at all. Driver was also a bit condescending.

Title: I took the flixbus from Porto airport…
Review: I took the flixbus from Porto airport to Vila Real and the experience was a good one apart from a couple of minor irritations. The bus itself was clean and comfortable. The ticket booked online incredibly cheap and the driver polite and helpful. The bus was a little later than expected but that's no big deal to me as one would expect occasional delays in a big city. Arrival at Vila Real was as expected pretty much on time. My ticket seemed to have a seat number that didn't exist which may have been an issue if the bus had more passengers. I also was unable to connect to the WiFi network on board which in a way I was thankful for because it meant I spent more time looking out of the window at some stunning landscapes. Other people who use the Internet more may have found this a bigger irritation. All in all a good experience and I would use flixbus again.

Title: Could’ve been cheaper
Review: Could’ve been cheaper rather than

Title: Not received lost property even though its found…
Review: We lost a valuable backpack on a coach from London to Cardifd, I was quite unwell so I forgot my backpack on the overhead luggage. Lost property took a while to locate the bag but even after following recovery instructions we still have not received our backpack. It has been over a month and a half. The funny thing is they emailed us a picture telling us they found it. Lost property and customer service as calls did not help at all.

Title: Easy for booking
Review: Easy for booking

Title: I use Flixbus all the time and it has…
Review: I use Flixbus all the time and it has been always a great experience and a great trip!!!

Title: So bad
Review: So bad . Wasting our time and money. Not recommend to anyone. Sterling our money.

Title: Good value for money
Review: I was really scared to use it after reading bad reviews. | But it was good value for money.. arrived on time . Reached little late in London. | But overall it was smooth travel.

Title: We spent 7 days in Bratislava-amazing…
Review: We spent 7 days in Bratislava-amazing city, amazing food and people too. Used Flix bus for trip to Vienna and Budapest. Clean, precise, lovely service and staff.

Title: Excellent Value for Money
Review: I travelled from Bristol to Manchester to take part in a national conference and stayed with my daughter who now lives there. She recommended FlixBus as the easiest way to make the journey - and I was very pleased that I took her advice. |  | The coach was clean and comfortable and the outward and return journeys both ran on time. Because I had booked online well in advance the round trip cost less than £13.00, which I think is astounding value for money. |  | My wife and I will be spending Chritsmas in Manchester and we shall certainly travel by FlixBus.

Title: After a "No Show" 12.40am Ploermel…
Review: After a "No Show" 12.40am Ploermel 56800 .. 16/10 2024.. we contacted Flix Bus the same day ..they were very apologetic and gave a full refund .. Thank you ..

Title: Excellent service
Review: Friendly driver, clean bus. No complaints.

Title: Trip to Fatima
Review: Comfortable journey

Title: No delay
Review: No delay | Affordable | Comfortable seat

Title: Travelled from Cardiff to London…
Review: Travelled from Cardiff to London Gatwick. Excellent service , bus arrived on time, clean bus and drivers were very courteous . Will definitely be using Flix bus service for my journeys from now on.

Title: NEVER AGAIN
Review: Appalling service.. waited until I’d begun outward journey to cancel my return, told me they couldn’t refund both journeys even though I wouldn’t have set off if I’d known I couldn’t get home. They reluctantly agreed to refund my alternative journey home but I’ve sent all the proof they asked for and I’m still waiting for my refund weeks later 🤯🤯 would never use again |  | EDIT. -NOW ALMOST A MONTH SINCE MY JOURNEY STILL NO REFUND

Title: I COME WITH LAST BUS TO LONDON I MISS…
Review: I COME WITH LAST BUS TO LONDON I MISS MY CONNECTION AND IT WAS EXPENSIVE FOR TO HET NEXT ONE. THANKS

Title: Trip to Glasgow
Review: We went to Glasgow with Flixbus and found the experience to be straightforward. The bus going out was half hour late but as we were leaving very early morning, we made up time. Coming back we got in about 10 minutes early. Will definitely be booking again.

Title: Excellent friendly efficient service
Review: Excellent friendly efficient service ! Punctual ,value for money ,clean comfortable buses! Very friendly helpful drivers! What more could you ask for??

Title: THE DRIVER OF FLIXBUS STOPPED AT NORTON…
Review: THE DRIVER OF FLIXBUS STOPPED AT NORTON CANES SERVICE STATION GIVING NO INSTRUCTION OF HIS TIME THERE ALLOWING OTHER PASSENGERS TO GET OFF AND SMOKE. I HAD AN EXTREMELY SWIFT WEE IN THE CLOSE TOILET CAME OUT AND HE HAD DRIVEN OFF LEAVING ME STRANDED HUNDREDS OF MILES FROM MY DESTINATION WITH ALL MY BELONGINGS COAT, GLASSES LUGGAGE ON BOARD. TOTALLY CARELESS AND VASTLY UNDER PROFESSIONAL THING TO DO. OUTRAGOUS AND CARELESS COSTING ME A FORTUNE IN CABS TO GET HOME SAFELY . | THE DRIVER GAVE NO ANNOUNCEMENT OR TIME OF STOPPING AND WENT MISSING NOT ALLOWING PASSENGERS TO EVEN ASK HIM. | APPAULING CARELESS ACTIONS. LEAVING ME STRANDED WITH ALL MY BELONGINGS OVER MY SEAT WITH LEFT LUGGAGE AND COAT ONTOP. I WAS ONLY LESS THAN 90 SECONDS ON A SWIFT WEE VISIT TO THE NEARBY LOO. I WAS LEFT FREEZING COLD WITHOUT MY BELONGINGS COSTING LARGE SUMS IN CAB JOURNEYS HOME, LEFT STRANDED OVER 170 MILES FROM MY DESTINATION. | THE DRIVER NEVER BOTHERED TO DO NUMBER COUNTS AND COULD VLEARLY SEE I WAS MISSING.

Title: Lille,France - London,UK experience
Review: Nice journey 😊👍. I recommend to anyone.

Title: Easy, smooth & fab value.
Review: Such a comfortable ride, a friendly professional driver and a great price. We made the right choice!

Title: Extremely Disappointing Experience with FlixBus
Review: I recently traveled on FlixBus from London Finchley Road(Stop CL) to Newcastle upon Tyne on 14/10/2024 at 08:00 AM (bus plate number: SG24 UGO) and had a deeply disappointing experience. My seat number was 2A, and unfortunately, the journey was marred by the unprofessional behavior of a staff member. |  | After departing from Luton, a passenger behind me, who turned out to be a driver’s assistant, aggressively shook my seat and rudely shouted at me, claiming I was pushing my seat too far back. His hostile tone left me shocked and stressed for the rest of the trip. Rather than simply moving to the empty seat next to him, he chose to confront me in an unacceptable manner. |  | This individual had been assisting passengers with their luggage in Sheffield and Leeds, and his aggressive behavior is not what I expect from FlixBus staff. I felt uncomfortable and unable to relax throughout the journey. |  | As a result of this incident, I will not be using FlixBus services again. It is a shame to have staff members with such a mentality working for a company that should prioritize customer comfort and safety. I hope FlixBus takes this feedback seriously and implements necessary training for their staff.

Title: Excellent service
Review: Excellent service, ran to time, nice coaches and lovely drivers. Very good value from money also.

Title: If you are limited in time
Review: The main thing you should remember when buying a ticket is that the bus has the right not to arrive until 2 hours . And you will not get your money back. So if you are limited in time, do not use

Title: Toilet wasn’t working
Review: Toilet wasn’t working, then too many break times, even after being late drivers took a lot of time to change places which made it more late

Title: On time
Review: On time, very comfortable smooth ride

Title: Bristol to London
Review: Bristol to London. Great price. Driver friendly and helpful. Even arrived slightly early as traffic was favourable.

Title: Efficient and reasonably priced service. Comfortable coach
Review: Departure bus stop easily accessible by public transport. | Arrived on time and departed on time for Heathrow. Comfortable coach. Arrived at destination on time. Reasonably priced compared with other coach companies.

Title: Had a great experience travelling with…
Review: Had a great experience travelling with flix bus, top-notch customer service with highly recommend their services on long travels

Title: Thank you for having me on your bus.
Review: Thank you for having me on your bus.

Title: All went well
Review: Bus was bang on time, the driver was really friendly and helpful, the bus was clean and comfortable and it even arrived at the destination early.

Title: It was on time and was not expensive  very comfortable would use again
Review: The bus was very clean and very comfortable good air con and the price very good value for money.

Title: Service was reliable, quick and easy to use
Review: Tickets were really easy to purchase last minute and the QR codes sent immediately to my email. Bus pickup locations were sent with a link to be found easily on google maps, buses arrived 15/30 minutes early and waited until just after the departure time to go. Tickets were much more affordable than other coach services, with an option to choose your seats for a low price. Would definitely use in future!

Title: I travelled from London to Nottingham…
Review: I travelled from London to Nottingham and back. The journey to Nottingham was great, however the back journey wasn't so lovely. Half way through they decided to stop and empty the toilets. I sat in the middle right next to toilet. It took about 15 min for them to empty the toilets etc.and the smell was unbearable. They could have given us other seats knowing that this is planned during the journey.

Title: The worst company to transport people
Review: This company is not suitable for dealing with individuals and contains the worst customer service

Title: So easy to book on flixbus
Review: So easy to book on flixbus

Title: Great service
Review: Great service

Title: Drivers and the service was very good.
Coach never showed up
Review: I got a coach from Newcastle to Leeds it was meant to show up at 9:30. By 10:30 the coach still wasn’t there and the website was no help so I called the help line. The woman on the phone told me that the coach had shown up at 9:49 and already gone which was impossible as me and 10 others were all stood at the John Dobson stand and hadn’t seen the coach stop at all. I was refused a refund and when I called back the next day they told me the coach arrived at 9:30, so a different time. So I’m being given different information each time I try find out what happened. The next flix bus wasn’t until 11:55 so I had to book myself onto a mega bus which cost £25 so it cost me £30 to get back to Leeds via coach. After calling twice and being denied a refund both times I will never recommend this coach service to anyone else, I was left stranded in Newcastle for nearly two hours thanks to them and they won’t take any accountability.

Title: Very fast and straight forward
Review: Very fast and straight forward

Title: Quick and direct
Review: Quick and direct. Seats are fairly comfortable (as good as any coach). Couldn't find the usb port to charge my phone. The seat that I was in on my way back had a faulty seat belt, which wouldn't release easily, which was a pity.

Title: Really nice and easy travel
Review: Really nice and easy travel. It made a journey from Porto to Faro very smooth and comfortable bearing in mind it was a 7,5 hrs ride. I highly recommend it.

Title: On time and  comfortable what more can…
Review: On time and comfortable what more can u ask for. Driver was very friendly and professional and I reached the airport with minimum fuss

Title: Easy and efficient
Review: Easy and efficient

Title: Excellent service.
Review: Excellent service. | Coach clean and modern with free Wi-Fi | Driver friendly and helpful | Service on time | Competitively priced

Title: Good value
Review: Good value, good space for seating and luggage, limited information at stations but all went ok for us.

Title: Great service
Review: First time using your service and was very happy with both trips, so happy to use you again

Title: Fantastic price
Review: Fantastic price, and very pleasant driver. Got to the airport ahead of schedule. Will use this again.

Title: Turned away by driver due to having an…
Review: Turned away by rude driver due to having an infant in our party, we did not have a baby seat with us leaving us to book alternative coach, thank god for national express. | You would think that a baby seat promt would be highlighted at booking and not in the small print of terms and condition as stated by the driver. Obviously flexi bus does not mind leaving a family of 5 stranded.!!!

Title: Used FlixBus to get to Bristol airport
Review: Used FlixBus to get to Bristol airport, arrived on time early in the morning, pleasant driver. Slept on the way which is a bonus and dropped us off right outside the terminal and all for cheaper than I could get there by car. Will definitely be using again.

Title: Worst driver ( Gatwick to Bristol 11.30…
Review: Worst driver ( Gatwick to Bristol 11.30 8th Oct) she should be sacked! She was Rude aggressive and had zero customer service) shame on you flixbus or should I say shitsbus!! The driver from Bristol to Gatwick 4am 23rd sept however was lovely and deserves a medal for working for this company!

Title: Excellent drivers and punctuality
Review: Both the punctuality and the drivers were excellent! The trip was comfortable and efficient.

Title: Accessible
Review: Accessible

Title: Super efficient
Review: Super efficient. | Helpful driver. | Easy to use booking system. | Clean bus. | USB charging and WiFi facilities. | Great central location.

Title: cheap service
Review: cheap service. Delays, unclean, bad customer treatment. Sometimes tickets not even cheap.

Title: Appalling service
Review: Appalling service, arrogance, non working toilets. booking ref: 3196941890. london to paris then milan then Trogir. two journeys had no working toilets, read the law. extra charges, very arrogant drivers, just the worst travel experience. 26th sept. 2024. the fact there were no working toilets is a law violation. This despite arrogant bus companies trying to negate their responsibilities is a real journey, Im not being fobbed off for appalling service people need to know to choose another provider.

Title: FLIXBUS JOURNEY TO BIRMINGHAM
Review: Oh wow I'm seriously impressed. This is a very first time I've taken a coach as I'm mostly a train commuter. What can I say it was awesome 👌 wholesome peaceful journey. Driving team was fab 👌. I'm converted to coach drive now. It was very Good offer on the tickets too.

Title: Mittenwald to Munich Airport transfer
Review: I tried this service from Mittenwald to Munich Airport to avoid having to change trains at Munich Hauptbahnhof. |  | The bus was on time, had a friendly driver, and was reasonably comfortable, although not quite as nice as the train (between Mittenwald and Munich) but much nicer than the S-Bahn between Hauptbahnhof and the airport.

Title: highly recommended
Review: so simple and easy to use

Title: Best Bus ride ever
Review: Best Bus ride ever. Strongly recommend

Title: A very comfortable ride
Review: A very comfortable ride.Lovely to have a new bus. Driver very helpful

Review: Great services

Review: My train was delayed which meant had to cancel bus ticket which cost 45 pounds for two children and 2 adults when I cancelled they would only refund me 14 pounds as a voucher with no other options there is no other buses that I needed to get to my destination absolute f****** joke I would advise anyone reading this to use mega bus as they are much better

Title: Departed on time and arrived at the…
Review: Departed on time and arrived at the destination exactly on time. Our first use of FlixBus but we will certainly be using them again.

Title: Nice start
Review: Polite staff, plenty of legroom and a brand new fleet (at time of writing!). And the price is currently v competitive vs other coaches and a quarter of the price of same rail journey.

Title: Hi Good Morning
Review: Hi Good Morning. Your service is very good but Wi-Fi is not working in any bus, I suggest you to improve Wi-Fi service in your bus. Thank.u

Title: Easy to book
Review: Easy to book. Arrived on time. Clean and comfy. Good wifi. No issues. Would use again.

Title: Drivers were friendly and always on…
Review: Drivers were friendly and always on time safe and peaceful and my journey was great thanks Flix bus service

Title: The fare is cheap and fair
Review: The fare is cheap and fair. The coach is clean and tidy, comfy travel on it. | Highly recommend to select for your next travel.

Title: Clean
Review: Clean, comfortable and on time.

Title: I am happy from this bus company
Review: I am happy from this bus company, travelling is quite and lovely and what prices, look at other companies, they soon expensive, thanks for this, god bless u all

Title: Staff was super nice and the way of…
Review: Staff was super nice and the way of driving was very pleasant.

Title: Very affordable
Review: Very affordable. Could sleep on the bus overnight. Great communication.

Title: Easy to navigate
Review: Easy to navigate; clear options re times/seating; immediate confirmation

Title: I feel I can rely on the Flix service
Review: I feel I can rely on the Flix service, the journeys are comfortable, have friendly and helpful staff, and usually on schedule.

Title: Vital information not provided and customer services useless
Review: Bus route was subcontracted and was not advised of operator. Nearly missed the bus as it was not displayed on departure screen and despite repeatedly requesting information on operator and stance was told I had to locate bus myself. Was late in arriving in Vigo.

Title: Never use Flixbus!!!
Review: Never use this company, never! I had not nice experience before, but this time was complete disaster!!! First my bus was delayed. Imagine, they wrote me 29 min before my bus that it will come about 1h late. But then...the bus came 2,5h later and I missed my connection. Another story: the bus was coming 30 minutes earlier and the driver decided to stop for 15 min at expensive café and as a result we came 10 min later than the schedule. But the last drop was: I've asked the office in advance about stopping at the border just to put the custom stamp. They said, yes the bus will stop. I've asked the driver and then his colleague about the stop and both at the same time said yes. And do you know what?! Nobody stopped!!! The worst service I ever had!!!

Title: Avoid FlixBus at All Costs! Horrible Service and Rude Drivers
Review: I’m absolutely disgusted by the experience I had with FlixBus and the way they handled my complaint. A few days ago, while waiting at the Broxden Park & Ride, I mistakenly boarded a bus headed for Aberdeen. The driver’s reaction? Completely rude and dismissive! Instead of a polite response to a simple question, I was met with a condescending and aggressive tone, embarrassing me in front of other passengers. And when I reached out to customer service to report this unprofessional behavior, I received a generic, computer-generated response that did nothing to address the issue. Clearly, FlixBus doesn’t care how their customers are treated. |  | I’ve used FlixBus multiple times in the past, but let’s be honest, the only reason I tolerated their poor service was the cheap price. The internet never works, the toilets are often out of service, and the buses themselves are filthy. I could overlook these things for a budget-friendly trip, but dealing with rude, disrespectful employees is where I draw the line. |  | I’ve deleted the app and will never use FlixBus again. If you’re traveling in Scotland, I highly recommend Ember, which offers a far better and more professional service. Do yourself a favor and avoid FlixBus—it’s simply not worth the trouble.

Title: Very comfortable bus
Review: Very comfortable bus, ran on time with helpful staff. Very reasonable price too. Saved us hours travelling from Siena to Assisi.

Title: Quick,easy,straight Booking for Londonorward
Review: Quick,easy,straight forward

Title: Really easy to use and cheap aswell
STRATFORD TO BIRMINGHAM  trip was
Review: STRATFORD TO BIRMINGHAM trip was | severely delayed by 3 hours. No compensation was offered or refund. I was also informed my other customers that were also waiting that is regular as they use the serivce for work. My advise is to use another service if your trip is time sensitive as time keeping is a major issue with this company. I missed all appointments scheduled that day and had to spend an extra night and reschedule my return ticket, all of which increased my travel costs. Even when I had to change my return ticket I was charged and it wasn't like for like. Is this a scam? Absolutely disgraceful service.

Title: My 18:00hr departure bus was late and…
Review: My 18:00hr departure bus was late and rescheduled to arrive 19:20hrs. | It eventually turned up 19:40hrs. The Bus Station was very draftee, cold and the station toilet facilities disgusting. | However, the Flixbus coaches are clean, modern and comfortable, when they do turn up. | Since posting the above, in my inbox, I subsequently saw a 15% discount voucher Flixbus had sent me, for my next booking, as an apology for the delay. So I have to give them credit for at least offering me compensation for what happened,

Title: Very Very Very bad behaviour bus…
Review: Very Very Very bad behaviour bus staff.now I am and my family at the time flixbus.i booked online 3 tickets dundee to Leicester.when bus came 21:35 date 7 October 2024 driving chack my tickets than driver said me you 5 members and you booked online 3 tickets and he said me you booke 2 tickets more online after that I said driver i have case money | You booke 2 tickets more after that driver said me give me £35.99 than I give money after that Edinburgh bus station came than driver said me you 5 members give me more £35.99 after that I said I already give you £35.99 after that driver said me I booked case 1 tickets only bus you have 7 months son is well than said this is not my fault than driver said me one members out for bus and very bad behaviour and very angry after that I give more £35.99.

Review: Easy to book

Title: Booking is so easy

Review: I was suppose to travel from Brno to Vienna. I had to cancel my trip due to sickness. I got a voucher, but when I wanted to use it later, it was not accepted. Voucher was not valid. Helpdesk is reverting automatic answers, same on the phone. Czech pages of flixbus do not allow survey. I'll not use this bus anymore.

Title: Comfortable and on time hassle free
Value for Money
