Review: Ease of booking and both journeys were perfect

Title: So easy and straightforward to use.
The trip was excellent and easy
Review: I needed a sudden urgent booking for a night trip, and getting it with my phone was easy. | The bus team was friendly and professional; the trip was excellent and easy.

Title: booking
Review: Ease of booking

Title: Very competitive pricing given the…
Review: Very competitive pricing given the quality of service provided.

Title: These are the plus factors
Review: These are the plus factors | The punctuality of the departure and arrival times, the price is cheaper compared to other coaches and the drivers were friendly especially the ones from Bristol-Swansea (5.10.24 @ 5:35 pm). | However, the toilet (4.10.24 from Swansea @ 1:10 a.m) stinks. It needs deodorising considering it’s for a long distance journey. | I’ll still be using flix bus for my next trip and we also recommend it.

Title: fast and good prize and right on time.
Very affordable
Review: Very affordable, excellent customer service, they us my favourite brand of vehicles (Volvo), which are the safest in the automobile industry, WiFi, all round great service

Title: Bus journey from Faro to Lisbon
Review: The bus journey from Faro to Lisbon was smooth. The bus was clean, with departure and arrival on time and a very polite and professional driver. | The journey took about 3 hours thus would be nice a quick stop somewhere to stretch your legs. | Would recommend to anyone on a budget.

Title: Bus ride was great
Review: Bus ride was great. Lady in the ticket office quite rude and unhelpful | Otherwise fine

Title: My name is Anvar
Review: My name is Anvar, I want to tell you about the case what happened to me 3 days ago, we were driving with my friend from Edinburgh to London from the Flix Bus company and how we got to London, I accidentally forgot my purse on the bus, and inside were all our documents, passports, driver's licenses and bank cards, all the important documents were inside, we were already in the city in the center of London and I realized that I lost my purse, they quickly began to write to Flix Bus about the problem, everywhere they wrote that we had a panic, no As in a foreign country and without documents, we went back to the Victoria bus station and told about the situation and promised us to help and solve our problem. Then we came home, we are stressed, we didn't eat anything and didn't sleep, and then a miracle happened, an employee of Flix Bus - Ciise Shuayb wrote to us on Facebook and said that he had found our purse and that we could come and pick it up at any time, for tomorrow we went and picked up our purse. I want to thank Ciise Shuayb for his help, for his kind soul, he is a very kind and sympathetic person.

Title: You get what you pay for!
Review: The buses were on time and drivers were good. They are the cheapest coaches in the country and do offer valuable services.

Title: I liked the high level of service and…
Review: I liked the high level of service and comfortable ride.

Title: I would like to express my gratitude to…
Review: I would like to express my gratitude to Ciise Shuayb, and thank you very much for this situation because he helped me when I lost my luggage in bus from Edinburgh to London and thanks to the FlixBus company.

Title: So far it was easy to book the ticket
Review: So far it was easy to book the ticket

Title: Price exploitation
Review: Price exploitation - AVOID!!! | A trip between Bath and Bristol Airport costs £17 single or £23 return on AirDecker website. FlixBus charged BOTH these fares plus a service fee and rather than acknowledge an error and refund the £17 overcharge tell me that this IS the price through them!!! So total exploitation AVOID!!! Check directly with any carrier rather than pay through the teeth with FlixBus exploitative charges! Thus far no customer service representative has managed to check directly on the website that this is correct information - incompetence and avoidance!!!

Title: Always a pleasure to book a journey…
Review: Always a pleasure to book a journey with the Flix Bus. Good prices, easy to navigate through the booking process & if you've booked a wrong journey, they will credit your money for another booking without hesitation. Buses are always immaculate & staff very helpful. Thank you x

Title: Hassle free
Review: Hassle free. The bus left and arrived right on time. Comfortable seats, clean bus, pleasant driver.

Title: Good experience travel with u guysguys but…
Review: Good experience travel with u guys but has a tourism and the language issues when ever they speak French let the them translate it to English too because like me as a tourist don't understand French but nice ride.

Title: No more trains for me!
Review: Booked seats (last minute) when our train was cancelled and I needed to get home. Really impressed, very good price and easy to book specific seats online. Bus was clean and driver was friendly. Will definitely use again - no more trains for me.

Title: Booked a coach from Exeter to London
Review: Booked a coach from Exeter to London. Waited 2 hours and it never turned up. No email or app notifications explaining where coach was. Kept calling to ask and they said they would email me to say where coach was but they never did. Around 25 people left stranded and we all just had to leave and go home. Appalling way to treat your customers.

Title: Quick and easy cheapest around
Review: Quick and easy cheapest around

Title: Good value Friendly Driver.
Review: Very good value service. Picked up on time and arrived on time. Reserved seat. Friendly and informative driver (advised on Resturant in Calgary (our destination).

Title: Easy to book m & navigate
Review: Easy to book. Easy website to navigate

Title: A refund was agreed but they pay the…
Review: A refund was agreed but they pay the refund from Germany so incurring bank charges in the UK which you have to pay. Lost £15

Title: Good first experience
Review: Great legroom, nice that there was wifi and a dustbin, but the table was broken (for my friend). Staff helped us to unload luggage which was nice. Other than that, it was a comfortable ride that I did not expect and I would love to ride flixbus again!

Title: Good service
Review: Good service | Helpful driver

Title: NEVER USE FLIXBUS!!!!!!
Review: NEVER USE FLIXBUS!!!!!! | First of all the driver was rude checking the boarding pass. | Then the toilet was locked! | The 4 front seat were unavailable (no reason given). I was supposed to be in 2A. | I told ( Tried to tell) the driver the toilet was locked and he needed to undo it, as I really needed to use it. | He screamed at me (in I guess French) | Very threatening and smashed his phone against the dashboard. I shouted back saying I will have to go here at the steps as I can’t hold my bladder! | I went to the toilet steps to look for a bottle or something. | At this point he stopped the bus and came storming down the bus shouting, screaming (in French )and waving his hand very threatening and pocked me in the face and eye! | As I put my head down to protect myself and covered my face. | He did undo the toilet, but I felt so scared and intimidated that I got off the bus the first chance I had. | Luckily before we got on the boat to cross to France. |  | I would also like to know if I have any rights as I not only had to miss my friends 40th birthday, but feel he assaulted me!

Title: Such good value tickets
Review: Such good value tickets - also gives additional choice for departure / arrival times. Buses on the outward and return legs were clean and on time. Driver really friendly. All round a great service.

Title: Our trip
Review: Really enjoyable trip and buses very comfortable and clean

Title: Very well-known
Review: Very well-known

Title: Why am I flying again?
Review: Ryanair delayed my flight and so I had to go to a different country than I planned! Luckily floxbus was easy to book a journey to the country u actually wanted to be in and cheaper. Makes me question why I bother with planes at all!

Title: Ticket assistance
Review: Had a ticket, to travel to Glasgow. Explained that I was in a rush to get home as quickly as possible. Were able to get me home 3 hours earlier than initially planned. Massive thanks to Ciise and the drivers of the London Victoria to Glasgow bus!

Title: Super Flixbus !
Review: Flixbus was great, a great price, a friendly, professional driver and a very clean , new coach with wifi and sockets to charge your devices . Flixbus was also on time departing and arriving. Well done. I'll certainly use Flixbus again.

Title: Third class service am book bus for…
Review: Third class service am book bus for london to birmingham first in moring they cancel my booking than i reschedule the booking and in the time of return bus is delay 121 minute than am again reschedule my booking am am choose 4.50 timing at 15:00 date 3 oct an waiting again for bus but bus not come till 17.10 than i call to customer care than discuss the issue than care reply is that time is morning 4.50am but am reschedule the ticket at 15.00 than why show morning time for booking? Am request to customer care boy to refund my money than the care boy reply is its your fault why you book monring ticket but how is possible am reschedule ticket for past am totaly dispointed am never book the flix bus in my life and suggest to my friends also never book the flix because they are cheater

Title: Does What It Says on the Tin
Review: Reasonably priced, easy to find and left on the dot. No complaints. |  | The drivers don't seem to like tourists much, but stay out of their way and they stay out of yours...

Title: Going to be left stranded at airport
Review: Just had my second coach in row cancelled this one will leave me stranded at Heathrow airport at 1am with no possible way to get home. Not helping me to get a hotel for the night even though they are legally obliged to do so under Regulation No. 181/2011

Title: Beautiful experience traveling with…
Review: Beautiful experience traveling with FlixBus! Will do over and over again....

Title: Getting bus home and paid extra to sit…
Review: Getting bus home and paid extra to sit at the front with extra leg room and the driver is driving all the way down the motorway with his window down when I asked him to put it up because it is so cold and loud (it is October for goodness sake) he said he drives with the window down and I would have to move. There were no other seats on the bus except those sat next to someone else (I had booked the two seats at the front) without the additional leg space that I need. |  | I messaged FlixBus saying I want a refund because I paid extra for the seats I am sat in at the front and was forced to move. They initially refused but then gave me a partial refund. |  | Very unhappy with service and I had been a loyal FlixBus user but I won’t be using them anymore.

Title: Cheaper than National express
Review: Coach on time clean, and good and pleasant driver. | Best part is it's cheaper than National Express.

Title: The service and email communication…
Review: The service and email communication from ordering my ticket were excellent. | The organisation of the bus terminal at Fisterra could be better. There were 2 buses travelling to Santiago and it wasn't clear to any of the very numerous people which one they should be going on. In fact several people had to remove their bags from one bus to the other when their tickets were checked

Title: Flexi Bus from Cardiff to Bristol
Review: I recently took a Flexi Bus from Cardiff to Bristol Airport, and unfortunately, the journey left much to be desired. The biggest issue was the overwhelming, unpleasant smell inside the bus, which made for a very uncomfortable ride. Several passengers, myself included, voiced complaints about it, but nothing seemed to be done to fix the issue during the trip. |  | I would like to request a refund for my recent journey from Cardiff to Bristol Airport due to the uncomfortable conditions caused by the awful smell on the bus.

Title: It was easy
Review: It was easy, quick and cheap

Title: Albufeira to Lisbon
Review: Our reservations were ready to arrange, bus trip was good. Our challenge was arranging two taxis to take us to the hotel. |  | Our other challenge has been to contact lost & found for some items we left in the bus.

Title: Horrendous delay. Unreliable company.
Review: Unacceptable masive delay almost made me lose my flight

Title: Great Experience!!
Review: The bus was punctual, the driver was very helpful, and we arrived ahead of schedule – the most affordable option for travel between two major cities in Scotland

Title: Flixbus cancelled direct trip for a connecting trip
Review: I booked a direct bus from Manchester to Cambridge, primarily due to the low cost, but also due to the fast and direct connection. Two days before the travel took place, Flixbus rebooked me to a connection that took two hours more, with a stop in Birmingham. I had no say in this replacement connection, this was forced on me, I could not even choose another day without having to cancel my booked trip. This meant that I had two hours less in Manchester than initially planned, thus having to cut short my trip. On the travel day, the bus had a delay of more than an hour, and we almost missed the connecting bus in Birmingham, causing a lot of stress and unnecessary worry to me. This is unacceptable.

Title: Excellent Service
Review: Excellent Service. | smooth journey. coach arrive at my destination ten mins. early, which made me really happy. Driver very caring and supportive. Comfortable seating and coach immaculate. Highly recommended.

Title: Great experience
Review: Just had the most incredible driver called Peter. Honestly can't thank them enough for being so helpful. Such a kind hearted and amazing person. I will only be booking with flixbus from now on

Title: Booking
Review: Simple and quick

Title: I had three journeys cancelled
Review: I had three journeys cancelled. First the outward journey the evening before. Then, while I was at the station on my way, the bus was again cancelled. I had to pay for a train ticket which I could not afford. THEN, my return trip was cancelled the evening before departure. I had had enough and I booked with National Express and had to pay out yet again. I am throughly disgusted with this company. I will never use them again. I will NEVER recommend them to friends or family.

Title: Absolutely outstanding customer service
Review: Absolutely outstanding customer service. I need to travel from Cardiff to Paris and am a wheelchair user. I spoke to them and they said after I booked my ticket, they would send me one for my carer for free. They registered my wheelchair and let their traffic control department know they had a disabled traveller. Cannot rate them highly enough.

Title: Comfortable service and very relaxed
Review: Comfortable service and very relaxed. I usually use for football trip and it’s a good way to travel for the games.

Title: Unwilling to accept fault
Review: Spoke to agent online, was told 'no/minimal difference to ticket price' if purchasing on bus as opposed to website. Cool I thought, was worried about missing bus as it's super early and local buses to station aren't reliable. Arrived early in the end, 1st in queue. As boarding began 10 mins before departure, was asked to step aside because I wanted to purchase ticket from driver, so he boarded everyone else first. Ten mins pass, departure time now passed. Proceeded to get charged double price, despite incorrect info from online agent, and also by driver who said if I'd bought it when he first saw me aka before departure time, I could have still bought it online for the cheaper price. Annoying, but figured customer service would see the issue. Nope. They said 'cannot help as contract between customer and company complete' because I took the bus that I needed to get to the airport to catch my flight. So essentially got lied to, charged double and ultimately screwed over. Will not recommend and will never use again because of this. Use Megabus or National Express instead.

Title: we bought 4 tickets with reserved…
Review: we bought 4 tickets with reserved seats, but the driver was rude to us and said that any seat! we were shocked, we paid money for seats to sit together with our family | .The road is long and difficult, we were traveling from Paris to London. Terrible attitude of the driver towards passengers

Title: Comfortable
Review: Comfortable, convenient and punctual.

Title: Very easy to book
Review: Very easy to book

Title: Totally unreliable. Avoid like the plague.
Review: Like others, received a cancellation and rebooking email at very short notice which would have left me stranded in central London all night (the original coach was due to depart at midnight, they rebooked me for 07:00 the next morning). Clearly they hadn’t sold enough seats so just cancelled. They don’t care, don’t try to help, just offer you a paltry refund. Alternatives very expensive as last minute but FlixBus has no proper UK-based support so unable and unwilling to assist. Don’t risk booking with this lot - totally unreliable.

Title: Cheap and efficient
Review: Cheap and efficient . Experienced drivers. One problem with a loo door that was blocked and driver unhappy to stop so a passenger with urgent need for the toilet had to argue to get off....

Title: Comfort
Review: Clean | Comfy | On time | Cheap |  | Will always use FlixBus

Title: Cancelled bus
Review: We booked a return ticket from London to Bristol. Outbound journey from London on Thursdays evening was smooth and arrived Bristol on time. However, our return bus on Sunday got cancelled. No notification sent on the app. Only an email two hours before our journey was sent. When we realised, it was too late to book the next bus. Next two buses were fully booked. It cost us a lot to get another bus ticket from a different company. Our return was very stressful rushing around to get another company ticket. They are not reliable. If you are not in a hurry and want some cheap deals you can use.

Title: Terrible experience
Review: Terrible experience, driver was not friendly at all and may I add smoking an open flame in the opening of the bus. Would not recommend at all and would go with another company.

Title: Straight forward
Review: Straight forward. | Prompt

Title: Brilliant service very reasonable prices
Review: Brilliant service very reasonable prices

Title: Wrong bus location…
Review: Followed the instructions on the Flix bus app on where to go to find our upcoming bus at Venice Metre Station (travelling to Slovenia) and we were in the exact location it described, the correct bus stop number and was in front of a cafe that it said it would be. So we did everything right. As I’m tracking the live location of the bus, it looks as if it’s going a different route to what was planned and arrives on the OPPOSITE SIDE of the road. Keep in mind, that the street we had to run across was extremely busy and not so easy to cross in such a short moment. Thank goodness we were lucky and had the chance to run across the road without cars, because otherwise we would’ve missed our bus. This induced an awful lot of anxiety :/

Title: Great Service
Review: Bus was on time, reached London on time and in fact 10 mins early when returned back to Leicester Fosse Park. Really convenient and also good for luggage. Driver was friendly. Highly recommend.

Title: On time and hassle free
Review: On time and hassle free

Title: Very straightforward to book and great price
Review: Very straightforward to book and understand the details of the booking. Great price too!

Title: Very happy with everything
Review: Very happy with everything

Title: A pleasant journey
Review: A pleasant journey Nottingham to London. Traffic out of their control of course but the driver was friendly and drove well. I did not use the on-board lavatory and cannot comment. Seat is fine considering price paid. Temperature and air circulation in the bus was reasonable. Good enough wi-fi for basic functions. Would use this service again

Title: Wrong information on departure boards
Review: When I arrived at the departure station the information boards had the wrong information showing. They were showing that the bus time was either 6:10 or 9:10 although everyone waiting had a ticket stating that the bus was due to leave at 7:10. It got to 7:00 and the bus hadn't arrived and we started to think that we had missed our bus although we had all been there way before the time on our tickets. Another passenger tried to call the help desk and was immediately cut off. When a different flixbus turned up we asked the driver if he knew what time the bus was due and he said 9:10 which would have meant some people would miss their flights. When the bus did arrive at 7:20 it turned out that he'd had a puncture and had to change buses, but it would have been much more helpful if the times on the information board was correct in the first place.

Title: Good service at all time
Review: Good service at all time

Title: Poor seating area
Review: It was very uncomfortable to sit because there was a small place and the person who was sitting infront of me kept coming backwards and i couldn’t even move my legs that it was too uncomfortable.lastly i wasnt even in the right place that someone took my seat i already told them it was my seat but they didnt want give me because they had too many bags with them which they didnt even have space.Very bad experience that people cannot even sit in their given seat which i paid for £26 for whole trip.

Title: Very poor service
Review: The outward journey seat area had rubbish in it from previous occupant. Seats too small for two when a very large person sat next to me I was squashed for entire journey. | Return journey cancelled half way through day with no alternative service available & no explanation I was forced to buy a last minute ticket on another provider at a lot more cost. No where could I find an area in your website to complain. Although my original fare was returned promptly I am now £15 out of pocket.

Title: Bus was on time both on arrival at…
Review: Bus was on time both on arrival at Bristol and arrival at Swansea - the journey was comfortable (excellent driving) and I would have no hesitation in travelling with you again)

Title: Great value for money and a fraction of…
Review: Great value for money and a fraction of the price of the train. I purchased extra luggage and two seats each way for comfort. Price was £67 in total as opposed to over £130 on the train. | So much easier too, no lugging your cases on and off trains when you have to change. The coach was comfy, loo was clean, driver kept to time. Overall excellent service and will definitely use again. Did return journey from Swansea to Gatwick , all the drivers were very pleasant, called out every stop clearly and often multiple times, very professional and remained calm even when passengers hadn’t listened and missed their stop! | Only thing that would have made it better would be a vending machine selling water and or snacks (6.5 hours is a long time on a coach if you haven’t had opportunity to get some in advance, e.g. flight lands late) | I highly recommend Flix Bus to anyone. Try it, you won’t be disappointed

Title: FlixBus made it easy to schedule and…
Review: FlixBus made it easy to schedule and both buses we took were on time and safe drivers.

Title: Timings were excellent
Review: Timings were excellent - the journey was a bit ‘around the houses’ but we still arrived early. A bit more verbal communication from the driver would be helpful as, for instance, the bus was stopped in Cardiff for around 15 minutes and folks around us were starting to wonder if there was a problem!!

Title: AWFUL
Review: AWFUL. THEY CANCELLED THE LATE-NIGHT SERVICE AT THE VERY LAST MINUTE. IT WAS RAINING AND DARK. JUST IRRESPONSIBLE.

Title: Travelled from Inverness to Glasgow
Review: Travelled from Inverness to Glasgow, and returned the same day. No issues with either trip.

Title: Bus on time
Review: Bus on time. Nice driver.

Title: Nice
Review: Good, comfortable bus, very clean, and professional and good drivers

Title: Trieste to Marco Polo airport
Review: The bus was on time clean and comfortable. The terminal was about souless with nowhere really to wait

Title: Luggage went missing from hold
Review: I left my luggage in the hold, as I always do when travelling on busses. However, when I went to collect it after my journey, it was gone. I reported to the driver who just shrugged his shoulders. Wold not give me evidence of theft and there was no Flix office to report to. Never using Flix again.

Title: While going on the train was splendid…
Review: While going on the train was splendid but coming back I arrived late. Overall It was a beautiful experience

Title: Fast and smooth journey
Review: Fast and smooth journey

Title: It was very easy to use
Review: It was very easy to use

Title: Easy peasy
Review: Very easy to book it online, plain and simple

Title: Travelling solo in the UK
Review: Travelling solo in the UK. . . total journey times 6 hours 30 minutes. Both the outward and return journeys were exactly on-time. Drivers were helpful careful and courteous, despite irritatingly wet and windy driving conditions. Thanks.

Title: Coach left in advance and i missed my ride. No refund from Flixbus for the extra cost i had to face for an alternative solution.
Review: The last time I used Flixbus was in Italy, the coach left 8 minutes in advance which made me miss the ride. I had to spend extra money and time for an alternative solution. Flixbus has never admitted their faults, despite the evidence I provided to them and the several emails i sent them. They only refunded the ticket cost, giving vague replies to my explanation requests, sometimes even contradicting themselves. Their customer care service is very poor and their attitude is very disappointing. Result: no service, extra cost and extra time spent by me - not happy.

Title: Easy to use and book.
Review: Easy to use and book.

Title: Definitely recommend
Review: Great service on time easy to find pick up comfortable bus

Title: Hopeless, unreliable and expensive
Review: I booked two Flix buses. The outward journey was 40-45 mins late, and the return journey was cancelled altogether and there were no other Flix buses leaving that day from that particular bus staition. Due to the late arrival, I had to pay for a taxi to get to my meeting and due to the cancellation, I had to buy an expensive on the day ticket from a different bus company to get home. Hopeless, unreliable and expensive, if you include the costs of fixing their failures. The Flix tickets costs less than £10, but to fix their failures cost more than £22, and many hours of my time. I would not use this company again.

Title: Awful service. Avoid!
Review: Awful service should something go wrong. Their control over ensuring nobody else takes your bag as you arrive at your destination is non-existent and should your bag disappear out of the hold don’t expect any support or compensation. Apparently it is your fault even if you have labelled your bag. Avoid at all cost!

Title: My friend left her handbag on the bus…
Review: My friend left her handbag on the bus which contained her passport IPhone and Euros - the driver went out of his way to make sure it was returned to her . If he hadn’t taken the actions he did we would have not been able to make our booked flights home. We were advised by customer services that we had to complete on line forms to register the bag had been left behind and it could take up to 14 days before we would hear anything. No office available to visit. Terrible service from Flixbus but Superb service from the driver

Title: Top service from booking tickets to…
Review: Top service from booking tickets to drivers coaches comfort and tracking journey

Title: Really easy
Review: Really easy

Title: Avoid avoid avoid, worst bus company
Review: Please do not book Flix bus if you need to get to somewhere like airport - they didn't show up at all and no other buses were available as it was 12:30am (this is not the only time it's happened!!!) 6 hours later they emailed to say the bus was cancelled which was super unhelpful as we already realised they weren't going to show. I will never be using Flix again no matter how cheap they are, I'd rather pay extra with National Express and at least know I'm not going to be stranded

Title: Good service
Review: Good service

Title: An affordable and efficient way of travelling.
Review: An efficient, affordable, and very clean bus that departed and arrived on time, with relatively comfortable seats and a very helpful driver. What more could you ask for when going on holiday?

Title: Extremely Disappointing Experience and Poor Customer Service
Review: I had an awful experience with Flixbus due to a booking error that was handled very poorly by the driver. Despite having a valid booking reference, I was refused access to the bus because of a name discrepancy. When I asked how to fix the issue, the driver was rude, short, and completely unhelpful. I tried to follow the instructions provided, but the system wouldn’t allow me to make the necessary changes. |  | To make things worse, this issue wasn’t flagged on the outbound journey, which used the same booking reference, giving me no chance to rectify it in advance.

Title: Really good service
Review: Really good service

Title: Avoid
Review: Avoid, Avoid!! My early morning bus service from Newport to Bristol Airport was cancelled at short notice, text received 15 minutes before departure and we had already arrived via taxi to the bus pick up point, with luggage etc, no reason given!! it was at 12.10 am on a Sunday morning and we felt the only alternative option was to get a costly taxi to the airport to ensure we could make our flight.

Title: The coach drivers made our experience…
Review: The coach drivers made our experience positive and unforgettable same as the cleanliness of the bus and the comfy seats. Our drivers were very polite and helpful. The booking experience is hassle free. The app is a great tool because it keeps passengers updated. The bus wifi connection needs slight improvement and I'd be using p&o or dfds ferries. Thanks

Title: Excellent service!
Review: Excellent service! Comfortable seats, good service and great value. Already booked our return journey with Flixbus.

Title: GOOD
Review: bus comes on time

Title: Great except I couldn’t get Wi-Fi
Review: Great except I couldn’t get Wi-Fi. Everything was perfect.

Title: Everything was perfect except for the…
Review: Everything was perfect except for the wifi from Dubrovnik to split, unable to connect!

Title: Really good
Review: Really good

Title: On time, comfortable  seats, WiFi & the driver was helpful & friendly.
Review: Excellent service. I will definatley be using the Flixbus in the future.

Title: Efficient service
Review: Reliable. Punctual. Pleasant Driver

Title: Bus from Niagara Falls to Toronto…
Review: Bus from Niagara Falls to Toronto airport. Plenty of room for suitcases. On time. Clean. Comfortable seats. | Good direct route.

Title: comfortable seats and very kind driver
Dont use this company
Review: Dont use this company! The bus was 1.45 mins delayed and i had to book more tickets with another company to get me to the airport in time for my flight. Wouldnt refund me. disgraceful

Title: The service is good
Review: The service is good. I have constantly use the service for my travel within Scotland. |  | It will be fantastic if you have a stop over in Stirling city center, not castle view park and ride. it is always difficult to get a bus coming to city center from park and ride especially when its late. Stirling do not have frequent bus going to city center, except P2 which usually close early.

Title: If you have plane to catch choose different connection
Review: My jurney has started that my trip had been changed I have choosen traveling time 2.15am to the airport in Warsaw-Chopin. Two days before departure. I get an email thst I will be travel st 3.20. At 22.09.24 the bus arrive at 3.50 to the bus stop. Drivers speak in one language - russian. We left my home time just after 4am. I had plane to catch at 7.15 the boarding have started. I catch my plane in last minute and thanks to the kindness of border controll members who allowe us went via VIP fast checking. Very stresfull trip.

Title: Excellent trip
Review: The bus was on time, very comfortable pleasant journey with very polite driver

Title: Good price
Review: Good price. Easy to book.

Title: Awful - avoid!
Review: Horrendous experience with Flixbus - everything from a driver who was over an hour late to pick us up, to the bus driver trying to bribe passengers to pay him more money if they needed to stop off enroute and arriving into Dubrovnik over two and a half hours after the estimated time of arrival. The customer service from Flix is so poor when I made a complaint about this experience - avoid!

Title: Easy to book
Review: Easy to book | No faff | They were also the only bus company that would do late night journeys from Niagara to Toronto which enabled us to watch the fireworks before taking the bus back. The only suggestion would be to have a 10:30pm bus for those returning to Toronto just after the fireworks. We ended up having to wait an hour for our bus because of the availability

Title: Bus Trip Cardiff to Heathrow - Cardiff
Review: Fitted in With our time scales for our trip, Decent price

Title: Very comfortable y…
Review: Cheap and best to travel any destination. It has good tracking app know where it is the bus are. .

Title: Easy to use will use again company was recomended to me
should have just got a megabus tbh
Review: both journeys were in replacement coaches, the return journey arrived an hour late.

Title: They do what they say on the tin
Review: They do what they say on the tin. The coach left on time. It arrived on time. The price is good.

Title: The creator, all mighty allh
Review: Wow ,That's is great EXPERIENCE ,I prefer to trip , Thank u ,Gentlemen

Title: Fare cheap, so the service and behaviour, all are cheap
Review: I have already submitted a review about the delay of your service on the 20th of September 2024. I was scheduled to board the 6:05 PM bus from Birmingham to Victoria, London, and I had expressed my concern about missing my connecting bus at 10 PM from London to Colchester. | Unfortunately, that bus arrived approximately an hour late. When I showed the driver (Bus 030) my booking, he attempted to scan the QR code from my soft copy but immediately told me it was not a valid ticket after just one attempt. He refused to scan it again and told me I was not allowed to travel, stating I did not have a valid ticket. Without further explanation, he went inside the bus and sat in the driver’s seat, preparing to close the door. | I was panicked and frightened. As an international student unfamiliar with this country, I feared what would happen if I missed my next bus—where would I stay for the night in an unknown city? I repeatedly tried to convince the driver by showing him the email copy of my ticket. I placed my luggage on the second step of the bus and stood on the first step, leaning inside to request that he not leave without me, as I had a valid ticket. Despite my pleas, the driver (white, stocky build, around 5’7” to 5’9” with an oval-shaped face, as far as I remember) came over, grabbed my luggage, and forced me off the bus while using inappropriate language and a rude tone (the CCTV footage will provide evidence of this interaction). | He then closed the door and drove off, leaving me distressed and stranded. | Thankfully, there were several other passengers and bystanders waiting for the next FlixBus to London and Manchester. Many of them were upset on my behalf and tried to console me, assuring me that they would speak to the next driver. While they were supporting me, someone suggested I contact customer service. I attempted to do so, but my phone battery was running low, and I had to disconnect the call to save enough charge to check my travel details. I asked my daughter to call on my behalf, and she tried three times. On each occasion, customer service promised to call back after 30 minutes, but they never followed through. | After about half an hour, the next bus arrived. Both the passengers and bystanders explained my situation to the driver (tall, stout, of African origin), and he assured me he would sort it out after checking all the tickets. Once he had completed that, he kindly allowed me to board and told me he would drop me off at Victoria Coach Station. I was incredibly grateful for the kindness of the passengers and this driver (CCTV footage will confirm this as well). I boarded the bus and began my journey to London. | However, due to the delay, I arrived 20 minutes late and missed my connecting bus to Colchester. I approached the FlixBus night service personnel at Victoria Coach Station and explained everything that had happened, but I was told there were no bus service to Colchester by Flixbus. I was advised to purchase another ticket for a 2:40 AM (National Express bus service)bus on the 21st of September. With no other option, I had to ask my daughter to buy me another ticket online. | As an international student on a tight budget, these unexpected expenses were a huge burden. On top of the new bus fare, I had to spend additional money on food while I waited for the next bus, and these costs were not part of my planned expenses. | I am requesting a full refund for all the extra costs I incurred due to the inappropriate behavior of your driver, including the additional bus fare and other related expenses. I also expect an explanation of the driver’s conduct and steps that will be taken to ensure this doesn’t happen to anyone else. CCTV footage will back up my account, and I believe the testimonies of my fellow passengers will do the same. | While I am grateful for the help of the second driver and the other passengers, I should not have been treated this way by the first driver. I urge FlixBus to review this situation with empathy and provide a fair resolution. | I look forward to your prompt response and action. | This was not the first incident. On the 26th of August 2024, while waiting at 7 AM to catch a FlixBus to London, I received an email early in the morning informing me that my bus had been canceled. The original bus was scheduled to depart at 9 AM from London to Leeds. Instead, FlixBus rebooked me on a bus at 1:30 PM the same day. On that occasion as well, I had to spend extra money on food due to the extended waiting time. I didn’t file a complaint at the time, but now that this is happening again, it has become extremely distressing and frightening, especially for international students who often have to travel for essential reasons.

Title: Poor experience with Flixbus
Review: We booked 4 tickets to travel from Bristol Airport to Bridgend (South Wales) leaving @2.20pm on 21/09/24. | Having landed at 11.40am we had a bit of a wait ahead of us, so we got to the bus stop 20 mins before the bus was due to depart. We were then informed that the bus had already departed (25 mins early) without informing us, so we had to rebook for 4 new tickets on the next bus and wait in the airport for another 3 hours ! This bus company can't be relied on, so be aware when you book to travel with them, i suppose you get what you pay for.

Title: Overall good experience some slight improvements needed.
Review: The positives..Great price if you book early and you can book your seats. The staff are friendly ( the driver and colleague who checks you on). The coaches are clean and comfortable. Negatives ..I can only refer to my experience from Brussels to Bruges the signposting needs improving by making them clear as there was 3 bus stands .don't use the same bus number for different locations it confuses people. If you reserve a seat the driver should identify those seats instead of leaving the passengers to ask them to move. People don't queue when the bus arrives which can be dangerous if there are older people around.

Title: lying thieves
Review: The coach to London was three hours late, so there was no point in using it, and as the coach was over two hours late I was told I could get a full refund. I was then told two weeks later that I was entitled to a refund as I'd taken the coach. They know this is not true as they have CCTV on their coaches. And, no matter how many times I tell them that I wasn't on the coach and that I can prove it with CCTV footage that I was in Sheffield, and transactions that day based in Sheffield, and eye witnesses that I was Sheffield, they tell me that these aren't proof that I didn't take the coach, that I was supposed to wait three hours and declare to the coach driver that I wasn't going to take the trip. Each rep I speak to gives me a different excuses, and takes 2 weeks to answer basic questions. They say there is a list of reasons they accept for a refund, but they don't divulge them or give access to them to help my case. They are lying thieves.

Title: Fast and straight forward process to buy tickets
Review: Fast and straight forward

Title: Very efficient, comfortable and fair price
Review: Very efficient, comfortable seats, definitely use flexbus again. Amazing price.

Title: Budapest to Salzburg
Review: Very comfortable coach and smooth journey.

Title: Confortable experience…
Review: Confortable experiencia. Excelente driver. Falta quite sale.

Title: Punctual.
Review: First time using Flix. Very happy. Service departed on time. Clean and comfortable.

Title: Great service
Review: Great service. Clean bus. Direct from bus station to bus station so could walk home easily. Very reasonably priced too.

Title: STRANDED.
Review: STRANDED. | Two days before we returned to the UK we received a text advising our return journey from Bristol airport to Devon was cancelled. No alternative suggested and no explanation. We were left in Bristol, a city we do not know, at 1am. Thank goodness for Falcon bus!. To add to this they STILL have not refunded the correct amount for the cancelled journey. Never again.

Title: Amazing Services 5 Stars 🌟 ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
Review: Amazing Services 5 Stars 🌟 ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️

Title: Bus driver was courteous and helpful
Review: Bus driver was courteous and helpful. Ride was great and no problem crossing the border to Canada.

Title: Very reliable and good service in…
Review: Very reliable and good service in reasonable price

Title: Bus from Albufeira to Lisbon
Review: It was really easy to book online. Locations everywhere and the bus journey was on time. The bus itself was clean and quiet. Drive was a bit moody and didn't help us with our luggage.

Title: My very first experience with FlixBus
Review: Overall it was a wonderful experience, I'll definitely be making use of your services in the near future. Might have had a slight hiccup on my return trip, due to a 20min delay. But your efficiency in sticking to your time table is commendable.

Title: The bus was overbooked by Flixbus
Review: The bus was overbooked by Flixbus, the driver refused to leave until 4 people vouluntarily left the bus and waited for the next one, if no one did he would have to call the police!! There was no incentive to get off and no guarantee that we would get a seat on the next bus, we were made to sit for over an hour with no update, eventually a taxi was arranged for the extra passengers, why couldn't they do this at the beginning?!?! The driver said we could claim compensation, I tried and was told no...My return journey also arrived late by one hour without any explanation!...Flixbus need to have a process in place to sort out this kind of issue and also train drivers to not make passengers feel like it is their fault! I WILL BE USING NATIONAL EXPRESS IN FUTURE

Title: Successful trip Venice to Ljubljana
Review: Surprisingly comfy seats, on time- even arrived at destination slightly early, well ventilated, a couple of short stops to stretch legs/use loo/ buy pretzels

Title: Very practical and easy to use.
Review: Very practical and easy to use. | Love it!!

Title: Very cool .
Review: Good travelling and good service.

Title: Quick
Review: Quick, easy, uncomplicated

Title: Good service
Review: The bus was very punctual, the driver very helpful and polite and the journey went as planned. The tickets were not expensive so good deal all round.

Title: Good very nice
Review: Good very nice

Title: I am so pleased that you did a bus…
Review: I am so pleased that you did a bus service from Sanremo to Nice as there appear to be no trains from Diano Marina to Nice. This will be the first time we have used your bus service and are looking forward to it.

Title: Excellent  service
Review: Smooth, on time, comfortable seats. Definitely turn up before departure time as they leave promptly !! | I missed having a power outlet.

Title: Avoid using Flixbus in the UK at all…
Review: Avoid using Flixbus in the UK at all costs as they cancel last minute everyday in the UK. A ticket counter cashier at Heathrow said they cancel numerous coaches everyday forcing customers to book on another carrier last minute. Don't let the cheaper prices fool you they are totally unreliable.

Title: Great servicelondon to hammersmith
Review: Great service. Clean, efficient with friendly helpful drivers and fantastic value too.

Title: Catania to Agrigento
Review: The bus was clean and comfortable with plenty of leg room. It left on time and arrived early.

Title: Bus started late by an hour which could…
Review: Bus started late by an hour which could not have made up. Bad smell from toilet during journey. | However, whole journey was smooth.

Title: Great new coach service
Review: Smart and comfortable new coach to travel in. The driver was very helpful and the journey to Heathrow smooth and on time. This was our first time using Fixbus and we shall definitely be using them again.

Title: Positive experience- travelled on flixbus Wurzberg to Brussells
Review: Positive experience- good communication re late arrival due to traffic conditions. | Clean and comfortable onboard with usb charging points and adequate internet connection. | Smooth transfer despite late arrival due to traffic conditions, obviously good communication across the company.

Title: Easy to order
Review: Easy to order

Title: I have been traveling in different…
Review: I have been traveling in different countries in Europe with FlixBus for a long time. I have found their service to be excellent. It’s easy to book, very reliable , comfortable and drives you a safe ride.

Title: Highly recommended
Review: One of the best ways of traveling though the Europe more reliable than a lot other companies

Title: The bus is nice and comfortable
Review: The bus is nice and comfortable. The tray in front of the seat was dirty (chocolate spilt by previous people) and bathroom had no toilet paper. I would suggest perhaps a quick check between trips, to make the experience even better. I would use them again, is an excellent stress free way to travel.

Title: Ran on time
Review: Got the bus on a monday from København to Göteborg. Was easy to find at bus station, only bus, although there wasn’t a sign so we were all asking one another if it was the right bus. Arrived on time too.

Title: Efficient service
Review: Efficient service, easy to book a d pay. Good value!

Title: Bus to Lisbon
Review: Easy to buy tickets, Bus was on time, comfortable seats, was a bit late on arrival, once aboard we were told by the driver No standing or walking about, No food, No drink, only water aloud on the bus which no one seamed to be aware of, as we sat near the front we had to listen to him talk loudly on his phone nearly all the way to lisbon, driver on return journey was totally different, more relaxed & didn't mind passengers eating or drinking, but over-all happy with the journeys

Title: EXTREMELY POOR POOR SERVICE
Review: Flix bus has not changed one bit and still disappoints. I had a booking from Birmingham to Glasgow for 1 pm, my bus was delayed till 2:30 with information reached me just 30 mins before the time, I waited, only to be told the bus had been delayed again till 3:15 pm and then again tell 4 pm and then 4;15 pm . It was the worst day of my life , I had not made any alternative as my appointment was. Wey expensive and I had already spent all I had on this journey, leaving me stranded and I could not book another bus company. Only for flix bus to send an email saying due to delays I would miss my connecting bus and I should get an alternative of up to €80 euros and contact their customer service for a refund. How do I get an alternative when you have refused to refund me and I don’t have a dime on me .

Title: No problems at all making the booking…
Review: No problems at all making the booking online

Title: I don’t know what happened to the…
Review: I don’t know what happened to the toilet. After half of the journey from Manchester to London, it smelled seriously. The whole journey was in the toilet.

Title: Great prices
Review: Great prices , comfy seats and generally in time . I would definitely use again.

Title: Excellent fast service
Review: Excellent fast service

Title: Comfortable ride
Review: Comfortable ride, on time and a great price, unable to make the same journey without a lot of hassle

Title: Venice to Trieste
Review: On time, bus in good condition. Drivers took care of luggage. No issues. Good value for money.

Title: Great service  took stress out of…
Review: Great service took stress out of airport journey highly recommend will definitely use again

Title: Efficient and comfortable travel
Review: Really efficient travel. Bus was on time, driver got us all organised very quickly, the seats were very comfortable, with plenty of space in overhead luggage racks. We used the service as a more cost effective alternative to hiring a car in Italy. Would certainly consider using Flixbus again for other routes in Europe.

Title: Punctual
Review: Punctual, efficient and friendly

Title: Overall performance are great except…
Review: Overall performance are great except the arrangement of the seats we have been ask to move from our seats on both trips

Title: Bus cancelled with very short notice.
Review: Very poor service, our coach was cancelled with very short notice.

Title: Excellent service from Driver
Review: Excellent service from Driver, smooth journey, only downside was the muppet that insisted he did not need to move from my prebooked seat, but once the driver announced where to sit and avoid, he moved... Flixbus was excellent overall and arrived to my destination ahead of time also

Title: Bus didnt arrive. Refused our refund
Review: We received an email that there will be a non-green bus for our ride. We waited half an hour and no such bus arrived. We lost a day in our 4 day holiday. We had to rebook but we had no other alternative so we used a different email. |  | We contacted them for a refund on the missed day but company refused telling we actually rode the bus that day.. Avoid. Avoid. Avoid.

Title: Spot on!
Review: Can't whack it for the price. | On time, great drivers and great price. | Will be using again.

Title: Great experience
Review: Bus was clean, the driver was polite, and the journey from Santiago to Porto was smooth and fast. Absolutely great service and so easy to book online.

Title: Very Dissapointed with this service not…
Review: Very Dissapointed with this service not a flix bus going to Bristol airport from swansea .It was a hired coach toilet was discusting unfortunately I had to go, no water or toilet paper very smelly 😡. Coming Back bus left early 14-01 should of left 14-20 was there way b4 14-20 left myself and another young lad stranded .We had to get family member to pick us up luckily enough they gave me a lift as from same town .Phoned today the will reimburse £4 odd for my ticket but not there price I had to pay petrol to person who gave me a lift only £20 I asked for ontop of my ticket .😡They said will only pay out on bus or train 😡 How the hell was i supposed to get to train station from there and fare would of been more than £20 😡 what a shambles .Very unriliable service . Check out ticktok lots of people complaining about them some had buses cancelled and where not even told .Absolutely discracful. Hubby is tamping knowing I was left stranded .😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 Don't use not reliable 🙄😡👎👎👎👎If I could of given 0 Stars thats what they would of got .

Title: The seats are just too comfortable
Review: The seats are just too comfortable

Title: Excellent service …
Review: Excellent service on time value for money definitely

Title: Easy booking
Review: Easy booking, safe and comfortable :)

Title: A great ride.
Review: Travelled from Swansea to Bristol airport. The bus was on time, clean and comfortable. The ticket price was phenomenally cheap at eight pounds. A bargain.

Title: An inexpensive way to travel
Review: Found booking easy, bus was comfortable and departed and arrived on time . | Found loading and unloading baggage a bit of a challenge

Title: Cheap travel
Review: Dundee to Glasgow and return next day bookable seats at extra cost but worth it ,Cheap travel ,informative bus drivers ,clean buses gets from A to B hassle free,we've used Flix buses a lot and never had a problem ....yet

Title: So easy a fool could do it.....and I am…
Review: So easy a fool could do it.....and I am a fool!

Title: No accountability for the problems they cause
Review: The bus was overbooked and so the bus couldn’t leave. | Flixbus did absolutely nothing to resolve this issue. The driver asked people to voluntarily leave (flixbus offered no incentive to do so) and so no one left unsurprisingly. | The bus sat there. For over an hour. Doing nothing. For no reason. | All because flixbus | 1. Overbooked | 2. Took no action to solve the problem they caused | Eventually people jumped off and got a taxi and said they’d invoice them… |  | But hey, they don’t give any discount because the delay was less than 2 hours… | Horrendous from end to end. | Their complaints team had no empathy and couldn’t give two hoots.

Title: Great prices for now
Review: Great prices for now

Title: Freindly and helpful drivers
Review: The drivers were extremely friendly and helpful, so thank you. However, your online customer service and email service requires improvement. With online chat, it took me hours to get hold of anyone ( perhaps there working hours I'm not aware of, although it should be 24-7). I then emailed and never even received a response. Also, in the event of advance cancellation, the policies are far too tough. Offering 30% refund wih vouchers is unacceptable; I personally don't have Flix bus available where I live. I'm sure you can come up with a better refund policy for advance cancellations?

Title: bus cancelled
Review: The bus we were due to take in the evening was cancelled on the morning of departure. We were told we can re book a different bus for free but that left us leaving in the morning or not getting home until the following morning. So we effectively lost a day from our 2 day trip to London to visit my baby nephew. This was very Disapointing and customer services offered little help or sympathy. We would not travel with Flix again.

Title: FlixBus easy to book and very…
Review: FlixBus easy to book and very affordable price

Title: Very good service
Review: Very good service

Title: Great experience
Review: On time. Helpful staff. Smooth driving. Comfortable ride

Title: The bus has just abandoned two teenage…
Review: The bus has just abandoned two teenage girls at a service station in Hungary - just drove off whilst they went to the toilets. | Customer services has just said "nothing we can do - we don't care"..... oh.... "and you may have to wait 14 days to get your luggage back". Shocking. | DO NOT GO WITH THIS COMPANY - EVER.

Title: Avoid!! Bad customer service
Review: Very disappointed with the service. Despite multiple requests for a call, I only received template responses and no one has contacted me directly. My bus journey was significantly delayed, causing me to incur costs for missing an important appointment, and I've received no assistance. Even after copying the CEOs on my emails, the issue hasn't been addressed or escalated to anyone for resolution. |  | reference - FlixBus 38685126

Title: Return trip from Szczecin to Berlin
Review: Took a return day trip for family of four. All went smoothly and only a slight delay on outward journey. Clean, comfortable and modern coaches with professional well presented drivers. Very fair price. WiFi didn’t work either way on the coaches but other than that excellent service and highly recommend.

Title: I was supposed to be transfer and the…
Review: I was supposed to be transfer and the driver confuse me by putting me in a wrong bus I found my self in a wrong destination and I spent a lot of money .

Title: Above expectation service
Review: Pleasant trip all round. The drivers provided an excellent service.

Title: Toronto Union Bus Station to Niagara…
Review: Toronto Union Bus Station to Niagara Falls. Bus left and arrived bang on time. Clean, comfy, air-conditioned and got pre-reserved seats, pleasant relaxed journey. Having read some previous bad review and experiences for other regions I was tempted to cancel, but for this particular journey and our experience would give it 5 stars

Title: They will charge a big fee for…
Review: They will charge a big fee for cancellations. Be aware, also they will not give cash refunds as they provide vouchers (which have an expiration date). Unreliable and disappointing services.

Title: Nice experience with a seamless booking…
Review: Nice experience with a seamless booking experience. I look forward to good riding experience. Thank you

Title: Excellent experience overall
Review: Excellent experience overall - on time, bus was clean and comfortable and driver friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend.

Title: Great way to travel to Heathrow
Review: Left right on time, driver was courteous and focused. Pleasant trip to Heathrow.

Title: Despite not speaking the local…
Review: Despite not speaking the local languages I was able to get help from theh drivers about my stops and everything else run smoothly. The Bus was also very comfortable.

Title: Really good service
Review: Reasonable price, departed and arrived on time, the driver was very helpful, pleasant journey

Title: Excellent driver
Review: Excellent driver. Very polite and friendly. The bus was very clean . 5 star service!

Title: Bus ride to Salzburg South with Flixbus
Review: The bus ride was excellent, comfy bus, punctual, good driver and co-driver. The most horrible is when the Flix bus Salzburg South is in the middle of nowhere with no facilities. Its not even a bus stop. The bus depart us at 6am in the middle of nowhere. Imagine if you are a traveller and you drop down at Salzburg South at 1:30am in the nowhere. Please flix bus, change the Salzburg South location at the real bus port with all facilities. There’s a number of review in google about this matter as well. Thank you

Title: Excellent
Review: Excellent value & comfortable seats. I would definately recommend Flixbus & would use them again.

Title: Very easy to navigate website
Review: Very easy to navigate website

Title: Would Recommend FlixBus
Review: Would recommend FlixBus! We used the Stirling to Glasgow service recently. The drivers were friendly and helpful and the buses were on time, there and back. On board the buses were very clean and comfortable. Will use again!

Title: It was my first experience booking to…
Review: It was my first experience booking to your services and the booking was easy than national express and cheaper

Title: My experience was very bad the bus…
Review: My experience was very bad the bus delay with 25 minutes from Manchester to Glasgow, bus driver was very rude and aggressive shouting at us when we arrived in Glasgow Saturday morning, very rude bus driver.

Title: The trip was great and ran smoothly
Review: The trip was great and ran smoothly. The reason I am giving a 4 star rating is because there was no wifi available.

Title: Great service
Review: Great service. Fabulous friendly and helpful driver. The only suggestion would be for more midday/early afternoon buses as I only made the bus with 5 minutes to spare so if your flight is late you would then have to wait 5-6 hours before the next bus.

Title: Informative driver
Review: Informative driver, good driving

Title: Easy to find stops
Review: Easy to find stops, not too crowded and comfy seats. But the water taps didn’t work on my busses. Other than that a good way to travel.

Title: Bus 45mins late
Review: Bus 45mins late, no word from company...

Title: I didn't like the fact that even though…
Review: I didn't like the fact that even though I had a valid ticket for my travel, I couldn't join the bus because it was not the time I booked. I finished early from school and pleaded with the driver to join him back home, he vehemently refused and asked that i wait for two more hours before my time even when the bus was returning almost empty. Can there also be a day pass ticket you can use anytime you hop on the bus and not necessarily have to wait till the time you booked.

Title: Comforting journey
Review: The arrival and departure time was prime and proper. | Safety was also ensured and with friendly gestures from the bus pilots too.

Title: Absolutely disgusting,travelled from…
Review: Absolutely disgusting,travelled from nice to London, no WiFi or charging points working. My phone was stolen, driver just shrugged it off. Never again, just fly next time.

Title: Value for money
Review: Value for money, effective and fast booking and comfortabke buses. I use Flix between UK and France, between Nottingham and London many times a year. Thank you!

Title: Worst experience in my life
Review: I have a terrible experience .My bus was today 10 th September @ 15:00hrs from bristol to Manchester. The pick up location was changed and I was not notified through email. Now Iam travelling by uber which cost me around 300 pounds .This is not at all acceptable.They should give me the compensation.

Title: Took bus from London to Glasgow
Review: Took bus from London to Glasgow. Roadworks just before Glasgow so diverted off motorway. Thankfully the spare diver was there as the driver got very stressed with the awful road conditions which were very foggy and very twisty roads. The driver was cursing a lot which I didn't like being behind him. Also at a roundabout the spare driver told him to take a right and the driver was about to actually turn right approaching the roundabout!!!

Title: Very easy to use and logical
Review: Very easy to use and logical. Many thanks!

Title: Swansea to Bristol airport
Review: Practical door to door from Swansea bus station to Bristol airport. The coach was very clean, the journey was exactly to time and the price was certainly value for money.

Title: On time, no dramas
Review: On time, helpful driver | No WiFi

Title: It was quick and easy
Review: It was quick and easy

Title: Useless customer service
Review: Useless customer service. Booked a Flixbus from Dundee to Glasgow, changing at Perth at 1010hrs. Got a delayed notification to say that the connection would be 90 minutes late. (The bus had just left Inverness) | This would make me miss my appointment and I complained to Flixbus. Apparently if its under 2 hours, no refund is due. Be very careful about this company, only book with them if you want to lose your money if the bus is delayed

Title: Seat reservation
Review: I reserved a seat on the front row of the bus. When I got in the bus these seats did not even exist. The bus was not a regular FlixBus but from another company. So I paid extra for that seat reservation but in the bus there was just free seating.

Title: Great driver
Review: Great driver , friendly helpful and cheery , lovely clean bus

Title: Inexpensive Ride from Siena to Rome
Review: On time arrival. Comfortable seats. Airconditioning was a little weak for the heat of Italy. Good prices.

Title: Driver on the way to Brno drove…
Review: Driver on the way to Brno drove dangerously. He did not maintain a sufficient distance from other cars, especially when overtaking.

Title: Great service with the best prices!
Flixbus is Amazing
Review: I love flix bus and done tons of trips with them. They are green and you can add offset to your trip for CO2 reduction. Also they are kind of like airlines around EU. No need to emit too much. And they are very well connected. Positive atmosphere and nice quality buses. The whole software system is amazing. Because it links the phone and the booking on the computer. Tickets are awesome. Lots of people are using them all the time.

Title: Efficient & Cheap.
Review: Clean, modern buses ran reliably on time providing an efficient service. Far cheaper than parking a car at the airport & a greener way to travel. | I made the mistake of adding checked bagage not realising 1 per passenger was included so took 2 bags and paid for 4. My mistake, but pay attention to what you are booking.

Title: I am a fan of Flix Bus
Review: I am a fan of Flix Bus; booking is easy, with lots of choice (for certain routes). The drivers and all staff I've met have been very personable, friendly and helpful. I'd really recommend Flix Bus and I'm looking forward to them expanding the routes.

Title: Superb Flixbus Experience
Review: This was my first Flixbus experience and I am so glad I booked it before encountering negative feedback. I did a return trip between London/Antwerp/Amsterdam over two nights and a day and had a fantastic time. |  | My trip had transfers so there were four coaches. A couple of the coaches had two drivers who took turns. All the drivers were cordial and courteous. Coaches were clean and the free Wi-Fi was stable throughout. Timing was impeccable and we even saved time on the Antwerp to London journey. I booked the front seat behind the drivers because the seats had panoramic views, but they also had the most amazing legroom - far better than the space on Eurostar or any economy seat on flights. Seats were very comfortable, allowing me to take naps. I didn't use the toilets so I can't comment on those. |  | At Calais on the return trip, we were given food vouchers to exchange for free food and drinks on the ferry. I should add that although the drivers didn't have English as their first language, they managed to make announcements in English. Also, other passengers were always ready to help. Luggage-wise, suitcases obviously went in the hold, but bags and backpacks of various sizes were allowed onboard. Nothing was measured and none was rejected. Interactions with drivers were all respectful and laidback. All the seats I booked were available for my use, but I can see how they could have been taken as there was no indication of reservation. I did witness an occupant vacating a seat when asked to do so by a person with reservation. |  | Another thing, the app is very good for managing trips including cancellations and amendments. It also helps you stay updated if you have minimal access to your email. I will be booking my next trip this week. Thank you to the two female drivers on the London/Antwerp/London journey and to the gents on the Antwerp/Amsterdam journey.

Title: Website user friendly
Review: Website user friendly, clear instructions, very smooth process

Title: Professional service
Review: On time, good driver, comfortable ride. Plently of leg room and luggage space. But the bus was very warm and had an unpleasant smell.

Title: Excellent service driver was so helpful…
Review: Excellent service driver was so helpful the route was speedy

Title: The journey to Bristol from Manchester…
Review: The journey to Bristol from Manchester was really quick, the only down side was that for the entire journey I struggled to get WiFi! | Before the trip I’d lost the details of my ticket, however the driver had my name on his list…phew! | One of the main reason I took this journey was to catch up with web admin etc. | It was also a little cold on the journey there and back. | Flix arrived back to Manchester almost an hour early, and a few minutes from where I live. And that’s a definite plus!

Title: Brokern heating
Review: The bus had broken heating. The bus driver turned on the AC, to max to "not fall asleep". Despite of many complaints from the passengers regarding temperature (we were all sitting with our jackets on) the driver refused to turn of the AC. When I moved to the front seat, right behind the driver, as it was a bit warmer there, she told me I have to go back to my designated seat. After I did that, more passengers moved to the front due to very low temperature and the bus driver did not mention anything to them. Not my first experience with flix bus, but definitely most dissapointing!

Title: Took a Flixbus from Lisbon to Peniche…
Review: Took a Flixbus from Lisbon to Peniche in Portugal due to the fact that the train would have been too complicated and would still have needed a bus or taxi a one end. Flixbus took me from door to door - comfortable, efficient and very enjoyable. I will definitely consider using Flixbus more in the future for such trips!

Title: I recommend FlixBus
Review: It is great that I can pay a couple of euros and still get some comfort and free internet throughout my trip. Also, the buses departed and arrived on time and the drivers were beneficial.

Title: A great trip from Vienna to Bratislava
Review: A great trip from Vienna to Bratislava. Comfortable, good value and punctual!

Title: Comfortable modern bus at an…
Review: Comfortable modern bus at an unbelievable price.

Title: Excellent  experience
Review: Excellent experience. Friendly drivers, punctual, and pleasant journey. Thank you.

Title: Punctual and pleasant staff
Review: Punctual. Clean bus. Comfortable seats. Carefully driven.

Title: One of our best European bus trips!
Review: Bus was very clean, staff were helpful and spoke English and departed exactly on time. Both drivers drove very safely and we felt comfortable throughout the journey. Also liked that stops were kept to a minimum. Unfortunately arrival was late but this was due to road works and couldn’t be avoided. Would definitely use Flix again!

Title: Really impressed
Review: Really impressed . Excellent Price and service.

Title: Would not recommend
Review: Bus ride that was booked got canceled less than a week prior. Fold out trays on the bus were extremely dirty & the bus arrived late

Title: Good terminal
Review: Good terminal. Bus on time. Helpful driver.

Title: Impossible to change travel when flight…
Review: Impossible to change travel when flight delayed without incurring huge fees! A rip off!!!!

Title: Highly recommend
Review: Excellent customer service from start to finish easy to book | Lovey buses comfortable clean recliners will highly recommend

Title: Excellent experience
Review: The experience using the service is a great one. The price of the journeys to/ from miami and New York are cheap compared to other modes. The website and booking system is easy to navigate. The coaches themselves had the amenities advertised and my family enjoyed the trip on the Flexibus coach more than the Greyhound bus. The journey times were almost 1hr shorter than timetabled both legs of the Journey. This was definitely a great way to see other parts of the state.

Title: Absolute nightmare
Review: Absolute nightmare, DO NOT BOOK. Booked tickets in advance from Edinburgh to Perth. Bus didn’t show, waited for an hour. No communication from Flixbus, no representative at the station, ended up having to book with an alternative company (Citylink) at additional cost. Total joke and stressful experience.

Title: Good trip
Review: Good trip. Bus was cancelled but the replacement bus was on time, clean and comfortable. The driver drove well and was funny. For a low cost bus service it ranked up there with the others. Will use them again.

Title: Modern bus
Review: The bus was modern with good leg room, clean toilets and good AC. It was a smooth ride also.

Title: Great value and easy booking platform
No Hygiene in the toilet on bus
Review: Service 73 to Newcastle: bus late, but due to closure of M62, however no soap, no water, no dryer in the toilet! Disgusting, the door handles and everything will be covered in bacteria and Covid hasn't gone yet!! Not happy!

Title: Flixbus is
Review: Flixbus is, let's say, well, the coach was late for starters, the dam boarding procedure was half assed and disorganised. Anybody with a waist over 32 regulars gunna have a real hard time releaving himself for a number two let me tell you. Overall tho, a blinding mind numbing thirteen friken hour soup crushing drive, we got the safe happy relaxed and content, with a new found since of dammit I love long coaches without miniaturised sleep compartments. Not bad, not bad. Ahem, cough, cough

Title: London to leeds bus 9:15am start bus is…
Review: London to leeds bus 9:15am start bus is hell i went to buy a something in sheffield and my wife already told the driver he’s coming just 3 min she is not stopping the bus such a bloody rude girl and my wife also want to drop in sheffield but she dont want to take out luggage very disappointed

Title: calm coach travel
Review: no fuss no frills on time and quiet on board.

Title: I recently traveled with FlixBus from…
Review: I recently traveled with FlixBus from London to Bristol and would like to share my experience. |  | Firstly, the online booking process was straightforward and user-friendly, and the ticket price was quite reasonable compared to other options. The bus was on time at the departure point, which was a great start to the journey. |  | The bus itself was clean, and the seats were comfortable, providing enough legroom for a relatively pleasant trip. The onboard Wi-Fi and charging ports were a nice touch, especially for those who want to stay connected or get some work done during the journey. The driver was professional and friendly, ensuring a smooth and safe ride. |  | However, there were a few areas that could use improvement. The bus made several unscheduled stops, which slightly extended the journey time. Additionally, there could be clearer communication regarding these stops and any delays. |  | Overall, my experience with FlixBus was positive, and I would consider traveling with them again. They offer good value for money, comfortable travel, and reliable service, with just a few areas for potential improvement.

Title: Great for daytrip in Portugal
Review: Booking online was easy, the bus was comfortable and punctual both ways. Drivers were professional and helpful.

Title: Awesome
Review: Comfy to travel

Title: Great service….
Review: Great service…. | Value for money. Comfortable journey.

Title: So far so good
Review: So far so good
