Review: I traveled on September 3rd at 23:50 in the evening from Munich to Novara (veveri a4 eastbound) with Bus N76 Direction Turin and the drivers were so rude that they did not stop me at the destination where I had booked the ticket.

Title: Trip was cancelled without prior notice…
Review: Trip was cancelled without prior notice on the day of the journey

Title: Good bus ride
Review: Nice buses, 220v power sockets, and on time. App is easy to use.

Title: Cancelled my bus and refused a refund
Review: That is appalling service. You changed my bus service and made it unsuitable to fit my flight times. | It gave me less than 48 hours to find alternative transport. | The flix site had availability on the buses I originally booked - for an extra £27. More than my original booking fee. | I cancelled my booking, it no longer fitted my flights, and they refused to refund cash, issuing a voucher. I can safely say I will Never be using this voucher, after the dispicable service.

Title: Smooth journey
Review: Easy to book. Easy eticket to manage. Allocated seats. The journey went very smoothly. We left a little late but made the time up. Driver professional.

Title: The journey was really smooth and fast
Very over priced tickets for such a bad…
Review: Very over priced tickets for such a bad service. Quite long trip, toilet not working. Not providing toilet breaks. Previously also experienced crazy driving by flixbus drivers. Would not choose this company ever if any other choice.

Title: Easy to use service and very cheap…
Review: Easy to use service and very cheap tickets available

Title: Every process was well informed and…
Review: Every process was well informed and self explanatory.

Title: I have used flix bus over last month…
Review: I have used flix bus over last month nearly ten times in and France. I do prefer this company than the others. In France some don't have WiFi as use the Spanish bussess. While the drivers work very hard are often short with all queries about late bussess or lack of information at the bus stop. The toilets have been disgusting and no water to wash hands or toilet. I still prefer to use Flix bus and will continue to do so as overall they have been reliable..

Title: Very convenient and affordable way to…
Review: Very convenient and affordable way to travel from country to country in mainland Europe. |  | My journey was very comfortable and stress free.

Title: The bus is on time and seat are very…
Review: The bus is on time and seat are very comfortable and toilet facilities is very good and very neat and drop on time with safety driver is very polite just one thing to do make another bus station in Blackburn

Title: Reliable service
Review: Reliable service, on time and comfortable with air con bus

Title: Very nice experience
Review: Very nice experience. I will still use this reliable transport system and brand.

Title: Easy to use and well presented
Driver was on time and polite.
It was smooth and on time.
Easy to fill in booking form and pay
Brilliant
Review: Brilliant! Really easy to book

Title: Low prices doesnt mean anything.
Review: Low prices doesnt mean anything. |  | Camcelled my second part of journey. When i chrck the bus schedule after cacellation it was still there double price and soon fully booked. |  | And first time i went with them wifi didnt work. |  | So my ticket was 6, whcih carefully second part was 1.5 so they dont need to refund by polici and easily cancell.. i needed to rwbuy wxpensive bus because od this, while originaly i had more options to drive my journey. |  | Psycjopatical way of transport.

Title: Driver coped well with problem
Review: Driver coped very well with having to use a replacement bus. He therefore came to departure point a bit late - but journey tracker showed replacement bus approaching. Well managed in the face of adversity

Title: Efficient time
Review: Efficient time - arrived at destination early.

Title: Emergency escape window taped up
Review: The emergency escape hatch in the ceiling was taped up and would never have been able to be opened in an emergency.The toilet was broken and the smell of stale urine was in the bus all the journey.No curtains on windows. No WiFi. Charging points did not charge. | I have contacted Flixbus by email but nothing achieved.

Title: Really awful
Review: I booked the bus for 6.15pm from Glasgow to arrive to Aberdeen at 9.35pm as it was said on the website. Instead of arriving at the time been mentioned I arrived nearly 30 minutes late, being late on the bus to get home and getting myself stuck in Aberdeen for another hour to catch another bus to get home. The driver seems didn't even bother to be on time at all as he kept slowing down when there was no roadworks or anything. Absolutely wouldn't use this coach at all

Title: Very very good I heard about the bus…
Review: Very very good I heard about the bus before thank.

Title: Threatening And Abusive Driver
Review: Today at Buchanan Bus Station 10:45 - 1047 I was threatened and abused by a Flix Bus driver, the driver had long blonde hair and was in his early 30s, the Bus stance was near stance 42 at stance 41, the Bus number was 090, Reg Number is SJ23 HVG, |  | The incident in question was all that happened was I said to the disgusting driver "Excuse Me" very politely and that horible little man pointed his finger at me and said "GO AWAY!", I then spoke to 2 seperate workers for Flix Bus at the station, 1 of the workers said to phone customer service, the 2nd person I spoke to advised that as McColl do recruit I would need to talk to them but when phoning them they advised they recruit some but not all drivers and they are a separate company and advised to talk to them, when phoning Flix Bus Was Hung up 5 times before Getting to a woman with a American accent which she kept saying they need video evidence per terms and conditions then disconnected the call after repeating the same robotic answer to me, I then phoned again with a woman who sounded the same as the Woman before, this time information was given without her even asking for key information about the incident and I had to give her the information as she did not take that much before, her name was Whitney and she said this would be passed to the quality Team. |  | Zero confidence that this will be looked at as feel they were just trying to get me off the call. |  | Trash Company.

Title: Great service and amazing value…
Review: Great service and amazing value for.money

Title: I'm wildly disappointed in how Flixbus…
Review: I'm wildly disappointed in how Flixbus has handled things. I have travelled with Flix in Europe on so many occasions. In early July, I purchased a ticket about an hour before the bus departed Liverpool back to London. After arriving at the bus stop, I met several other passengers, we received a notification that the bus had been delayed nearly 2 hours, then that the bus would be ontime, then delayed again another 2 hours. I reached out to customer support because the arrival time of the bus kept being pushed out 30 minutes, and I wanted to know if it was coming or if we needed to find another way to London. It was the middle of the night, this was not a secure bus shelter, it was outside - there were homeless people have territory fights near the shelter, no where to charge your phone. I spent nearly 2 hours trying to get answers from the Flixbus staff who continued to gaslight me and tell me the bus was coming, then tell me I had missed the bus despite me being there early and I was sitting with other passengers who had missed the bus. The agent finally told me that I could purchase a 2nd class fare train ticket to get home and I would be reimbursed. I have had back and forth communication with Flixbus since this point and they agreed to transfer me the refund but it still hasn't been transferred to me and it's been 2 months since I had to front £120 to get home, I missed a very important meeting at work, and I was completely exhausted because I had to stay awake and fight with Flixbus to get home instead of sleeping on the nightbus back to London. I was actually thinking that the refund would redeem the experience, but they continue to ignore my emails and have still not issued the refund. It's pretty unacceptable.

Title: A review of several tiring, wearing experiences
Review: This is a review of two out of about four truly terrible journeys with Flixbus recently, and I'm sure judging by some of the reviews other folks have had much worse experiences still. Now finally going to stop using them, and I should have done years ago. |  | Journey 1. | 2 hours late. There were missing seats with wires hanging out, broken chairs tied upright to the side of the coach seemingly with bin bags, no chargers, horrible toilet as usual |  | Journey 2. On this one as I write. | 2+ hours late, could be more than 3. The roof window of the bus is "sealed" with plastic and gaffer tape, and leaked so much earlier it filled up the seat below with a pool of water. | The driver has been on the phone twice, lifting it to his ear as he drives and driving with one hand. He waved me off, bizarrely saying it was "hands free"! Last of all, we were made late by the first driver looking for the second driver's house in Calais for an hour, during which time we missed the ferry and became very late. |  | Some general observations. | The drivers are always amusing, and often as bemused at the general state of things as the passengers. However they are often also rude and blunt, and never communicate what's going on or update on lateness. |  | The buses are never fixed by the company. They don't care at all, only about their profit margin (which I'm amazed they even have, considering the amount of money in refunds and extra costs their inadequacy must cause them). |  | Other cheap companies do quite a lot better! National express are fine by comparison

Title: I'm not sure i will travel again

My both second connection was delayed but i didn't get any information about it no email or message even when i tried to check online i couldn't find anything there.

Title: Very rude driver on the way to London
Review: Very rude driver on the way to London. He was treating everyone with disrespect! We have paid for the trip. He is treating everyone like animals. Could you please tell him to try to be a bit more polite | He was also very racist. A Spanish couple were trying explain that they had already paid for their luggage and they switched to Spanish, he answered very angry no Espanish. The driver English wasn't good either. I have tried to intervene and translate, I had my cigarette litten but I was keeping it to one side. He shouted get in the bus, you Romanians you poison us with cigarettes! It felt that he was about to explode and maybe kick someone off if he felt like it. | My hands are still shaking from the shock! | I have travelled many times with Flixbus, but I have never seen this level of aggressiveness and spite!

A couple times I saw the bus driver texting or holding his phone for a call while driving; this should not be permitted and made passengers uneasy. | On the good side, I was glad to see 3 different drivers involved with the long overnight journey.

Title: Excellent service
Review: Excellent service

Title: I booked Manchester to Plymouth- a two…
Review: I booked Manchester to Plymouth- a two bus journey. Plus points- both buses were running on time and were clean. Minus points- the first bus’s toilet wasn’t functional- no-one could open the door, including myself. The second driver (I think they changed over at Birmingham) had to deal with a very minor bump (a medium size car tried to go through a small size car gap and knocked the coach). We were 5 minutes from London Victoria, it was close to 10pm and we were in the middle of a busy road. The driver stopped, another driver stopped, however the errant driver did not. The Flix driver kept yelling “Health and safety!”… | We were all fine, the bus had a bumper bruise. | For a while, it seemed we were doomed to forever reside in the middle of a busy urban road. There needs to be further training for dealing with minor incidents. | The second bus- first driver was excellent (from London Victoria at 11.59 on 22/08 to Plymouth); took my bag, explained where the drivers would be changing. Our reserved seats were changed- I get these things happen but how many things can go wrong? Turns out, I was sitting in the only seat (apart from the back ones, where you have leg room) where the reclining mechanism was totally missing. Some lucky people in front of me exercised their right to recline. 6 hours later in Plymouth, I was fine but with a very sore back and neck. It is cheap, go into it with a good book, unlimited data and in good health. I also now know that if I ever do Race Across The World, I might use Flixbus, but wouldn’t go with my daughter.

Title: Such a positive experience coming back…
Review: Such a positive experience coming back on a FlixBus from Leeds. Bus on time and the driver was so polite and helpful unlike the driver who we had going to Leeds on National Express……. I would choose FlixBus over National Express without a doubt!!

Title: Worst customer care ever
Review: Worst customer care ever. Bus was delayed by three hours and bus company would not pay for taxi as had onward connection. I had to make my own way to London there for not to miss connecting bus. Other company cheaper and better.

Title: If I could give a zero review I would
Review: If I could give a zero review I would. |  | I have a disability and booked 2 seats on both outward and return journeys. I then changed the booking because the travel date had changed. I lost the second seat on both journeys. Customer Services did not care. No solutions to the problem and could not add the second seat. Cancellation would have cost me £25 quid and a new booking a further £40. You can't speak to anyone in the UK either. USELESS SERVICE.

Title: Glasgow to London
Review: We booked a night journey from Glasgow to London on 25th August, 22:40. The bus driver was extremely rude to us. We paid extra to sit on the front seats and before the bus was on the road, the driver came to us multiple times to wear the shoes as you are on the front seats, your legs should not be out of the seat for even 1 inch as this is not your side. He was making new rules as per his convince and if we do not follow he said to us to leave the bus and not only once but 3 times he was like you can go out if you don't listen to me. |  | Will never suggest anyone to take the flixbus if this is the attitude of the drivers.

Title: Cancelled our bus mid-journey - ‘get off the bus’
Review: They cancelled our bus mid-journey and told us to ‘get off the bus’ at 1:30am in Newport. A bus with elderly people and children, and they wanted us to stand on the street or ‘get a train’ - no trains run at that time. |  | Not only did they expect us all to leave, Gareth Jones, the night time supervisor, said ‘we’ll book you onto the later FlixBus route and kick those people that are already on, off’. Imagine being those people! That bus was over 2 hours later and flights would have been missed. |  | Onto the refund, they refunded the bus that they cancelled but have not covered the cost of our new bus ticket with a different company. It’s £30 each and they’re not interested. |  | Horrific service from everyone in question. Avoid them like the plague, especially if you’ve got some to be.

Title: A Bargain
Review: Bus was on time for outgoing and return journey. The outgoing bus was an older model but was comfortable. There was some confusion with seat numbers (there weren't any), as tickets had allocated seat numbers on them. The return journey bus was new and had seat numbers so no confusion! There was an on-board toilet. Journey went smoothly. Drivers were friendly. For £10 return journey for Bristol to London it was a bargain.

Title: Terrible attitude of driver last night…
Review: Terrible attitude of driver last night on the 23.05 bus from Edinburgh Ingliston to Aberdeen bus station. The driver was rude from the momment the bus stopped and was refusing passage to two under 16 girls who had a ticket but it wasn't the same as their ID as their parents had booked the ticket. The driver had obviously had a bad day as she was refusing to move the bus goodness knows why !! It was an hour and a half late to start with and after 40 minutes of the bus drivers tantrums which also resulted in a fellow driver asking her to just drive my daughter and her friends got off and luckily got an uber to Dundee. The bus was still there when they left in their taxi. Shameful display of behaviour from the driver and those poor young girls who were alost left stranded must have at one point been frantic as they had no money if they had been refused the bus hourney. Goodness knows if the bus ever moved but I would suspect there will be a few complaints to the company about this one! And requests for refunds. No idea how you sort this one but the travellers weren't loud and rude just wanting home.

I am very greatful of Steven to help us board the bus to Glasgow earlier than our scheduled time and location. I would definitely give him 10 stars, thank you Steven for your help.

Driver was friendly and the ferry ride broke the trip up . | Overall it was a much cheaper and relaxing journey than the flight and less queuing through customs etc . | On the European end it was a little longer to Amsterdam than I thought getting in at midnight but the driver was very accommodating and stopped as close to my hotel as he could so I wasn’t walking around the area at night on my own. Very comfortable seat and overall more positive than negative ! | Nikki

Title: Although the coaches are sometimes a…

Title: New bus
Review: New bus. Friendly driver. Safe journey.

Title: I would give them zero stars if…
Review: I would give them zero stars if possible. |  | After the rudest coach drivers, talking to passengers like garbage, before we even left the London bus terminal.... Should have given us a clue how long this jonrney would be and how awful.... All the way to parris. |  | What was supposed to be a nice adventure for my sisters birthday turned into hell. |  | Expect gross bus toilets, rude staff, broken seats and charging ports. Don't ask them anything (even where the loo is on the bus) because your met with verbal abuse. |  | The border crossing is something like a movie, we took the over night coach to wake up in Paris and they hurded us like cattle off the bus yelling at us for the passport check. Not explaining what was happening, just yelling. |  | We made it onto a euro tunnel, for the coach drivers to get off leaving everyone over heating in the bus. My little sister started to feel faint and asked him if she could stand outside the bus, and he looked at the other coach driver and made some remark in there language and ignored her. |  | We made it to bercy to the most chaotic bus terminal, again rude staff. Luggage of other passengers chucked on floor. |  | Bus terminal with broken toilets, covered in human fecees, no soap or water to wash hands.... And it gets better...... |  | After a day in Paris seeing the sights, ticking of my sisters Paris bucket list, and laughing about this experience so we don't cry. |  | We got back to the bus terminal very early waiting for are late night coach, it appears on the bord but no bus gate. And 5 mins until it arrives it's still there..... But no bus gate number... We asked another flix bus if they knew what was happening, he told us to go figure it out. The bus terminal help center was shut. Very rough terminal, people drinking, no toilets, people are peeing outside on the ground. Loud music, yelling. |  | Over an hour past are coach time it changed to delayed.... There were family's, older people and a couple of little kids left with us waiting for our coach. At 3am despite emails to the company, and via there socials, met with the standard email reply. The rudeness of other flix coach drivers. And the joy of then being stuck in this bus station with literally rats running around the garbage. We finally got an email 3am... To say it's been cancelled... No explanation. To rebook onto another coach or refund.... There was no coaches for 48 hours.... So we had to wait till sunrise taking it in turns to sit on a dirty wall in the worse bus station I have ever been in, for the whole night. We had to pay hundreds of pounds to get home on the euro train. And after speaking via email with flix, they offered to refund the cost of train tickets (minus the coach refund for return travel)...... | That was June.... It's now August. And after taking my bank details and saying numerous times they were or have refunded.... I confirmed with my bank this has never ever been done. |  | AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Title: Useless - avoid
Review: Useless, Aberdeen to Glasgow, bus no show, no information, no representation, no means to contact. Absolutely useless.

Title: Seat reservation disaster
Review: Once again seat reservation didn't match what I booked. | Don't like having to ask people to vacate their seats. | Explained to driver that I booked front panorama right, to be told I must sit on the left. Right occupied 👎 | Cardiff has become a nightmare taking far to long due to stop location. | Where it is now, is just too far for perspective passengers, who usually have to bus it in to the city anyways. | Flix need to operate a service to Birmingham, for connecting services to the Midlands and all points north. | National express is the only viable option.

Review: This is the first time I've booked tickets but seemed way quicker than with National Express

Title: When you apply or call them regarding refunds, they keep transferring you from one colleague to another! 😡
Review: Very bad customer service. They cancel trips without prior notification via emails and the don’t refund you immediately you apply for a cancelled trip refund. 🤦‍♀️

Title: Easy,cheap and reliable. Much better than the train.
Review: Got the bus from Porto to Viana do Castelo. Super easy compared to the train. Direct service, cheap, on time, very easy to book. Absolutely excellent.

Title: Comfortable bus and polite drivers
Review: Comfortable bus and polite drivers, really smooth driving, handy option of checking the status of trip in the app. The arrival was delayed for a bit more than 1 hour due to the queue before passport control (trip from Romania to Hungary), but FlixBus offered a discount for the next trip.

Title: A terrible company
Review: A terrible company, in every way. Toilets locked, reserved seats sometimes don't even exist, refunds aren't honoured, and double charging is so common they list it as a help topic! Help team close chats as soon as they are sent to them, without time to even read them... Keep well clear!

Title: Reliable and on time
Review: Reliable and on time. Tickets easy to buy. Driver and co driver very helpful and nice. After the first trip with them I bought another one. I do recommend Flixbus.

Title: Easy to make booking
Review: Very easy to book

Title: A completely incident free
Review: A completely incident free, on-time journey. The coach was clean, good driver and a punctual arrival.

Title: So easy to book
Review: So easy to book

Title: The journey was smooth
Review: The journey was smooth. It could only be that the seats are not adjustable to make me lean back to relax. Otherwise, it was excellent and convenient for the price

Title: Awesome experience
Review: Awesome experience

Title: Cheap as chips !!!
Review: Just booked direct return tickets from newport to gatwick for £57 it was £145 for the same trip from national express. Wont use anyone else again

Title: Don't use this HORRIBLE SCAM company.
Review: Don't use this HORRIBLE SCAM company.. they never refund money only giving vouchers for refund..be careful Hidden chargers.. SCAM SCAM SCAM 😡😡😡

Title: Reliable
Review: On time, clean and affordable.

Title: Quick easy use to book
Review: Quick easy use to book

Title: Prompt
Review: Prompt. Efficient and courteous service.

Title: I was a bit dubious about the bus when…
Review: I was a bit dubious about the bus when I booked but as the journey time was shorter due to two stops I booked and was pleasantly surprised. Yes The bus was really comfortable. The diver was really lovely and the journey was just perfect and on time and no issues. Highly recommend.

Title: on time
Review: on time, wifi worked, comfortable chairs and clean

Title: On time and comfortable
Review: On time and comfortable

Title: Worst experience, FlixBus not recommended
Review: We had booked tickets for bus on flix bus app to travel to Dubrovnik from split this includes pre booking of seats. But when we reached the bus station, neither there was a flux bus , not we got seats which we reserved, as the bus not from flux bus and seat reservation was a joke. So we wasted our money pre booking seats, also the bus which was allocated was pathetic, the air conditioning was poor and had to experience extreme heat and discomfort inside the bus

Title: Good service
Review: The booking is a good service with which to have book my journey. Will do business again with FlixBus.

Title: Superb customer service throughout
Review: Superb customer service throughout. Easy to book online - great drivers- even helped me edit my booking when plane came early. Will always use when travelling in Europe.

Title: A trip with positivity
Review: Travelling from Sheffield meadowhall to London Victoria, Friday 16th August at 08:00 with Driver Shaun. I have great respect for Shaun as he seemed to have made everyone on the coach feel happy. He had a great sense of humour offered chocolates & told everyone that they are special & can achieve anything. This was a great start to my short break. And personally I needed to hear positivity cos things are so glum at the moment. There should be more Shaun’s in this world.

Title: Terrible - Would not refund despite saying they would
Review: My son booked a ticket , but due to the app being not clear he booked it for the wrong day. He quickly noticed and as it was impossible to get in touch with the company he booked a second ticket for the correct date. He then cancelled the first ticket and received a voucher for less than half the amount. All this happened within two hours. When he got home he went on the chat, who at first told him that he would get a full refund, then they said they were keeping 50% for 'charges'. They said they would refund the voucher, then they said they wouldn't. My son is about £40 pounds down now and stuck with a voucher he can't use. Customer service were abysmal and unfriendly and the company just plain greedy and uncaring. He is just a student and they have robbed him of his money.

Title: Fab website
Review: Very easy to book

Title: Bus arrived on time
Review: Bus arrived on time, great journey. | Improvement if driver loaded and unloaded suitcases

Title: London to Peterborough
Review: London to Peterborough, the trip there was fine, running late coming back by 40 minutes which considering it arrived just after 10pm was not great. Visiting a friend, in the past I’ve travelled by National Express but now there is only Flixbus and only one bus a day there and back, why not more buses from London to Peterborough? In future I’ve decided I’ll probably just take the train which is pricey, but more options with times to travel and more comfort. Bit of a shame really

Title: Never again...our trip got delayed by 1…
Review: Never again...our trip got delayed by 1 hour!!! No apologies or communication whatsoever. I regret booking for a round trip with this company. | The seats are too squeezed and no enough leg room, wifi doesn't work.

Title: Driver Nikola is the best!
Review: Driver Nikola was very helpful. We had a long wait at the border but he was giving us information, trying to help as much as he can. He is very experienced. A big well done to Nikola! Thank you!

Title: Simple and quick booking
Review: Simple and quick booking - thank you

Title: Excellent service
Review: Bus was waiting at the stand, easy to store luggage. Seat booked so no problem. Left on time and arrived 10mins early. Excellent service
